original: ci yang rgyu gang @48b gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci yang rgyu gang @48b gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: dang po gnyis mtha' gcig tu the tshom du 'gyur ba ni 'di ltar de dag gnyis ni thams cad kyi /
analyzed: dang po gnyis mtha' gcig tu the tshom du 'gyur ba ni 'di ltar de dag gnyis ni thams cad kyi /
translated: The first two are definitely uncertain, because those two are

original: rjes su zhugs dang ma zhugs las //
analyzed: rjes su zhugs dang ma zhugs las //
translated: not established as either concomitant or not concomitant🔽with all.

original: ldog dang rjes 'gro grub min phyir //
analyzed: ldog dang rjes 'gro grub min phyir //
translated: Because of the nonestablishment of concomitance and reversal,

original: phyogs du ma dag las gcig rnam par bcad pa yang ma yin la cig shos sgrub par gtan la phab pa yang ma yin pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las yin te /
analyzed: phyogs du ma dag las gcig rnam par bcad pa yang ma yin la cig shos sgrub par gtan la phab pa yang ma yin pa de ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las yin te /
translated: it is not the case that one is eliminated from among many positions, nor is the other ascertained as established. That is because of concomitance and reversal.

original: de dag ni cha shas gcig dang yang ma bral ba yin par rtogs so //
analyzed: de dag ni cha shas gcig dang yang ma bral ba yin par rtogs so //
translated: It is understood that those are not free from one part.🔽If that is so, then it would be a reason that is neither ascertained

original: gal te de lta na ni gcig la nges par zhugs pa dang / log pa'ang min pa rtags su 'gyur //🔽'di ltar gnyis ka'i chal gcig tu nges par zhugs pa ma yin zhing rjes su zhugs pa dang log pa dag ni gnyis ka'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na ni gcig la nges par zhugs pa dang / log pa'ang min pa rtags su 'gyur // 'di ltar gnyis ka'i chal gcig tu nges par zhugs pa ma yin zhing rjes su zhugs pa dang log pa dag ni gnyis ka'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: nor reversed in one.🔽In that case, it would be a reason that is neither concomitant nor reversed in both parts.

original: gal te srid du ni 'gyur la //
analyzed: gal te srid du ni 'gyur la //
translated: If that is possible, then it would be a reason that is neither ascertained nor reversed in one.

original: gnyis kar 'gyur ba srid ma yin //
analyzed: gnyis kar 'gyur ba srid ma yin //
translated: It is impossible that it be both.

original: yod pa gnyis ka min pa'ang min //
analyzed: yod pa gnyis ka min pa'ang min //
translated: Nor is it neither.

original: gang don gcig la rtag par yang 'gyur mi rtag par 'gyur ba ni mi srid do //
analyzed: gang don gcig la rtag par yang 'gyur mi rtag par 'gyur ba ni mi srid do //
translated: It is impossible that one and the same object be permanent and impermanent.

original: de bzhin du yod pa'i don rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du yod pa'i don rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa yang ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, it is impossible that an existent object be neither permanent nor impermanent.

original: gal te 'di ltar ji ltar na gnyis ka'i cha ste 'gal ba'i don du ma la 'jug cing thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste shes byed kyi rtags su 'gyur zhe na //
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar ji ltar na gnyis ka'i cha ste 'gal ba'i don du ma la 'jug cing thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste shes byed kyi rtags su 'gyur zhe na //
translated: If it is asked how it is that a single word can be applied to many objects that are mutually exclusive, and how it can be applied to all objects,

original: don gzhan rnam par bcad pa'i sgo nas yin gyi de'i khyad par bzung nas ni ma yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan rnam par bcad pa'i sgo nas yin gyi de'i khyad par bzung nas ni ma yin te /
translated: it is because of the exclusion of other objects, but not because of the apprehension of their difference.🔽For,

original: 'di ltar de ni /🔽gang du med de rnam gcod du //
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni / gang du med de rnam gcod du //
translated: it is established as the absence of that🔽in whatever it is not.

original: grub don don bzhin sgrub par byed //
analyzed: grub don don bzhin sgrub par byed //
translated: It is established as the absence of that in whatever it is not.🔽It is applied to both parts,

original: gcig de gzhan la gnyis su 'jug / gnyis ka'i cha la ni gang la med pa de las rnam par gcod do //
analyzed: gcig de gzhan la gnyis su 'jug / gnyis ka'i cha la ni gang la med pa de las rnam par gcod do //
translated: and it is applied to both parts in the sense that it is the exclusion of that which is absent in those two.

original: de'i sgo nas bsgrub bya'i rigs mtha' dag gam phyogs gcig la zhugs nas don ji lta ba bzhin du shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs su brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i sgo nas bsgrub bya'i rigs mtha' dag gam phyogs gcig la zhugs nas don ji lta ba bzhin du shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs su brjod pa yin te /
translated: Through that, having engaged in all or some of the types of objects to be established, one expresses a reason that causes one to understand the meaning just as it is.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang / rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang / rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, “Sound is impermanent because it is produced,” and “Because it arises from effort.”

original: de bzhin du autpala'i dri bsung ba nyid las dri nyid dang / yon tan nyid dang / brten pa nyid dang / yon tan ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa nyid du 'grub pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du autpala'i dri bsung ba nyid las dri nyid dang / yon tan nyid dang / brten pa nyid dang / yon tan ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa nyid du 'grub pa yin te /
translated: In the same way, the fragrance of the utpala is established as fragrance itself, as a quality, as a dependent, as not a quality, and so on.

original: dri nyid la sogs pa med pa la ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dri nyid la sogs pa med pa la ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because fragrance and so on do not exist without the utpala, they are not seen.

original: de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te /
translated: If it were not so,

original: gal te zhugs pa bzhin grub na //
analyzed: gal te zhugs pa bzhin grub na //
translated: if it were established like the engagement,

original: dkar gzugs yon tan brten pa las //🔽rim pa bzhin du bzlog rim la //
analyzed: dkar gzugs yon tan brten pa las // rim pa bzhin du bzlog rim la //
translated: from the white form, the quality, the dependent,🔽in sequence,

original: gsum gnyis gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur//
analyzed: gsum gnyis gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur//
translated: the three, two, and one would be understood in reverse order.

original: @49a * // gcig gi tshig tu smos pa ni gcig tu ma bsgrubs pa 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can yin pas the tshom gyi gtan tshigs nyid du shes par bya ba'i don du ste 'di ltar spyi rtag par khas len pa la mnyan bya nyid dang byas pa nyid kyi🔽sgra la ci 'di rtag pa yin nam /
analyzed: @49a * // gcig gi tshig tu smos pa ni gcig tu ma bsgrubs pa 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can yin pas the tshom gyi gtan tshigs nyid du shes par bya ba'i don du ste 'di ltar spyi rtag par khas len pa la mnyan bya nyid dang byas pa nyid kyi sgra la ci 'di rtag pa yin nam /
translated: For example, if one accepts that sound is permanent, then the reason “because it is audible” and “because it is produced”

original: 'on te mi rtag pa yin zhes the tshom gyi gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'on te mi rtag pa yin zhes the tshom gyi gtan tshigs su 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
translated: would be inconclusive, since one would wonder whether sound is permanent or impermanent.

original: ci ste gcig gi tshig tu bstan pa'i phyir //🔽gcig nyid du go bar bya'o zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste gcig gi tshig tu bstan pa'i phyir // gcig nyid du go bar bya'o zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If one says that the word “only” indicates that sound is understood to be one,

original: 'gal ba rnams gcig la brjod par mi 'dod pas so //
analyzed: 'gal ba rnams gcig la brjod par mi 'dod pas so //
translated: that is not so, because it is not accepted that contradictions are expressed in one thing.

original: byas pa nyid dang brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba nyid ni gnyis po gcig la gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: byas pa nyid dang brtsal ma thag tu 'byung ba nyid ni gnyis po gcig la gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: Being produced and arising immediately after effort are both reasons for one thing,

original: dper na bslang ba'i rnam pa dang bya babs pa gnyis gcig tu 'dus pa las mtho yor du shes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na bslang ba'i rnam pa dang bya babs pa gnyis gcig tu 'dus pa las mtho yor du shes pa lta bu'o //
translated: just as the combination of two things, the aspect of being raised and the aspect of being moved, is the reason for understanding a scarecrow to be a man.

original: de ni bsgrub bya bzlog pa la //
analyzed: de ni bsgrub bya bzlog pa la //
translated: The contradictory is the opposite of the probandum.

original: 'gal ba / de nyid gnyis ka'i char rnam pa gnyis su 'jug ste /
analyzed: 'gal ba / de nyid gnyis ka'i char rnam pa gnyis su 'jug ste /
translated: The contradictory is twofold:

original: de rnam par bcad ste bsgrub par bya ba'i don du gzhan la zhugs pa'i phyir bzlog pa sgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: de rnam par bcad ste bsgrub par bya ba'i don du gzhan la zhugs pa'i phyir bzlog pa sgrub pa yin te /
translated: The opposite of the probandum is the proof of the opposite, because it is engaged in the other in order to eliminate that and prove the probandum.

original: dper na gtan tshigs de dag nyid las rtag pa yin no zhes sgrub par byed pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na gtan tshigs de dag nyid las rtag pa yin no zhes sgrub par byed pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, in the proof of permanence by those very reasons.

original: 'di la yang rtag pa bkag pa'i sgo nyid nas bzlog pa sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: 'di la yang rtag pa bkag pa'i sgo nyid nas bzlog pa sgrub par byed do //
translated: Here also, the opposite is proved by the door of the negation of permanence.

original: gal te 'di na me yod pa'i phyir grang ba'i reg pa yod do zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar 'gal bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di na me yod pa'i phyir grang ba'i reg pa yod do zhes bya ba 'di ji ltar 'gal bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If one says, Because there is fire here, there is the sensation of cold, how can that be contradictory?

original: ji ltar na mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji ltar na mi 'gyur te /
translated: How can it not be contradictory?

original: gang gi phyir grang ba'i reg pa bkag pa tsam gyis dro bar mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir grang ba'i reg pa bkag pa tsam gyis dro bar mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the mere negation of the sensation of cold does not establish heat.

original: gal te dro bar mi bsgrub tu chug na yang grang reg ma yin pa ni 'grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: gal te dro bar mi bsgrub tu chug na yang grang reg ma yin pa ni 'grub pa nyid do //
translated: Even if heat is not established, the non-sensation of cold is established.

original: de lta na ni rjes su zhugs pa'i shes pa'i bye brag de rnam par gzhig pa'i nyid kyis dro ba'i reg pa grub par brjod pas don gyi shugs kyis grang reg ma yin par grub pa'i phyir 'gal bar brjod pa la 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: de lta na ni rjes su zhugs pa'i shes pa'i bye brag de rnam par gzhig pa'i nyid kyis dro ba'i reg pa grub par brjod pas don gyi shugs kyis grang reg ma yin par grub pa'i phyir 'gal bar brjod pa la 'gal ba med do //
translated: But if that is so, then the specific cognition that engages it is established as the contact of heat, and the meaning of that statement implies that it is not the contact of cold.

original: ci ste byas pa nyid ni rtsol ba las byung ba dang ma byung ba gnyis ka dang tha mi dad pa yin la /
analyzed: ci ste byas pa nyid ni rtsol ba las byung ba dang ma byung ba gnyis ka dang tha mi dad pa yin la /
translated: But if you say that being produced is not different from both that which arises from effort and that which does not,

original: tha mi dad thams cad las ma log par zhugs pas mi rtag pa nyid rjes su zhugs pa'i shes pas ni rtag pa bkag pa la mi ltos pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tha mi dad thams cad las ma log par zhugs pas mi rtag pa nyid rjes su zhugs pa'i shes pas ni rtag pa bkag pa la mi ltos pa yin no zhe na /
translated: and that because it engages without turning away from all that is not different, impermanence is engaged by the cognition that engages it, and it does not depend on the negation of permanence.

original: gal te gang zhig gang la zhugs pa de ni rjes su zhugs pa'i shes pa'i bye brag de rnam par gzhig pa'i sgo nas byed par nus na ni de ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te gang zhig gang la zhugs pa de ni rjes su zhugs pa'i shes pa'i bye brag de rnam par gzhig pa'i sgo nas byed par nus na ni de ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: If that which engages something is able to engage it by the specific cognition that engages it, then that would be so.

original: gang du zhugs pa ni /
analyzed: gang du zhugs pa ni /
translated: But that which engages something

original: de'i bye brag la rmongs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bye brag la rmongs pa'o //
translated: is confused about its specific attributes.

original: dper @49b na byas pa nyid rtsol ba las byung ba dang / ma byung ba gnyis ka la zhugs pa'i phyir gnyis kar sgra la the tshom gyi gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: dper @49b na byas pa nyid rtsol ba las byung ba dang / ma byung ba gnyis ka la zhugs pa'i phyir gnyis kar sgra la the tshom gyi gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: For example, because of being produced, the word is a reason for doubt regarding both, because it is engaged in both, that is, in what is produced from effort and what is not produced from effort.

original: gal te byas pa'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba'o zhes sgrub pa'am /
analyzed: gal te byas pa'i phyir rtsol ba las byung ba'o zhes sgrub pa'am /
translated: If one proves that it is produced from effort because it is produced,

original: yang na byas pa yin pa'i phyir rtsol ba las ma byung ngo zhes sgrub kyang rung ngo //
analyzed: yang na byas pa yin pa'i phyir rtsol ba las ma byung ngo zhes sgrub kyang rung ngo //
translated: or if one proves that it is not produced from effort because it is produced,

original: de bzhin du rtsol ba las byung ba nyid las yon tan nam yon tan ma yin par sgrub pa yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du rtsol ba las byung ba nyid las yon tan nam yon tan ma yin par sgrub pa yang ngo //
translated: in the same way, one proves that it is a quality or a non-quality from being produced from effort.

original: gal te de lta na ni byas pa'i phyir mi rtag go //
analyzed: gal te de lta na ni byas pa'i phyir mi rtag go //
translated: If that is so, then because it is produced, it is impermanent

original: bdag med do zhes bya ba yang the tshom gyi gtan tshigs su 'gyur te /
analyzed: bdag med do zhes bya ba yang the tshom gyi gtan tshigs su 'gyur te /
translated: and because it is without self, it is a reason for doubt,

original: gnyis ka la yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis ka la yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it exists in both.

original: gal te mi rtag pa dang bral ba'i bdag med pa la byas pa yod bar 'gyur na ni de lta bu nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te mi rtag pa dang bral ba'i bdag med pa la byas pa yod bar 'gyur na ni de lta bu nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If that which is produced were to exist in a self that is without impermanence, it would be just like that.

original: de lta na phan tshun log pa nyid las 'di'i khyad par du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na phan tshun log pa nyid las 'di'i khyad par du 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, it would be a distinguishing feature of this [reason] that it is the opposite of the other [reason].

original: de'i phyir sgra la byas pa nyid mi rtag pa dang bdag med pa la sogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra la byas pa nyid mi rtag pa dang bdag med pa la sogs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, sound is not impermanent because it is produced, nor is it without self because it is produced.

original: 'dir yang gcig lta bu'i dbang du byas nas rig par spyir yang nges pa'i gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang gcig lta bu'i dbang du byas nas rig par spyir yang nges pa'i gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: Here, too, in general, a reason is ascertained by taking the similar instance alone.

original: phan tshun log pa la zhugs na ni the tshom gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun log pa la zhugs na ni the tshom gyi gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: If it engages in the opposite of the other [reason], it is a reason for doubt.

original: rtag pa bkag pa spangs pa'i mi rtag pa nyid gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa bkag pa spangs pa'i mi rtag pa nyid gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no other impermanence that is the negation of permanence.

original: gang rigs mthun mtha' dag las log pa de'i sgo nas bsgrub bya la shes pa 'jug par byed pa de dag ni rigs kyi /🔽'dir gor ma chags par mthun phyogs mtha' dag la yod pa'o zhes pa ni ma yin zhing /
analyzed: gang rigs mthun mtha' dag las log pa de'i sgo nas bsgrub bya la shes pa 'jug par byed pa de dag ni rigs kyi / 'dir gor ma chags par mthun phyogs mtha' dag la yod pa'o zhes pa ni ma yin zhing /
translated: Those that cause the cognition of the probandum through the opposite of all similar instances are of that type.🔽Here, it is not that it definitely exists in all similar instances.

original: thams cad la yod par 'dzin pa yang mi srid do //
analyzed: thams cad la yod par 'dzin pa yang mi srid do //
translated: It is also impossible to apprehend it as existing in all.

original: gtan tshigs la ni rang dang 'brel pa bor nas gzhan du rtags can gyi shes pa bskyed pa'i nus pa yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs la ni rang dang 'brel pa bor nas gzhan du rtags can gyi shes pa bskyed pa'i nus pa yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And a reason does not have the power to generate a cognition of the property of the reason elsewhere, having abandoned its connection.

original: 'dir yang gcig lta bu'i dbang du byas nas rig par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir yang gcig lta bu'i dbang du byas nas rig par bya ste /
translated: Here, too, it should be understood in terms of the example of the first.

original: 'di ltar ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi sgra'i byas pa las rang gis kun nas slong ba'i shes pa mthong ba'i phyir lus kyi rnam par rig byed bzhin rtsol ba las byung ba nyid go bar byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi sgra'i byas pa las rang gis kun nas slong ba'i shes pa mthong ba'i phyir lus kyi rnam par rig byed bzhin rtsol ba las byung ba nyid go bar byed do //
translated: Thus, because of seeing the cognition that is its own instigation in the product of the sound of verbal manifest action, it is understood that it is arisen from effort, like bodily manifest action.

original: de ltar na dang po gnyis yin pas gcig nyid 'dzin pa'i bya ba can yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na dang po gnyis yin pas gcig nyid 'dzin pa'i bya ba can yin no //
translated: Thus, because the first two are the same, they have the activity of apprehending one.

original: der yang ni chos gzhan bstan pa las gyur pa nyid kyi des pa yin gyi /
analyzed: der yang ni chos gzhan bstan pa las gyur pa nyid kyi des pa yin gyi /
translated: And there, too, it is ascertained by the teaching of another property.

original: der ni nyid kyis nges par bskyed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: der ni nyid kyis nges par bskyed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: There, it is not ascertained by itself.

original: spyi dang khyad par gyi chos dag ni rnam par ma bcad pa'i gtan tshigs yin pa'i phyir de nyid chos gzhan nges par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par gyi chos dag ni rnam par ma bcad pa'i gtan tshigs yin pa'i phyir de nyid chos gzhan nges par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: The reason is conclusive when it is a property of the subject and is excluded from the dissimilar instances.🔽For example, when one sees a man standing and walking, one infers a post from the exclusion of the man.

original: gnyis ka'i cha ni gzhan las rnam par bcad nas gang na the tshom yod pa de na gzhan dang @50a * //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i cha ni gzhan las rnam par bcad nas gang na the tshom yod pa de na gzhan dang @50a * //
translated: The reason is conclusive when it is a property of the subject and is excluded from the dissimilar instances.🔽For example, when one sees a man standing and walking, one infers a post from the exclusion of the man.

original: ldan na nges pa'i gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: ldan na nges pa'i gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: The reason is conclusive when it is a property of the subject and is excluded from the dissimilar instances.🔽For example, when one sees a man standing and walking, one infers a post from the exclusion of the man.🔽The reason is conclusive when it is a property of the subject and is excluded from the dissimilar instances.🔽For example, when one sees a man standing and walking, one infers a post from the exclusion of the man.🔽The reason is conclusive when it is a property of the subject and is excluded from the dissimilar instances.

original: 'di ltar 'greng ba dang bya babs pa las mtho yor du rtogs pa mthong ba ni kha yar ba las nges par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang / rang gis kun nas slong ba dang byas pa dag las so zhes bya ba ni sgra rtag par smra ba rnams la'o //🔽de'i phyir 'dir gcig nyid gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'greng ba dang bya babs pa las mtho yor du rtogs pa mthong ba ni kha yar ba las nges par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba dang / rang gis kun nas slong ba dang byas pa dag las so zhes bya ba ni sgra rtag par smra ba rnams la'o // de'i phyir 'dir gcig nyid gzung bar bya'o //
translated: For example, when one sees a man standing and walking, one infers a post from the exclusion of the man.🔽The reason is conclusive when it is a property of the subject and is excluded from the dissimilar instances.🔽For example, when one sees a man standing and walking, one infers a post from the exclusion of the man.🔽The reason is conclusive when it is a property of the subject and is excluded from the dissimilar instances.🔽For example, when one sees a man standing and walking, one infers a post from the exclusion of the man.

original: de ni gang zhugs pa nyid la ltos nas the tshom skyed par byed de /
analyzed: de ni gang zhugs pa nyid la ltos nas the tshom skyed par byed de /
translated: The reason is conclusive when it is a property of the subject and is excluded from the dissimilar instances.🔽For example, when one sees a man standing and walking, one infers a post from the exclusion of the man.🔽The reason is conclusive when it is a property of the subject and is excluded from the dissimilar instances.🔽For example, when one sees a man standing and walking, one infers a post from the exclusion of the man.🔽The reason is conclusive when it is a property of the subject and is excluded from the dissimilar instances.🔽For example, when one sees a man standing and walking, one infers a post from the exclusion of the man.🔽The reason is conclusive when it is a property of the subject and is

original: dper na ci sgra 'di byas pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin rtsol ba las byung ba yin nam /
analyzed: dper na ci sgra 'di byas pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin rtsol ba las byung ba yin nam /
translated: For example, one would say, “Is sound a product, like a pot, and therefore arisen from effort?🔽Or is it not like that, like lightning, etc.?

original: yang na glog la sogs pa bzhin ma yin zhes 'gyur gyi nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin nam zhes sbyor bar byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na glog la sogs pa bzhin ma yin zhes 'gyur gyi nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin nam zhes sbyor bar byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: ” One would not say, “Is it like space, etc.?”

original: 'di ltar byas pa nyid nam mkha' la sogs pa rtag pa nyid las rnam par bcad nas mi rtag pa la the tshom gyi gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar byas pa nyid nam mkha' la sogs pa rtag pa nyid las rnam par bcad nas mi rtag pa la the tshom gyi gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, being a product is a reason for doubt about impermanence, having excluded permanence, etc., from space, etc.

original: don gzhan rnam par bcad pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan gyis yongs su gyur pa'i de la the tshom du gyur pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don gzhan rnam par bcad pa'i gtan tshigs gzhan gyis yongs su gyur pa'i de la the tshom du gyur pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not a reason for doubt about that, having excluded another object by another reason.

original: ma yin par dgag pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma yin par dgag pa la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The same should be applied to negation.

original: gal te 'di rtag pa ma yin la mi rtag pa'o zhes brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te 'di rtag pa ma yin la mi rtag pa'o zhes brjod pa yin te /
translated: If one says, “It is not permanent, but impermanent,”

original: de lta ma yin na bum pa la sogs pa rang rang gi tshig brjod pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na bum pa la sogs pa rang rang gi tshig brjod pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: otherwise, it would be the expression of each individual thing, like a pot, etc.

original: 'di la yang med par dgag pa las khyad par du bsgrub par bya rgyu'i bya ba rtag pa rnam par bkag pa dang sbyar ba yin no zhes brjod par bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la yang med par dgag pa las khyad par du bsgrub par bya rgyu'i bya ba rtag pa rnam par bkag pa dang sbyar ba yin no zhes brjod par bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not to be said that this is a proof that is distinguished from a non-affirming negation, and that it is connected with the negation of the permanence of the action that is to be established.

original: rtag pa zhes ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa zhes ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not said that it is permanent.

original: dper na sgra rtag ste reg bya ma yin pa'i phyir zhes ni ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu 'di la ni the tshom la ltos nas bkag pa yin la snga ma ni bzlog pa la ltos nas yin no //
analyzed: dper na sgra rtag ste reg bya ma yin pa'i phyir zhes ni ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu 'di la ni the tshom la ltos nas bkag pa yin la snga ma ni bzlog pa la ltos nas yin no //
translated: For example, it is not said that sound is permanent because it is not tangible. In this case, the negation is based on doubt, but in the previous case, it is based on the opposite.

original: gang gi tshe rtag par khas mi len pa de'i tshe yang gzhan gyis kun tu brtags pa la ltos nas shin tu mthar gnas pa bkag ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rtag par khas mi len pa de'i tshe yang gzhan gyis kun tu brtags pa la ltos nas shin tu mthar gnas pa bkag ste /
translated: Even when permanence is not accepted, by relying on what is imagined by others, extreme permanence is negated.

original: 'di'i dus na yod bzhin pa'i sngon dang phyi mthar gnas pa ma yin pa la mi rtag pa yin no zhes brjod pa la nyes pa med do //
analyzed: 'di'i dus na yod bzhin pa'i sngon dang phyi mthar gnas pa ma yin pa la mi rtag pa yin no zhes brjod pa la nyes pa med do //
translated: There is no fault in saying that it is impermanent because it does not remain in the beginning and end while existing at this time.

original: gal te 'di ltar lus can ma yin pa'i phyir rtag pa'i zhes bya ba lta bu thams cad du bsgrub par bya ba gnyis ka'i cha la ltos pa rnam pa gsum pa 'di ci ltar rnam par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar lus can ma yin pa'i phyir rtag pa'i zhes bya ba lta bu thams cad du bsgrub par bya ba gnyis ka'i cha la ltos pa rnam pa gsum pa 'di ci ltar rnam par gcod pa'i gtan tshigs yin zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that because it is not physical, it is permanent, like space, then this is a trimodal logical argument that depends on both parts of the proposition.

original: 'di yang gang la ltos pa'i the tshom gyi gtan tshigs de gzhan las rnam par bcad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang gang la ltos pa'i the tshom gyi gtan tshigs de gzhan las rnam par bcad pa yin te /
translated: This is also a logical argument that depends on doubt, because it is eliminated by another.🔽Thus, it is not that doubt arises in regard to space, etc., and karma, etc., because they are both physical and nonphysical.

original: 'di ltar gnyis ka la zhugs pa nyid kyang nam mkha' la sogs pa dang / las la sogs pa la ltos nas the tshom du ma yin gyi @50b rdul phra rab dang bum pa la sogs pa la ltos nas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gnyis ka la zhugs pa nyid kyang nam mkha' la sogs pa dang / las la sogs pa la ltos nas the tshom du ma yin gyi @50b rdul phra rab dang bum pa la sogs pa la ltos nas ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that doubt arises in regard to atoms, pots, etc., because they are both physical and nonphysical.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub bya 'di la chos gzhan lus can las rnam par bcad pa'i gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub bya 'di la chos gzhan lus can las rnam par bcad pa'i gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: Therefore, in this proof, the logical argument is the elimination of other phenomena that are physical.

original: 'di ltar sgra lus can ma yin pa'i phyir bya ba dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba dang / bya ba dang bcas pa'o zhes bya ba lta bu rtag pa dang mi rtag pa thams cad las log pa'i rtags nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar sgra lus can ma yin pa'i phyir bya ba dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba dang / bya ba dang bcas pa'o zhes bya ba lta bu rtag pa dang mi rtag pa thams cad las log pa'i rtags nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: In the same way, because sound is not corporeal, it is devoid of action and it is endowed with action are not reasons that exclude all permanent and impermanent things.

original: 'di ni bsgrub bya gnyis ka'i cha la ltos nas yang dag pa dang / log pa dang / the tshom gyi gtan tshigs so zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni bsgrub bya gnyis ka'i cha la ltos nas yang dag pa dang / log pa dang / the tshom gyi gtan tshigs so zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: It is said that this is a correct reason, a fallacious reason, and a reason of doubt, depending on whether the two parts of the syllogism are true, false, or doubtful.

original: gtan tshigs de'i gzugs brnyan dang bcas pa brjod do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i gzugs brnyan dang bcas pa brjod do //
translated: The author of the Nyayapraveśa has stated the fallacious reasons along with their counterparts.

original: da ni gzhan gyi 'dod pa la dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni gzhan gyi 'dod pa la dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the author will examine the views of others.

original: de la re zhig rtsod pa sgrub pa ni /🔽de mthun med la med pa yi //
analyzed: de la re zhig rtsod pa sgrub pa ni / de mthun med la med pa yi //
translated: In this regard, first, the establishment of a dispute is as follows:

original: chos can rtags shes pa de la //🔽de mthun med med pa pa nyid //
analyzed: chos can rtags shes pa de la // de mthun med med pa pa nyid //
translated: The property of the subject that is not concomitant with the similar instance🔽is the reason for the uncommon syllogism.🔽 The property of the subject that is not concomitant with the dissimilar instance

original: ces sbyor thun mong min rtags 'gyur //
analyzed: ces sbyor thun mong min rtags 'gyur //
translated: is the reason for the uncommon syllogism.🔽 The property of the subject that is not concomitant with either the similar or dissimilar instances🔽is the reason for the uncommon syllogism.

original: gal te re zhig de dang mthun med pa nyid do zhes nges par gzung ba 'di byed pa'i ltar na mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir rtag pa'o zhes bya ba 'di gtan tshigs su thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te re zhig de dang mthun med pa nyid do zhes nges par gzung ba 'di byed pa'i ltar na mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir rtag pa'o zhes bya ba 'di gtan tshigs su thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If, on the other hand, one were to make the determination “it does not exist at all,” then it would follow, absurdly, that the reason would be “because it is audible,” and the conclusion would be “it is permanent.”

original: de ni rtag pa nyid med pa'i bum pa la sogs pa ma mthong bas so //
analyzed: de ni rtag pa nyid med pa'i bum pa la sogs pa ma mthong bas so //
translated: This is because a pot, etc., which is not permanent is not seen to be non-existent.

original: med pa nyid las nges par gzung //
analyzed: med pa nyid las nges par gzung //
translated: The determination of non-existence

original: khyab mnyam 'ba' zhig rtags su 'gyur //
analyzed: khyab mnyam 'ba' zhig rtags su 'gyur //
translated: is only a reason of pervasion.

original: de dang mthun pa med pa kho na la med pa'o zhes _pa 'di la khyab mnyam so sor yod pa'am yin pas /
analyzed: de dang mthun pa med pa kho na la med pa'o zhes _pa 'di la khyab mnyam so sor yod pa'am yin pas /
translated: In the case of “it does not exist at all where there is no existence of the similar instance,” the pervasion is either that the similar instance exists or that it does not exist.

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid rtags su thal ba'i nyes pa ni med mod kyi /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid rtags su thal ba'i nyes pa ni med mod kyi /
translated: Therefore, the fault of the reason being “because it is audible” does not arise.

original: 'on kyang med pa kho na la med pa'o zhes nges par bzung ba de'i phyir khyab mnyam por yod pa kho na gtan tshigs su 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on kyang med pa kho na la med pa'o zhes nges par bzung ba de'i phyir khyab mnyam por yod pa kho na gtan tshigs su 'gyur te /
translated: However, because of the determination “it does not exist at all where there is no existence of the similar instance,” the reason is only a reason of pervasion.

original: de la byas pa kho na mi rtag pa go byed du 'gyur gyi rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ni ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la byas pa kho na mi rtag pa go byed du 'gyur gyi rtsol ba las byung ba nyid ni ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, only that which is produced is the cause for understanding impermanence, but not that which arises from effort.

original: de ni mi rtag pa dang khyab mnyam pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni mi rtag pa dang khyab mnyam pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is produced is not a universal of impermanence,

original: de med pa yang mi rtag pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //🔽de mthun nyid ces 'dod ma yin //
analyzed: de med pa yang mi rtag pa mthong ba'i phyir ro // de mthun nyid ces 'dod ma yin //
translated: because that which is not produced is also seen to be impermanent.

original: ci ste de dang mthun pa nyid //
analyzed: ci ste de dang mthun pa nyid //
translated: It is not asserted that that which is similar to it is impermanent.🔽If it is ascertained that that which is similar to it is impermanent,

original: ces nges par bzung bar byed na de dang mthun pa kho na dang lhan cig tu rgyu bar byas pas na thal bar 'gyur ba snga ma gnyis po med pa ni bden mod kyi /
analyzed: ces nges par bzung bar byed na de dang mthun pa kho na dang lhan cig tu rgyu bar byas pas na thal bar 'gyur ba snga ma gnyis po med pa ni bden mod kyi /
translated: then it is true that the previous two errors do not occur because it is stated that that which is similar to it is impermanent and that which is similar to it alone is concomitant.

original: 'on kyang de lta na ni chos gang bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs dang mthun pa kho na med par mi 'byung ba ni 'gal ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang de lta na ni chos gang bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs dang mthun pa kho na med par mi 'byung ba ni 'gal ba yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: However, in that case, it is not true that there is no contradiction in that which is similar to the class of that which is to be established alone is not produced when it is absent,

original: gcig la'ang rnam pa du ma mthong //
analyzed: gcig la'ang rnam pa du ma mthong //
translated: because even in one thing, many aspects are seen.

original: gtan tshigs gcig la'ang du ma med na mi 'byung bar mthong ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs gcig la'ang du ma med na mi 'byung bar mthong ste /
translated: Even in one reason, many aspects are seen to be not produced when absent.

original: dper na byas pa nyid ni @51a * //
analyzed: dper na byas pa nyid ni @51a * //
translated: For example, that which is produced is seen to be impermanent.

original: mi rtag pa dang bdag med pa la sogs pa med pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang bdag med pa la sogs pa med pa med pa yin no //
translated: Non-existence is not non-existence of impermanence, non-existence of selflessness, and so on.

original: de'i phyir nges par bzung ba gsum ga skyon can yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges par bzung ba gsum ga skyon can yin no //
translated: Therefore, all three of the specified reasons are faulty.

original: yang de dang mthun pa dang lhan cig tu rgyu ba'i gtan tshigs khas blangs nas dpyad bar bya ste /
analyzed: yang de dang mthun pa dang lhan cig tu rgyu ba'i gtan tshigs khas blangs nas dpyad bar bya ste /
translated: Moreover, having accepted the reason that is concomitant with that, it should be analyzed.

original: ci re zhig 'dir ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin mtshan nyid rjod par byed dam /
analyzed: ci re zhig 'dir ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin mtshan nyid rjod par byed dam /
translated: Is it that the characteristic is expressed just as it is taught here,

original: yang na yang dag pa'i don ji ltar yod pa ltar yin /
analyzed: yang na yang dag pa'i don ji ltar yod pa ltar yin /
translated: or is it as it truly exists?

original: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What follows from that?

original: de'i bdag nyid kyis ston zhe na /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyis ston zhe na /
translated: If it is taught by its very nature,

original: gtan tshigs brjod pas nus ma yin //
analyzed: gtan tshigs brjod pas nus ma yin //
translated: the reason cannot be expressed.

original: 'dis ni brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i phyir zhes pa bsgrub bya med na mi 'byung ba nyid du bstan par mi nus so //
analyzed: 'dis ni brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i phyir zhes pa bsgrub bya med na mi 'byung ba nyid du bstan par mi nus so //
translated: This shows that it cannot be demonstrated that the reason “because it arises immediately upon exertion” is a necessary condition for the probandum.

original: ci ste / yang dag don bzhin na /
analyzed: ci ste / yang dag don bzhin na /
translated: If it is as it truly exists,

original: ci ste 'di yang dag pa'i don ji ltar yod pa ltar mtshan nyid rjod par byed do zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste 'di yang dag pa'i don ji ltar yod pa ltar mtshan nyid rjod par byed do zhe na /
translated: if the characteristic is expressed as it truly exists,

original: de lta na yang /
analyzed: de lta na yang /
translated: then in that case,

original: rnam pa gang gis gang la zhes ma brjod //
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis gang la zhes ma brjod //
translated: But you do not say, “By what aspect does it prove what?”

original: gal te gtan tshigs rang nyid kyis ston pa yin na rnam pa gang gis na ji ltar bdag nyid ston par byed de /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs rang nyid kyis ston pa yin na rnam pa gang gis na ji ltar bdag nyid ston par byed de /
translated: If the reason itself is what is to be proved, then by what aspect does it prove itself?

original: gang du yang mthong ba med do //🔽shes par byed las 'das pa bzhin //
analyzed: gang du yang mthong ba med do // shes par byed las 'das pa bzhin //
translated: For it is not seen anywhere.

original: don gyi sgrub byed mthong ma yin //
analyzed: don gyi sgrub byed mthong ma yin //
translated: Just like the object of cognition, the reason is not seen as a means of proof.🔽The object of cognition is not seen as a means of proof.

original: shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyis ma bzung ba'i bdag nyid kyis shes par bya ba'i don shes par byed pa ni med do //
analyzed: shes par byed pa'i gtan tshigs kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyis ma bzung ba'i bdag nyid kyis shes par bya ba'i don shes par byed pa ni med do //
translated: There is no means of knowing the object of cognition by the intrinsic identity of the reason that is the means of knowing.

original: mig gis gzung bya nyid sogs sgra //
analyzed: mig gis gzung bya nyid sogs sgra //
translated: The word “just” in “just as it is apprehended by the eye”

original: mi rtag rtags su thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mi rtag rtags su thal bar 'gyur //
translated: would entail that impermanence is the reason.

original: gal te de'i bdag nyid bzung nas mtshan nyid rjod par byed na ni mig gis gzung bya nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid dang lhan cig tu rgyu ba'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te de'i bdag nyid bzung nas mtshan nyid rjod par byed na ni mig gis gzung bya nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid dang lhan cig tu rgyu ba'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: If the reason is stated by apprehending its intrinsic identity, then “just as it is apprehended by the eye” would entail that impermanence is the reason.

original: gal te gang zhig ma bstan pa'i de gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gang zhig ma bstan pa'i de gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes brjod do zhe na /
translated: If you say, “That which is not taught is not the reason,”

original: ma bstan pa zhes brjod pas de /
analyzed: ma bstan pa zhes brjod pas de /
translated: Since it is said not taught,

original: ji ltar gang la zhes ma brjod //
analyzed: ji ltar gang la zhes ma brjod //
translated: why is it not said not taught to whom?🔽In this way, by saying it is not taught, it is not said that by whom and to whom it is not taught, that is not taught.

original: de ltar du brjod pas ni gang gis ji ltar ma brjod pa de gang la gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur zhes ma smras so //🔽lhan cig rgyu bas bsgrub bya la //
analyzed: de ltar du brjod pas ni gang gis ji ltar ma brjod pa de gang la gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur zhes ma smras so // lhan cig rgyu bas bsgrub bya la //
translated: If it is said that which is not taught to the one who is to be proven by the reason,🔽then it is said that if it is not like that, it is not produced by the reason, and it is said that which is not taught to the one who is to be proven by the reason.

original: ci ste 'di ltar de dang mthun pa med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi sgo nas bsgrub par bya ba la gang ma bstan pa de'i zhes brjod do zhe na /🔽de min dpe gnyis las 'gyur bas //
analyzed: ci ste 'di ltar de dang mthun pa med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi sgo nas bsgrub par bya ba la gang ma bstan pa de'i zhes brjod do zhe na / de min dpe gnyis las 'gyur bas //
translated: If it is said that which is not taught to the one who is to be proven by the reason,🔽then it is said that if it is not like that, it is not produced by the reason, and it is said that which is not taught to the one who is to be proven by the reason.🔽If it is said that which is not taught to the one who is to be proven by the reason,🔽then it is said that if it is not like that, it is not produced by the reason, and it is said that which is not taught to the one who is to be proven by the reason.🔽If it is said that which is not taught to the one who is to be proven by the reason,🔽then it is said that if it is not like that, it is not produced by the reason, and it is said that which is not taught to the one who is to be proven by the reason.🔽If it is said that which is not taught to the one who is to be proven by the reason,

original: de dang mthun pa dang lhan cig tu rgyu ba nyid dang / chos mthun pa'am chos mi mthun pa nyid can gyis phyi rol gyi don nye bar bsdus nas dpe gnyis kyis go bar byed do //
analyzed: de dang mthun pa dang lhan cig tu rgyu ba nyid dang / chos mthun pa'am chos mi mthun pa nyid can gyis phyi rol gyi don nye bar bsdus nas dpe gnyis kyis go bar byed do //
translated: then it is said that if it is not like that, it is not produced by the reason, and it is said that which is not taught to the one who is to be proven by the reason.🔽If it is said that which is not taught to the one who is to be proven by the reason,🔽then it is said that if it is not like that, it is not produced by the reason, and it is said that which is not taught to the one who is to be proven by the reason.

original: ji ltar brjod pa ji lta bu dag gis na dpes 'brel pa nges par ston @51b pa yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar brjod pa ji lta bu dag gis na dpes 'brel pa nges par ston @51b pa yin no zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: If it is said that which is not taught to the one who is to be proven by the reason,🔽then it is said that if it is not like that, it is not produced by the reason, and

original: gang zhig gang gis bsgrub bya la ma bstan pa de zhes brjod pa de la dpyad par bya ste /🔽mi rtag nyid sogs mthong ba ste //
analyzed: gang zhig gang gis bsgrub bya la ma bstan pa de zhes brjod pa de la dpyad par bya ste / mi rtag nyid sogs mthong ba ste //
translated: One should analyze the statement “That which does not teach the probandum . . .”🔽Do others assert that seeing impermanence and so on

original: bsgrub byar gzhan dag 'dod dam ci //
analyzed: bsgrub byar gzhan dag 'dod dam ci //
translated: is the probandum?

original: gal te byas pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyi sgra mi rtag pa nyid du ston par byed na gzhan ci ma grub /
analyzed: gal te byas pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs kyi sgra mi rtag pa nyid du ston par byed na gzhan ci ma grub /
translated: If the reason “because it is produced” teaches that sound is impermanent, then what else is not established?

original: gang grub pa de'i don du yang dper rjod par byed dam /
analyzed: gang grub pa de'i don du yang dper rjod par byed dam /
translated: And for the sake of establishing that, would one also state an example?

original: bsgrub bya gzhan brjod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya gzhan brjod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that one states another probandum.

original: de ltar na gang ma bstan pa de zhes pa las dpe brjod pa de bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i rtags so zhes pa 'di las dpe brjod pa de bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i rtags so zhes pa 'di la /
analyzed: de ltar na gang ma bstan pa de zhes pa las dpe brjod pa de bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i rtags so zhes pa 'di las dpe brjod pa de bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i rtags so zhes pa 'di la /
translated: Thus, in the statement “That which does not teach the probandum . . .,” the statement of the example is a reason that proves the probandum.

original: gal te chos mthun sgrub byed na //
analyzed: gal te chos mthun sgrub byed na //
translated: If the reason is a proof by the method of agreement,

original: cha shas ngag min /
analyzed: cha shas ngag min /
translated: then the part is not the reason.

original: gal te chos mthun pa nyid bsgrub bya sgrub ba'i gtan tshigs yin na yan lag ni gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes 'thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te chos mthun pa nyid bsgrub bya sgrub ba'i gtan tshigs yin na yan lag ni gtan tshigs ma yin no zhes 'thob par 'gyur te /
translated: If the reason is a proof by the method of agreement, then it is established that the part is not the reason.

original: tha dad du 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad du 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are expressed separately.

original: lhan cig tu brjod par 'dod pas ni tha dad pa yin yang tha mi dad du 'jug pa rnams nyid kyir 'gyur te dmag la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: lhan cig tu brjod par 'dod pas ni tha dad pa yin yang tha mi dad du 'jug pa rnams nyid kyir 'gyur te dmag la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: Even though they are separate, they are expressed as if they were not separate, just like an army and so on, because they are desired to be expressed as coexistent.

original: don gyi dam bca' la sogs bas tha mi dad du 'jug pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: don gyi dam bca' la sogs bas tha mi dad du 'jug pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But they are not expressed as if they were not separate from the thesis and so on,

original: don brjod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don brjod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not expressed as the meaning.

original: gzhan yang / lnga pa min /
analyzed: gzhan yang / lnga pa min /
translated: Moreover, the fifth is not so.

original: 'dir lnga pa ni mi 'thob ste /
analyzed: 'dir lnga pa ni mi 'thob ste /
translated: Here, the fifth is not obtained.

original: chos mthun pa'i dper brjod pa nyid bsgrub bya sgrub pa nyid yin na ni de nyid de las gyur pa yang ma yin zhing khyad par du byed pa dang / khyad par du bya ba dag tha dad du rjod par byed pa yang ma mthong bas so //
analyzed: chos mthun pa'i dper brjod pa nyid bsgrub bya sgrub pa nyid yin na ni de nyid de las gyur pa yang ma yin zhing khyad par du byed pa dang / khyad par du bya ba dag tha dad du rjod par byed pa yang ma mthong bas so //
translated: If the example expressing similarity itself were the proof of the probandum, then it would not be that itself, and it is not seen that the differentiator and the differentiated are expressed separately.

original: ngag ces / gal te 'di snyam du gang chos mthun pa las dpe brjod kyi ngag dang phan tshun brgyud pa'i sgo nas yin te /
analyzed: ngag ces / gal te 'di snyam du gang chos mthun pa las dpe brjod kyi ngag dang phan tshun brgyud pa'i sgo nas yin te /
translated: If you think that the statement “from that” is the example expressing similarity, and the statement “it is” is the proof of the probandum, and they are connected through mutual dependence,

original: de bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs yin no zhe na /
translated: then that is the reason proving the probandum.

original: de lta na ni de /
analyzed: de lta na ni de /
translated: In that case,

original: khyad par can du 'gyur /
analyzed: khyad par can du 'gyur /
translated: it would be a special kind of syllogism.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: chos mthun pa'i dpe brjod pa'i ngag dang shes pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir khyad par can du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: chos mthun pa'i dpe brjod pa'i ngag dang shes pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa las byung ba yin pa'i phyir khyad par can du brjod par bya'o //
translated: Because it is a statement, a cognition, a desire, etc., that is similar to a proof.

original: gal te mi bya ste /
analyzed: gal te mi bya ste /
translated: But it is not so,

original: 'di ltar / sgrub byed nyid du mi srid pas //
analyzed: 'di ltar / sgrub byed nyid du mi srid pas //
translated: because it is impossible for it to be a proof.

original: bsgrub bya sgrub ces pa'i ngag las shes pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa mi ston pa de dag ni bsgrub bya sgrub pa ma yin no zhe na /🔽yang ci bsgrub bya sgrub byed du dngos las 'dod dam /
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub ces pa'i ngag las shes pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa mi ston pa de dag ni bsgrub bya sgrub pa ma yin no zhe na / yang ci bsgrub bya sgrub byed du dngos las 'dod dam /
translated: The statement “The proof proves the probandum” does not indicate a cognition, a desire, etc., and those are not proofs of the probandum.

original: yang na brgyud pa las kyang 'dod //
analyzed: yang na brgyud pa las kyang 'dod //
translated: But is a proof of the probandum asserted to be a direct cause or is it asserted to be an indirect cause?

original: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de las cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the consequence of that?

original: gnyis ka gzhan du 'thob par 'gyur //🔽gal te dngos las yin na ni gang nyan pa dang 'brel ba'i dran pa de kho na gtan @52a * //
analyzed: gnyis ka gzhan du 'thob par 'gyur // gal te dngos las yin na ni gang nyan pa dang 'brel ba'i dran pa de kho na gtan @52a * //
translated: Both would be obtained from the other.🔽If it is a direct cause, then whatever is related to the hearer would be the proof.

original: tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: That is the only logical possibility.

original: gal te brgyud pa las yin na yang gang chos mthun pa'i nyan pa'i shes pa de gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te brgyud pa las yin na yang gang chos mthun pa'i nyan pa'i shes pa de gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is from a transmission, then the cognition of the hearer that is similar to the property would be the logical argument.

original: gal te phan tshun brgyud nas bsgrub bya sgrub pa de gtan tshigs yin yang nyan pa'i shes pa la ni thal bar mi 'gyur te /🔽'di ltar / chos mthun gtan tshigs de ma yin //
analyzed: gal te phan tshun brgyud nas bsgrub bya sgrub pa de gtan tshigs yin yang nyan pa'i shes pa la ni thal bar mi 'gyur te / 'di ltar / chos mthun gtan tshigs de ma yin //
translated: If it is a logical argument that is established by mutual transmission, then it would not follow that the cognition of the hearer is the logical argument.🔽Because it is not a logical argument that is similar to the property.

original: ngag de ni chos mthun pa las dper brjod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: ngag de ni chos mthun pa las dper brjod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: That statement is not an example of a logical argument that is similar to the property.

original: ma yin de la'ang skyon gnyis phyir //
analyzed: ma yin de la'ang skyon gnyis phyir //
translated: No, because there are two faults in that.

original: chos mthun pa las dpe brjod pa la yang dngos las yin nam yang na brgyud nas yin zhes 'gyur ba yin pas gnyis ka ltar na yang skyon can yin no //
analyzed: chos mthun pa las dpe brjod pa la yang dngos las yin nam yang na brgyud nas yin zhes 'gyur ba yin pas gnyis ka ltar na yang skyon can yin no //
translated: Even if it is an example of a logical argument that is similar to the property, it would be faulty in both cases, whether it is from the actual or from a transmission.

original: gal te dngos las brjod par 'dod na ni chos dang mthun pa'i shes pa de nyid rtags su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te dngos las brjod par 'dod na ni chos dang mthun pa'i shes pa de nyid rtags su 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is asserted to be from the actual, then that cognition that is similar to the property would be the logical argument.

original: de ni dngos dang brgyud pa las de bsgrub bya sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni dngos dang brgyud pa las de bsgrub bya sgrub pa yin no //
translated: That is the establishment of the probandum from the actual and from a transmission.

original: ci ste brgyud pa las yin na yang gang nyan pa'i shes pa la sogs pa la thal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de nyid do ;
analyzed: ci ste brgyud pa las yin na yang gang nyan pa'i shes pa la sogs pa la thal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de nyid do ;
translated: But if it is through a series, then it would follow that the consciousness of the hearer, etc. would be the same as the occasion.

original: / de lta na yang skabs su bab pa'i phyir bsgrub bya khyad par can du bstan par mi bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: / de lta na yang skabs su bab pa'i phyir bsgrub bya khyad par can du bstan par mi bya'o zhe na /
translated: Even so, it is not taught that the specific probandum is the case, because it is the occasion.

original: gnas skabs de gang yin /
analyzed: gnas skabs de gang yin /
translated: What is that occasion?

original: gnas skabs la yang gzhan mi srid //
analyzed: gnas skabs la yang gzhan mi srid //
translated: And in the case of an occasion, another is not possible.

original: gnas skabs kyi phyogs la yang gang chos mthun pa las dper brjod bstan pa de nyid gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas skabs kyi phyogs la yang gang chos mthun pa las dper brjod bstan pa de nyid gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of a part, that which is taught as an example of a similar property becomes the reason.

original: chos mthun pa'i dper brjod pa ni ma yin no zhes gzhan la yang srid do //
analyzed: chos mthun pa'i dper brjod pa ni ma yin no zhes gzhan la yang srid do //
translated: And it is possible for another, that it is not an example of a similar property.

original: srid du chug chos mthun pa'i ltos pa'i dper brjod yan lag phyi ma bstan pa rnams kyang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srid du chug chos mthun pa'i ltos pa'i dper brjod yan lag phyi ma bstan pa rnams kyang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if it is possible, the later parts of the example of dependence on a similar property would also become the reason.

original: gal te nyes pa de ni med do //
analyzed: gal te nyes pa de ni med do //
translated: If that fault does not exist,

original: dper brjod pa la sogs pa ni gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: dper brjod pa la sogs pa ni gtan tshigs nyid du mi 'gyur te /
translated: the example, etc. would not become the reason itself.

original: rang rang gi mtshan nyid bstan pas gnod pas na'o //
analyzed: rang rang gi mtshan nyid bstan pas gnod pas na'o //
translated: because it is contradicted by the teaching of their individual characteristics.

original: rang rang mtshan nyid kyis gnod phyir //
analyzed: rang rang mtshan nyid kyis gnod phyir //
translated: Because it is contradicted by their individual characteristics,

original: rnam par rtog pa srid ma yin //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa srid ma yin //
translated: it is not possible to imagine them.

original: thob pa rnams kyis gcig la gnod pa bzhin du rnam rtog bsdus pa la yang 'gyur ba'i phyir the tshom du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thob pa rnams kyis gcig la gnod pa bzhin du rnam rtog bsdus pa la yang 'gyur ba'i phyir the tshom du 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as the obtainings contradict one another, so too doubt would arise with regard to the collection of imaginations.

original: de phyir drug par /
analyzed: de phyir drug par /
translated: Therefore, the sixth case

original: chos mthun pa'i dper brjod pa gtan tshigs su zhes drug par 'gyur te /
analyzed: chos mthun pa'i dper brjod pa gtan tshigs su zhes drug par 'gyur te /
translated: is the reason stated as an example with a similar property.

original: dper na gzhan la chos de'i gtan tshigs so zhes pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na gzhan la chos de'i gtan tshigs so zhes pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like saying, “The reason for that property is another.”

original: de lta na yang /
analyzed: de lta na yang /
translated: Even so,

original: the tshom yongs su spangs par 'gyur gyi skyon med pa nyid ni ma yin te /🔽gang gi phyir /
analyzed: the tshom yongs su spangs par 'gyur gyi skyon med pa nyid ni ma yin te / gang gi phyir /
translated: doubt is completely abandoned, but it is not the absence of error.🔽Because

original: de la yang /
analyzed: de la yang /
translated: in that case too,

original: khyad par don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: the distinction would be meaningless.

original: drug par byas nas kyang bsgrub bya sgrub @52b pa smos pa lhag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: drug par byas nas kyang bsgrub bya sgrub @52b pa smos pa lhag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if it is made the sixth case, the probandum would be stated as the proof.

original: gal te khyad par du byas pa'i don de 'gyur gyi chos mthun pa'i ngag thams cad ni gtan tshigs ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par du byas pa'i don de 'gyur gyi chos mthun pa'i ngag thams cad ni gtan tshigs ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the meaning qualified by the qualifier is not the reason in all statements of similarity,

original: ngag kun mi 'dod zhe na gang //
analyzed: ngag kun mi 'dod zhe na gang //
translated: then why do you not accept that all statements are not reasons?

original: 'dod de khyad par can du gyis //
analyzed: 'dod de khyad par can du gyis //
translated: We accept that, but we qualify it.

original: gal te chos mthun ngag thams cad gtan tshigs ma yin na yang gang chos mthun pa'i ngag de nyid gtan tshigs ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te chos mthun ngag thams cad gtan tshigs ma yin na yang gang chos mthun pa'i ngag de nyid gtan tshigs ma yin nam /
translated: If all statements of similarity are not reasons, then is not the statement of similarity itself a reason?

original: don gang dag gi khyad par gyis de khyad par du mi byed /
analyzed: don gang dag gi khyad par gyis de khyad par du mi byed /
translated: What is the meaning that the qualifier does not qualify?

original: gal te 'di ltar khyad par gyi sgra la mi srid pa'i phyir don du rtogs pa'i don la 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar khyad par gyi sgra la mi srid pa'i phyir don du rtogs pa'i don la 'gyur te /
translated: If you say that it is because the word “only” is not possible in this way, then the meaning understood is the meaning.

original: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs su 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang gtan tshigs su 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the thesis and the reason are contradictory.

original: de ltar yang rigs pa ma yin te ;
analyzed: de ltar yang rigs pa ma yin te ;
translated: But that is not logical,

original: gang gi phyir /🔽dgos pa med par dngos kyi ni //🔽sgra don 'das par 'dod ma yin //
analyzed: gang gi phyir / dgos pa med par dngos kyi ni // sgra don 'das par 'dod ma yin //
translated: because🔽the meaning of the actual word is not accepted as passed over without purpose.

original: rgyu mtshan med par dngos kyi sgra'i don la 'das par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan med par dngos kyi sgra'i don la 'das par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not logical to pass over the meaning of the actual word without a reason.

original: de'i phyir chos mthun pa nyid khyad par du bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos mthun pa nyid khyad par du bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the common property is to be specified.

original: don sgra khyad par du bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don sgra khyad par du bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: The meaning is to be specified, not the sound.

original: de ltar khyad par du ma byas pa ni ji lta ba bzhin du mi sgrub pa'i phyir khyad par du bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar khyad par du ma byas pa ni ji lta ba bzhin du mi sgrub pa'i phyir khyad par du bya ba'o //
translated: Since it is not established as it is when not specified in that way, it is to be specified.

original: ci ste bsgrub bya sgrub par byed par smos pa de nyid de khyad par du byas pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste bsgrub bya sgrub par byed par smos pa de nyid de khyad par du byas pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the probandum is stated to be the proof, then that itself is not specified.

original: de khyad par du byas pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de khyad par du byas pa ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not specified.

original: 'di ltar rnam grangs tsam yan lag thams cad bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'gyur bas na bsgrub bya'i khyad par du byed par ni go bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam grangs tsam yan lag thams cad bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa nyid du 'gyur bas na bsgrub bya'i khyad par du byed par ni go bar mi bya'o //
translated: Since the mere enumeration of all the parts would be the proof of the probandum, the probandum is not to be understood as specified.

original: gal te 'di ltar chos mi mthun par sgrub par byed pa las bzlog pa de bzhin du bsgrub bya sgrub par byed par bzung ngo //
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar chos mi mthun par sgrub par byed pa las bzlog pa de bzhin du bsgrub bya sgrub par byed par bzung ngo //
translated: If the probandum is taken to be the proof in the same way as the opposite of the dissimilar example in a negative proof,

original: yang sgrub par mi byed pa 'di ji lta bu zhig gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams te gang chos mthun pa de ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: yang sgrub par mi byed pa 'di ji lta bu zhig gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams te gang chos mthun pa de ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is not right to say that the reason is not established, because the reason is not established in the same way as the thesis.

original: gtan tshigs nyid do zhes brjod par bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid do zhes brjod par bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the reason is not established in a different way, then it is not a reason.

original: de lta bu'i khyad par yang rigs pa ma yin te spyir btang ba la /
analyzed: de lta bu'i khyad par yang rigs pa ma yin te spyir btang ba la /
translated: It is not right to make such a distinction, because

original: dmigs bsal yod par srid ma yin //
analyzed: dmigs bsal yod par srid ma yin //
translated: it is not possible for a general statement to have an exception.

original: gang 'khrul pa la sogs pa'i chos mthun pa dang chos mi mthun pa ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin gyi de gtan tshigs nyid du bral bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang 'khrul pa la sogs pa'i chos mthun pa dang chos mi mthun pa ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yin gyi de gtan tshigs nyid du bral bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
translated: A reason that is similar to or dissimilar from the property of the subject in a mistaken way is a seemingly correct reason, but it is not a correct reason.

original: dmigs kyis bsal ba'i yul la spyir btang ba'i go skabs med pa'i phyir ro //🔽sngar dmigs kyis bsal ba bkod pa la phyis spyir btang ba brtag par bya ba'am /
analyzed: dmigs kyis bsal ba'i yul la spyir btang ba'i go skabs med pa'i phyir ro // sngar dmigs kyis bsal ba bkod pa la phyis spyir btang ba brtag par bya ba'am /
translated: This is because it is not possible for a general statement to apply to an object that is an exception.🔽It is not right to make a general statement after having stated an exception,

original: dmigs kyis bsal ba'i yul la spyir btang ba dgod pa ni ma yin no//
analyzed: dmigs kyis bsal ba'i yul la spyir btang ba dgod pa ni ma yin no//
translated: or to state an exception to a general statement.

original: @53a * // gzhan yang /
analyzed: @53a * // gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover,

original: der snang gis stong chos gzhan dang // mtshungs te gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur //🔽gal te gtan tshigs ltar snang bas stong pas chos mthun pa dang chos mi mthun pa gtan tshigs yin na sgra rtag ste /
analyzed: der snang gis stong chos gzhan dang // mtshungs te gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur // gal te gtan tshigs ltar snang bas stong pas chos mthun pa dang chos mi mthun pa gtan tshigs yin na sgra rtag ste /
translated: It is similar to other phenomena that are empty of the appearance of that, and it is a reason.🔽If a reason is similar to the property of the thesis in being empty of the appearance of a reason, then sound is permanent because it is audible.

original: mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de dpe dang chos mthun pa de dag gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams la mi srid do //
analyzed: mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba de dpe dang chos mthun pa de dag gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams la mi srid do //
translated: That example and the property of the thesis are not possible for apparent reasons.

original: de ni slar sbyor ba'i bum pa la sogs pa'i chos mi mthun pa dang chos gzhan nyid du'ang 'gyur te /🔽de bzhin du sgra rtag ste /
analyzed: de ni slar sbyor ba'i bum pa la sogs pa'i chos mi mthun pa dang chos gzhan nyid du'ang 'gyur te / de bzhin du sgra rtag ste /
translated: That is also a dissimilar example and a different phenomenon from the subject, a pot, and so on.🔽Similarly, sound is permanent because it arises immediately after exertion, like lightning and so on.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i phyir glog la sogs pa bzhin zhes pa chos mi mthun pa yang ngo //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i phyir glog la sogs pa bzhin zhes pa chos mi mthun pa yang ngo //
translated: That is also a dissimilar example.

original: chos mthun pa dang chos mi mthun pa de dag gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams la mi srid do //
analyzed: chos mthun pa dang chos mi mthun pa de dag gtan tshigs ltar snang ba rnams la mi srid do //
translated: Those similar and dissimilar examples are not possible for apparent reasons.

original: gzhan dag ni bsgrub byar sgrub par byed pa nyid du snga mas khyad par du byed do //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni bsgrub byar sgrub par byed pa nyid du snga mas khyad par du byed do //
translated: The other three are distinguished by the first as the means of establishing the probandum.

original: de skad du brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de skad du brjod pa ni /
translated: This is what is said:

original: gang chos mthun pa las dper brjod pa ston pa de bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs yin no //
analyzed: gang chos mthun pa las dper brjod pa ston pa de bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs yin no //
translated: The example that is taught through similarity is the reason that establishes the probandum.

original: gang bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa la sogs pa de dpe la sogs pa'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gang bsgrub par bya ba dang chos mthun pa la sogs pa de dpe la sogs pa'o zhes zer ro //
translated: That which is similar to the probandum and so on is the example and so on.

original: de dag gi ltar na yang drug pa nyid du rig pa'i tshul la the tshom med pa'i don yin zhing /
analyzed: de dag gi ltar na yang drug pa nyid du rig pa'i tshul la the tshom med pa'i don yin zhing /
translated: According to them, the meaning of the sixth is not free from doubt in the Nyāya system.

original: gtan tshigs ltar snang bas stong pa yang gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ltar snang bas stong pa yang gtan tshigs nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And because that which is empty of being a fallacious reason becomes a reason itself,

original: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid du mi rigs so //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid du mi rigs so //
translated: it is not reasonable as a definition of a reason.

original: bye brag pa rnams kyi de dang ldan pa'i chos gtan tshigs so zhes rjod par byed do //
analyzed: bye brag pa rnams kyi de dang ldan pa'i chos gtan tshigs so zhes rjod par byed do //
translated: The Vaiśeṣikas state that a property that possesses that is a reason.

original: 'dir yang gal te de zhes pa'i sgras bsgrub bya brjod pa dang mngon par 'brel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir yang gal te de zhes pa'i sgras bsgrub bya brjod pa dang mngon par 'brel bar 'gyur te /
translated: Here too, if the word that refers to the probandum, then it would be directly related.

original: des bsgrub bya nyid la de dang ldan pa'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des bsgrub bya nyid la de dang ldan pa'o zhes brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: and that which is to be established is said to possess that.

original: de la yang gal te spyi'am yang na chos sam /🔽de ste chos can nyid las 'gyur grang /
analyzed: de la yang gal te spyi'am yang na chos sam / de ste chos can nyid las 'gyur grang /
translated: And in that case, is it a universal, or is it a property,🔽or is it the property-possessor itself?

original: gal te spyi yin na de lta na /
analyzed: gal te spyi yin na de lta na /
translated: If it is a universal, then

original: spyi nyid chos su thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: spyi nyid chos su thal bar 'gyur //
translated: it follows that the universal itself is the property.

original: 'dir sgra mi rtag go zhes bya ba'i spyi la mi rtag pa'i chos nyid do zhes 'di'i gtan tshigs su brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir sgra mi rtag go zhes bya ba'i spyi la mi rtag pa'i chos nyid do zhes 'di'i gtan tshigs su brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, in the statement “Sound is impermanent,” the universal “impermanence” would be stated as the reason.

original: spyi'i chos gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi'i chos gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no other universal of that.

original: rva can yin pa'i phyir rta yin no zhes bya ba 'di la yang bsgrub par bya ba la spyi nyid kyi chos so zhes byas na gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rva can yin pa'i phyir rta yin no zhes bya ba 'di la yang bsgrub par bya ba la spyi nyid kyi chos so zhes byas na gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: And in the statement “It is a horse because it has a horn,” if the universal itself is the property of that which is to be established, then it becomes the reason.

original: ci ste chos yin na ni de'i byas pa nyid la sogs pa mi srid do //
analyzed: ci ste chos yin na ni de'i byas pa nyid la sogs pa mi srid do //
translated: But if it is a property, then its being produced, etc. are impossible.

original: de ste chos can yin na ni de yang mi 'thad de grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ste chos can yin na ni de yang mi 'thad de grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And if it is the property-possessor, that is also not tenable because it is established.

original: mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub bya yin no zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid bsgrub bya yin no zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If impermanence is what is to be established, that is not so.

original: spyi @53b don bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽mi rtag pa nyid kyi sgra zhes sam /
analyzed: spyi @53b don bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ro // mi rtag pa nyid kyi sgra zhes sam /
translated: because the general meaning is the probandum.🔽The word “impermanent” or

original: sgra mi rtag pa nyid do zhes sam /
analyzed: sgra mi rtag pa nyid do zhes sam /
translated: “sound is impermanent” or

original: sgra mi rtag go zhes pa'i spyi'i don de dag ni rnam par bcad pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra mi rtag go zhes pa'i spyi'i don de dag ni rnam par bcad pa'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “sound is impermanent” are the result of exclusion, because the general meaning of those is the probandum.

original: de lta na spyi'i don nyid bsgrub bya yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na spyi'i don nyid bsgrub bya yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: In that case, the general meaning itself would be the probandum.

original: chos dang chos can bsgrub bya min //
analyzed: chos dang chos can bsgrub bya min //
translated: The property and the subject are not the probandum.

original: de dag bsgrub byar mi srid de //
analyzed: de dag bsgrub byar mi srid de //
translated: Those are not possible as the probandum

original: skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the fault.

original: spyi yang ma yin te sngar brjod pa'i skyon nyid do //
analyzed: spyi yang ma yin te sngar brjod pa'i skyon nyid do //
translated: Nor is it a generality, because of the fault already stated.

original: des na sgra'i yon tan du gyur pa nyid ni bsgrub byar 'brel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: des na sgra'i yon tan du gyur pa nyid ni bsgrub byar 'brel bar 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the property of sound becomes the probandum.

original: de la spyi'am chos can nam gzhan la yang gang de dang ldan pa'i chos 'gyur ba med pa'i chos mi rtag pa'o zhes bsgrub byas khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la spyi'am chos can nam gzhan la yang gang de dang ldan pa'i chos 'gyur ba med pa'i chos mi rtag pa'o zhes bsgrub byas khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: In that, the generality, the subject, or another, whatever is the property that possesses it, the impermanent property is the probandum.

original: de nas sgra nyid de dang ldan pa'o zhes gang de'i chos de gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas sgra nyid de dang ldan pa'o zhes gang de'i chos de gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, sound itself is endowed with that. Whatever is the property of that becomes the reason.

original: de'i yang thun mong ba'i dang khyad par gyi bsgrub bya dang ldan pa'i chos su 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i yang thun mong ba'i dang khyad par gyi bsgrub bya dang ldan pa'i chos su 'gyur te /
translated: Also, the common and specific probandum are endowed with the property.

original: khyad par bsgrub bya dang ldan pa'i //
analyzed: khyad par bsgrub bya dang ldan pa'i //
translated: The property endowed with the specific probandum

original: chos 'thob / bsgrub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i chos nyid do zhes nges par bzung bar byed pa ni gang yang med do //
analyzed: chos 'thob / bsgrub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i chos nyid do zhes nges par bzung bar byed pa ni gang yang med do //
translated: is obtained. There is no one who ascertains the property itself as endowed with the probandum.

original: don gyi chos can du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gyi chos can du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would follow that the object is the subject.

original: de ni bsgrub bya dang ldan pa nyid kyi chos so zhes 'brel ba'i phyir de'i chos 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni bsgrub bya dang ldan pa nyid kyi chos so zhes 'brel ba'i phyir de'i chos 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: That is obtained as the property of that, because it is connected as the property endowed with the probandum itself.

original: de lta na yang sgra rtag ste /
analyzed: de lta na yang sgra rtag ste /
translated: Even so, sound is permanent,

original: mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir zhes pa yang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir zhes pa yang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: because it is audible, would also become a reason.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mtshungs pa nyid do zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos mtshungs pa nyid do zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If it is said that it is the sameness of the property of the probandum, that is not so.

original: de'i khyad par du byed pa las gzhan la gnyis su 'jug go zhes pa 'dis thun mong du gzhan la 'jug pa ma yin pa'i phyir mtshungs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i khyad par du byed pa las gzhan la gnyis su 'jug go zhes pa 'dis thun mong du gzhan la 'jug pa ma yin pa'i phyir mtshungs pa ma yin no //
translated: But the word “only” is not used in that way, so it is not similar.

original: mi rtag pa tsam nyid bsgrub par bya ba nyid du yin na sgra gzhan gyi'ang de dang ldan pa la bum pa sogs pa'i chos gtan tshigs su brjod par gyur pa'i phyir mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid kyang gtan tshigs su brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa tsam nyid bsgrub par bya ba nyid du yin na sgra gzhan gyi'ang de dang ldan pa la bum pa sogs pa'i chos gtan tshigs su brjod par gyur pa'i phyir mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid kyang gtan tshigs su brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If impermanence alone were the probandum, then even the property of being perceptible by the eye would be stated as the reason, because a property of a pot, which is possessed by another impermanent thing, would be stated as the reason.

original: gzhan yang ma nges pa ma nges pa zhes bya ba ni the tshom gyi gtan tshigs te /
analyzed: gzhan yang ma nges pa ma nges pa zhes bya ba ni the tshom gyi gtan tshigs te /
translated: Moreover, the statement “uncertain reason” is a reason for doubt.

original: 'khrul pa'i gtan tshigs de yang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //🔽dper na rtag ste /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i gtan tshigs de yang gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro // dper na rtag ste /
translated: That mistaken reason would also be a reason.

original: lus can ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba yang de dang ldan par rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: lus can ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba yang de dang ldan par rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: For example, it would be understood as possessed by sound, like the statement “Sound is permanent, because it is not an object of touch.”

original: rnam pa thams cad du ma 'brel ba nyid do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du ma 'brel ba nyid do //
translated: There is no connection at all.

original: de'i phyir chos mthun pa'i de dang ldan pa ni 'khrul ba'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir chos mthun pa'i de dang ldan pa ni 'khrul ba'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
