translated: Therefore, it should be said that the property of the subject is that which is concomitant with that which is mistaken.

original: de lta na ni de dang ldan pa'i chos dang mthun pa chos mthun pa @54a * //
analyzed: de lta na ni de dang ldan pa'i chos dang mthun pa chos mthun pa @54a * //
translated: If that were so, then the property of the subject would be concomitant with that which is concomitant with it.

original: yin pas chos gzhan spangs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: yin pas chos gzhan spangs par 'gyur te /
translated: But in that case, it would be a different property,

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid dang / 'khrul pa can gyi chos kyi ngag ma 'khrul bar 'gyur ro zhes nges par bzung ba smras pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid dang / 'khrul pa can gyi chos kyi ngag ma 'khrul bar 'gyur ro zhes nges par bzung ba smras pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be ascertained that the property of the subject is the speech of one who is not mistaken, which is concomitant with that which is to be heard, but not mistaken.

original: snga ma la ni ji skad brjod pa'i skyon yod pa yin no //
analyzed: snga ma la ni ji skad brjod pa'i skyon yod pa yin no //
translated: In the former case, the error stated would occur.🔽One would not even set forth

original: mkha' sogs yod nyid bsgrub pa yi //
analyzed: mkha' sogs yod nyid bsgrub pa yi //
translated: a syllogism to prove the existence of space, etc.

original: sbyor ba'ang 'god par mi byed 'gyur //
analyzed: sbyor ba'ang 'god par mi byed 'gyur //
translated: In that case, there would be no property of the subject that is concomitant with the thesis

original: de la ni dam bcas pa dang ldan pa'am /🔽bsgrub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i chos su grub pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la ni dam bcas pa dang ldan pa'am / bsgrub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i chos su grub pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: or that is concomitant with the probandum,

original: chos can ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the subject does not exist.

original: de'i phyir sbyor ba yang ma 'brel bar 'gyur bas na gtan tshigs su mi 'thad pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir sbyor ba yang ma 'brel bar 'gyur bas na gtan tshigs su mi 'thad pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, since the syllogism would be unrelated, it would not be a correct reason.

original: ser skya ba rnams na re gzhan la bstan par bya ba'i don du rnam par ldan pa dang bsal te 'ongs pa'i bye brag gi rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: ser skya ba rnams na re gzhan la bstan par bya ba'i don du rnam par ldan pa dang bsal te 'ongs pa'i bye brag gi rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The followers of Kapila say that there are two types of inference: inference based on identity and inference based on causality, which are for the sake of teaching others.

original: de la rnam par ldan pa'i ngag gi dngos po'i yul rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: de la rnam par ldan pa'i ngag gi dngos po'i yul rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: The object of inference based on identity is a fivefold entity.

original: dam bca' ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: dam bca' ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas so zhes zer ro //
translated: It is said that it is divided into thesis and so on.

original: de yang rnam par ldan pa dang bsal te 'ongs pa'i sbyor ba dag la gzhan par bya ba dang 'brel pa nyid du spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang rnam par ldan pa dang bsal te 'ongs pa'i sbyor ba dag la gzhan par bya ba dang 'brel pa nyid du spyad par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, the statements of inference based on identity and causality should be practiced as being related to the purpose of teaching others.

original: yan lag thams cad ni gtan tshigs nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: yan lag thams cad ni gtan tshigs nyid ma yin te /
translated: Not all parts are reasons,

original: rnam par ldan pa dang bsal te 'ongs pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par ldan pa dang bsal te 'ongs pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are included in inference based on identity and causality.

original: de la re zhig gtso bo yod de bsal ba rnams dang rjes su 'gro ba mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa la ;
analyzed: de la re zhig gtso bo yod de bsal ba rnams dang rjes su 'gro ba mthong ba'i phyir zhes pa la ;
translated: First, the existence of prakriti is established because it is seen to be concomitant with and to follow modifications.

original: gal te 'dir gtso bo'i yod pa nyid bsgrub bya yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'dir gtso bo'i yod pa nyid bsgrub bya yin zhe na /
translated: If the existence of prakriti is the probandum here,

original: de ma yin te /
analyzed: de ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: tshad ma'i yul ma shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshad ma'i yul ma shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object of a valid cognition is not known.

original: spyi'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i yul la rjes su dpag pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan zin to //🔽bsgrub bya'i chos kyang sgrub byed 'gyur //
analyzed: spyi'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i yul la rjes su dpag pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan zin to // bsgrub bya'i chos kyang sgrub byed 'gyur //
translated: It has been shown that there is no inference with regard to an object that is not a universal.🔽The property to be established is also the proof.

original: bsgrub byar gyur pa'i chos sgrub byed du 'gyur ba'i rigs te /
analyzed: bsgrub byar gyur pa'i chos sgrub byed du 'gyur ba'i rigs te /
translated: It is reasonable that the property to be established is the proof,

original: tha dad du gyur pa med pas so //
analyzed: tha dad du gyur pa med pas so //
translated: because there is no difference between them.🔽Otherwise, you should establish the impermanence of sound by “because it is a burner,” since it is not different.

original: de lta ma yin na ni sreg par byed pa yin pa'i phyir zhes pas kyang sgra mi rtag par grub par gyis shig / gzhan yang /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni sreg par byed pa yin pa'i phyir zhes pas kyang sgra mi rtag par grub par gyis shig / gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover,

original: rgyas pa'i ngag yin /
analyzed: rgyas pa'i ngag yin /
translated: it is an extensive statement.

original: ngag rab tu rgyas pa ni sgrub byed kyi gtan tshigs su rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ngag rab tu rgyas pa ni sgrub byed kyi gtan tshigs su rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: An extensive statement is not reasonable as a proof,

original: sgrub par byed pa ni bsdus pa'i ngag yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa ni bsdus pa'i ngag yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because a proof is a concise statement.

original: de yang / brjod ma yin /
analyzed: de yang / brjod ma yin /
translated: And that is not stated.

original: gang bsdus pa'i ngag de yang gtan tshigs su brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang bsdus pa'i ngag de yang gtan tshigs su brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: That concise statement is not stated as a reason,

original: sgrub byed du ni yan lag thams cad brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub byed du ni yan lag thams cad brjod pa yin no //
translated: because all the parts are stated as the proof.

original: der ma bstan pa'i khyad par ni go bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: der ma bstan pa'i khyad par ni go bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: The difference not taught there is not to be understood.

original: dpe yang gal te gang @54b la bsgrub bya sgrub pa la ston par byed pa yin na ni /
analyzed: dpe yang gal te gang @54b la bsgrub bya sgrub pa la ston par byed pa yin na ni /
translated: And if the example is that which causes the establishment of the probandum,

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te 'di ltar /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te 'di ltar /
translated: that is not right, because

original: gtso bo rjes 'gro dang ldan min //
analyzed: gtso bo rjes 'gro dang ldan min //
translated: the primal substance is not concomitant with the effect.

original: shing gi shun lpags la sogs pa la rigs gcig pa dang ldan pa'i gtso bo ni yod pa ma yin no zhes rig par bya'o //
analyzed: shing gi shun lpags la sogs pa la rigs gcig pa dang ldan pa'i gtso bo ni yod pa ma yin no zhes rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the primal substance does not exist in the bark of a tree, etc., as having the same nature.

original: yod du chug na yang ma bstan pa la ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir dpe ltar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: yod du chug na yang ma bstan pa la ni rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir dpe ltar snang ba yin no //
translated: Even if it did exist, it would be a fallacious example because it is not concomitant with what is not taught.

original: de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa'i don gang yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgrub par byed pa'i don gang yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And so there is no point in the proof.

original: brjod par bya ba'i cha shas nyid la ni ngag gi cha shas nyid nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba'i cha shas nyid la ni ngag gi cha shas nyid nyams pa yin no //
translated: And if the part of the expressed is the part of the expression,

original: gal te brjod par bya ba la nyes pa yod pa ma yin pas gang dag de ston par byed pa de dpe yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te brjod par bya ba la nyes pa yod pa ma yin pas gang dag de ston par byed pa de dpe yin no zhe na /
translated: if the expressed has no fault, then that which teaches it is the example.

original: de ma yin te /
analyzed: de ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: de brjod par bya ba nyid skyon dang bcas pa ni ma yin te 'di ltar /
analyzed: de brjod par bya ba nyid skyon dang bcas pa ni ma yin te 'di ltar /
translated: But it is not that the statement itself is faulty, because🔽it is like a simile.

original: rag kyang / ngag yin yang ni dpe la ni de nyid skyon dang bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: rag kyang / ngag yin yang ni dpe la ni de nyid skyon dang bcas pa yin te /
translated: But in a simile, that is faulty,

original: ngag gis shing gi shun lpags la sogs pa la gtso bo de dang rjes su 'gro ba bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngag gis shing gi shun lpags la sogs pa la gtso bo de dang rjes su 'gro ba bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not possible to show that the bark of a tree, etc., is the principal thing that is similar to it.

original: gzhan yang nye bar 'jal mi rigs //
analyzed: gzhan yang nye bar 'jal mi rigs //
translated: Moreover, it is not reasonable to infer.

original: ngag gi dpe la nye bar 'jal bar yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ngag gi dpe la nye bar 'jal bar yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: It is also not reasonable to infer from a simile of speech,

original: ngag ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o zhes gcig tu byas pa'i sbyor ba ni med do //
analyzed: ngag ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o zhes gcig tu byas pa'i sbyor ba ni med do //
translated: because there is no application of the statement, “It should be established just as the speech is.”

original: de bzhin du gtso bo yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la cha shas kyi mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad du 'brel pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du gtso bo yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la cha shas kyi mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad du 'brel pa med pa nyid do //
translated: Similarly, in the proof of the existence of the principal, the definition of a part is completely unrelated.

original: rtsod pa'i sgo'i phyogs ni 'brel pa tsam du 'gyur te /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i sgo'i phyogs ni 'brel pa tsam du 'gyur te /
translated: The position of the door of debate would be merely a relation,

original: rgyu gcig pa nyid tha dad pa rnams kyi bsgrub bya yin no zhes byas nas so //
analyzed: rgyu gcig pa nyid tha dad pa rnams kyi bsgrub bya yin no zhes byas nas so //
translated: because the sameness of cause is the probandum of the different.

original: de la yang dang po nyid /
analyzed: de la yang dang po nyid /
translated: The first of these is as follows.🔽🔽

original: dam bca'i don dang 'gal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dam bca'i don dang 'gal bar 'gyur //
translated: And the first of these is contradictory to the meaning of the thesis.

original: rgyu gcig pa rnams tha dad yin no zhes pa ni shing gi shun lpags la sogs pa tha dad pa nyid la rgyu du ma nyid khas blangs pa'i phyir dam bca' ba 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: rgyu gcig pa rnams tha dad yin no zhes pa ni shing gi shun lpags la sogs pa tha dad pa nyid la rgyu du ma nyid khas blangs pa'i phyir dam bca' ba 'gal ba yin no //
translated: The thesis that “things that are the same cause are different” is contradictory, because the thesis accepts that the bark and so on of a tree are different and that the cause is multiple.

original: khas ma blangs na yang dpe ni yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i nyes pa yin no //
analyzed: khas ma blangs na yang dpe ni yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i nyes pa yin no //
translated: If you do not accept that, then there is the fault that there is no example.

original: ci ste yod pa sngon du song ba can nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi gcig nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste yod pa sngon du song ba can nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi gcig nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: But if you say that the existence of the effect that has already occurred is the object to be proven, not its oneness,

original: 'di nyid kyi'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: and that this is what is taught by the statement “this is the effect of that,”

original: rtsod pa med phyir /
analyzed: rtsod pa med phyir /
translated: then that is not so, because there is no dispute.

original: rtsod pa med pa'i phyir yang 'bras bu'i rgyu yod pa nyid du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rtsod pa med pa'i phyir yang 'bras bu'i rgyu yod pa nyid du ni ma yin te /
translated: There is no dispute about the existence of the cause of the effect,

original: de ltar rtsod pa med pa ni mi rigs pa nyid do //🔽gzhan du ni gcig nyid ma yin zhing /🔽yod tsam ma min /
analyzed: de ltar rtsod pa med pa ni mi rigs pa nyid do // gzhan du ni gcig nyid ma yin zhing / yod tsam ma min /
translated: because it is not logical that there is no dispute about that.🔽But it is not the case that there is no dispute about the mere existence of the effect.

original: yod pa tsam yang bsgrub bya ma yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: yod pa tsam yang bsgrub bya ma yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: And it is not the case that the mere existence of the effect is the object to be proven.

original: bde ba la @55a * //
analyzed: bde ba la @55a * //
translated: In bliss.🔽🔽

original: sogs pa'i rigs dang rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sogs pa'i rigs dang rjes su 'gro ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not concomitant with the class of pleasure, etc.

original: tha dad shing shun las sogs bzhin //
analyzed: tha dad shing shun las sogs bzhin //
translated: because it is different, like the bark of a tree, etc.

original: gal te de'i rigs kyi rgyu gcig pa nyid bsgrub bya'o zhe na de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te de'i rigs kyi rgyu gcig pa nyid bsgrub bya'o zhe na de ni ma yin te /
translated: If you argue that the sameness of cause of the class is to be established, that is not so,

original: tha dad rnams la rigs gcig pa nyid dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad rnams la rigs gcig pa nyid dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no sameness of class for different things and no concomitance.

original: rjes 'gro thams cad sgrub ce na //
analyzed: rjes 'gro thams cad sgrub ce na //
translated: If you argue that all concomitance is to be established,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: dpe med pa'i phyir dang / mi rtag pa nyid dang / 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa'i rjes su song ba'i phyir dang / rnam par ldan pa gzhan rnams la yang ma 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe med pa'i phyir dang / mi rtag pa nyid dang / 'bras bu nyid la sogs pa'i rjes su song ba'i phyir dang / rnam par ldan pa gzhan rnams la yang ma 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no example, because impermanence, being a result, etc., are concomitant, and because the other properties are not related.

original: gtan tshigs la yang skyon gdug pa can ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa rnams nyid yod de /
analyzed: gtan tshigs la yang skyon gdug pa can ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa rnams nyid yod de /
translated: The reason is also faulty, because it is unestablished, contradictory, and indefinite.

original: re zhig ma grub pa ni rigs gcig dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: re zhig ma grub pa ni rigs gcig dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: First, it is unestablished because there is no sameness of class and no concomitance.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: gang gi phyir tha dad rnams 'bras bu gcig pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha dad rnams 'bras bu gcig pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because different things have a single effect,

original: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba can de ltar yang mthong ste /
analyzed: rigs gcig rjes su 'gro ba can de ltar yang mthong ste /
translated: one observes that they are pervaded by a single type.

original: gzhan du 'bras bu gcig pa nyid //
analyzed: gzhan du 'bras bu gcig pa nyid //
translated: But even without a single effect,

original: med par yang 'bras bu gcig pa nyid snying stobs la sogs pa rnams la rjes su 'gro ba las mthong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: med par yang 'bras bu gcig pa nyid snying stobs la sogs pa rnams la rjes su 'gro ba las mthong ngo zhe na /
translated: one observes that a single effect is pervaded by the three gunas, such as sattva, etc.

original: sgra la sogs pa tha mi dad pa'i 'bras bu de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i mig la sogs pa'i shes pa la sogs pa yang yod pa de'i phyir 'di ma nges so //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa tha mi dad pa'i 'bras bu de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i mig la sogs pa'i shes pa la sogs pa yang yod pa de'i phyir 'di ma nges so //
translated: Sound, etc., which are not different, are also the effect of the eye consciousness, etc. of the world. Therefore, this is not a correct reason.

original: de ltar gzhan yang /
analyzed: de ltar gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover,

original: nye bar len pa'ang dar 'gyur //
analyzed: nye bar len pa'ang dar 'gyur //
translated: The appropriator would also arise.

original: nye bar len par gyur pa la yang rgyu'i 'bras bu yin pas de'i rigs su rjes su dpag pa'i rigs te yul du gyur pa'i sgra la sogs pa la ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: nye bar len par gyur pa la yang rgyu'i 'bras bu yin pas de'i rigs su rjes su dpag pa'i rigs te yul du gyur pa'i sgra la sogs pa la ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Since the appropriator is the effect of a cause, it is reasonable to infer that it is of the same type as the cause, but not so for sound, etc., which are objects.

original: ma yin du chug na yang skyes bu la yang yon tan gsum rjes su dpag par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma yin du chug na yang skyes bu la yang yon tan gsum rjes su dpag par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Even if that were so, it would follow that the three qualities would be inferred in a person.

original: rnam par shes pa de ni mthar spro ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa de ni mthar spro ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the result of expansion, etc. is seen in consciousness itself.

original: ci ste phyi rol gyi sgra la sogs par gyur pa la spro ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba yin no zhes brjod par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste phyi rol gyi sgra la sogs par gyur pa la spro ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba yin no zhes brjod par bya'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that the result of expansion, etc. is seen in external sound, etc.,

original: de ni / phyi min gnyis kar skyon yod phyir //
analyzed: de ni / phyi min gnyis kar skyon yod phyir //
translated: that is not so, because there is a fault in both alternatives.

original: spro ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu de ni rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa tha mi dad pa'am tha dad du 'dzin kyang rung ste skyon can no //
analyzed: spro ba la sogs pa'i 'bras bu de ni rna ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa tha mi dad pa'am tha dad du 'dzin kyang rung ste skyon can no //
translated: The result of expansion, etc. is either not different from the operation of the ear, etc. or it is different.

original: gal te tha mi dad du 'dzin na ni rang rang gi yul du mngon par zhen pa la gnod do //
analyzed: gal te tha mi dad du 'dzin na ni rang rang gi yul du mngon par zhen pa la gnod do //
translated: If it is not different, then it contradicts the adherence to one’s own object.

original: de ste tha dad na ni rigs gcig rjes su dpog pa la gnod do //
analyzed: de ste tha dad na ni rigs gcig rjes su dpog pa la gnod do //
translated: If it is different, then it contradicts the inference of a single type.

original: de ni phyi rol gyi sgra la sogs pa rnams kyi 'bras bu ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni phyi rol gyi sgra la sogs pa rnams kyi 'bras bu ma yin te /
translated: It is not the result of external sound, etc.

original: sgra ni 'dus @55b pa las btags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra ni 'dus @55b pa las btags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because sound is designated in dependence on the collection.

original: rnam pa la sogs pa las la sogs par btags pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam pa la sogs pa las la sogs par btags pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the designation of action, etc. in relation to aspect, etc.

original: yang nges par bzung ba'am /
analyzed: yang nges par bzung ba'am /
translated: Moreover, it is not the case that it is definitely ascertained,

original: nges par ma bzung yang rung gnyis ka ltar yang ma yin te /
analyzed: nges par ma bzung yang rung gnyis ka ltar yang ma yin te /
translated: or that it is not definitely ascertained, or that it is both.

original: skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is faulty.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pa de las gcig kho na rigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o zhes nges par gzung bar byed na ni /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pa de las gcig kho na rigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o zhes nges par gzung bar byed na ni /
translated: If it is definitely ascertained that only one of those inferences is the one that is followed,

original: de sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin nyid la gnod do //
analyzed: de sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin nyid la gnod do //
translated: then it is undermined in regard to the very nature of the diversity.

original: ci ste nges par gzung bar mi byed na ni bsal te 'ongs pa gzhan nyid med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ste nges par gzung bar mi byed na ni bsal te 'ongs pa gzhan nyid med par 'gyur te /
translated: But if it is not definitely ascertained, then the exclusion of the other is not established,

original: gnyis ka yang nges par gzung bar ma byas pa'i phyir spyi dang bye brag gnyis re re bsal te 'ongs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka yang nges par gzung bar ma byas pa'i phyir spyi dang bye brag gnyis re re bsal te 'ongs par 'gyur ro //
translated: because neither is definitely ascertained, the general and the particular would be excluded individually and would come to be.

original: de dag ni re zhig ma grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de dag ni re zhig ma grub pa nyid do //
translated: Those are not established at all.

original: rjes su 'gro ba /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba /
translated: Following

original: khas blangs na yang 'gal ba nyid //
analyzed: khas blangs na yang 'gal ba nyid //
translated: Even if accepted, there is contradiction.

original: tha dad pa rnams dang rjes su 'gro ba'i rigs gcig nyid khas blangs kyang gtan tshigs la 'gal ba'i skyon yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: tha dad pa rnams dang rjes su 'gro ba'i rigs gcig nyid khas blangs kyang gtan tshigs la 'gal ba'i skyon yod pa nyid de /
translated: Even if one accepts that there is a single type that is followed by the different, there is still the fault of contradiction in the reason.

original: 'di ltar du ma sngon du song ba can nyid rigs gcig dang ldan par ni ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar du ma sngon du song ba can nyid rigs gcig dang ldan par ni ma mthong ngo //
translated: Thus, we do not see that a single class is preceded by a plurality.

original: de la shing la sogs pa rnams la gcig nyid grub pa ni med la /
analyzed: de la shing la sogs pa rnams la gcig nyid grub pa ni med la /
translated: In this regard, a single entity is not established in trees, etc.

original: de shing gi shun lpags la sogs pa rnams kyi sngon du song ba can yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de shing gi shun lpags la sogs pa rnams kyi sngon du song ba can yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it preceded by the bark, etc. of trees,

original: shing la sogs pa'i nye bar len pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shing la sogs pa'i nye bar len pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the appropriation of trees, etc. exists.

original: khas blangs pa'i gtan tshigs la 'gal ba'i skyon 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad kyi 'di ltar /
analyzed: khas blangs pa'i gtan tshigs la 'gal ba'i skyon 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad kyi 'di ltar /
translated: Not only is there the fault of contradiction in the thesis, but also

original: ma nges par yang 'gyur /
analyzed: ma nges par yang 'gyur /
translated: it is indeterminate.

original: khas blangs kyang shing la sogs pa shing shun la sogs pa rnams kyi sngon du 'gro ba can nyid kyi gtan tshigs la nges pa'i skyon yin no //
analyzed: khas blangs kyang shing la sogs pa shing shun la sogs pa rnams kyi sngon du 'gro ba can nyid kyi gtan tshigs la nges pa'i skyon yin no //
translated: Even if accepted, the fault of indeterminacy is in the thesis that trees, etc. are preceded by the bark, etc. of trees, etc.

original: de lta na ni shing shun dang g-yo mo dang kham phor dang rgyan la sogs pa thams cad bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa dang du ma sngon du 'gro ba can yang yin no //
analyzed: de lta na ni shing shun dang g-yo mo dang kham phor dang rgyan la sogs pa thams cad bde ba la sogs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa dang du ma sngon du 'gro ba can yang yin no //
translated: Thus, all bark, sap, clay, ornaments, etc. would belong to the class of pleasure, etc. and would be preceded by a plurality.

original: de ltar na re zhig gtan tshigs kyi skyon gsum ka'o //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig gtan tshigs kyi skyon gsum ka'o //
translated: Thus, the three faults of the reason are stated.

original: yang gang gi phyir gcig sngon du song ba can gyi tha dad pa rnams so zhes dam bcas pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: yang gang gi phyir gcig sngon du song ba can gyi tha dad pa rnams so zhes dam bcas pa de'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, because of the assertion that the differences are preceded by the one,

original: dpe ni / bsgrub byas 'phangs 'gyur /
analyzed: dpe ni / bsgrub byas 'phangs 'gyur /
translated: the example is inconclusive.

original: thams cad kyi sngon du gtso bo 'gro ba can nyid du khas blang bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: thams cad kyi sngon du gtso bo 'gro ba can nyid du khas blang bar mi bya ste /
translated: The universal principle of priority should not be accepted for all things,

original: shing gi shun lpags la sogs pa'i sngon du shing la sogs pa song bar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: shing gi shun lpags la sogs pa'i sngon du shing la sogs pa song bar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: because the priority of the tree, etc., to the bark, etc., is not established.

original: de yod min /
analyzed: de yod min /
translated: That is not so.

original: dpe de yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dpe de yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: That example does not exist,

original: shing shun la sogs pa rnams tha dad du yod pa'i @56a * //
analyzed: shing shun la sogs pa rnams tha dad du yod pa'i @56a * //
translated: because the bark, etc., are not different from the tree, etc.,

original: phyir dang / de dag ni bsgrub par bya ba ni gcig sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir dang / de dag ni bsgrub par bya ba ni gcig sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because the tree, etc., are to be established as preceded by the one.

original: de bzhin du yan lag lhag ma rnams kyi rnam par ldan pa yang 'brel pa nyid du rigs so zhes rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yan lag lhag ma rnams kyi rnam par ldan pa yang 'brel pa nyid du rigs so zhes rig par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the remaining members should be understood to be related as the case may be.

original: kun gyi rjes thog ma las bsal te 'ongs pa 'grub bo zhes pa la gzhan gyi 'dod pa so sor bkag nas rang gi phyogs yongs su gzung ba'i bya ba ni bsal te 'ongs pa'o zhes grag go //
analyzed: kun gyi rjes thog ma las bsal te 'ongs pa 'grub bo zhes pa la gzhan gyi 'dod pa so sor bkag nas rang gi phyogs yongs su gzung ba'i bya ba ni bsal te 'ongs pa'o zhes grag go //
translated: The activity of completely upholding one's own position is called having come after refuting all others.

original: so sor 'gegs pa'i thabs ni gnyis te /
analyzed: so sor 'gegs pa'i thabs ni gnyis te /
translated: The method of refuting each is twofold:

original: dpe dang 'gal ba dang / khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba zhes so //
analyzed: dpe dang 'gal ba dang / khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba zhes so //
translated: contradicting examples and contradicting assertions.🔽One's own position is not established

original: de la gzhan gyi phyogs bkag pa tsam gyis ni rang gi phyogs ;
analyzed: de la gzhan gyi phyogs bkag pa tsam gyis ni rang gi phyogs ;
translated: merely by refuting the position of others.

original: grub min / gzhan phyogs bkag pa tsam gyis rang gi phyogs grub pa ni mthong ngo //
analyzed: grub min / gzhan phyogs bkag pa tsam gyis rang gi phyogs grub pa ni mthong ngo //
translated: One sees that one's own position is established merely by refuting the position of others.

original: 'di ltar 'dir lus can ma yin pa'i phyir sgra rtag go zhes pa ni ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba tsam gyis gzhan gyi phyogs ma grub par byas mod kyi /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dir lus can ma yin pa'i phyir sgra rtag go zhes pa ni ma nges pa yin no zhes bya ba tsam gyis gzhan gyi phyogs ma grub par byas mod kyi /
translated: Thus, merely by saying, Sound is permanent because it is not corporeal, one has not established the position of others.

original: grub min te rang gi phyogs grub pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: grub min te rang gi phyogs grub pa ma yin no ;
translated: It is not established, that is, one's own position is not established.

original: / de tsam gyi sgra mi rtag pa grub pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: / de tsam gyi sgra mi rtag pa grub pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Merely that is not the establishment of impermanent sound.

original: de la yang ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is not certain.

original: gang du chu klung gang ba la gangs zhu ba la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan so sor bkag pas char 'bab pa'i rgyu mtshan can du rtogs pa 'di ni bkag pa tsam las ma yin te /
analyzed: gang du chu klung gang ba la gangs zhu ba la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan so sor bkag pas char 'bab pa'i rgyu mtshan can du rtogs pa 'di ni bkag pa tsam las ma yin te /
translated: And in that case, the reason for the rain is not understood by the exclusion of each individual reason, such as the melting of snow, etc., for the filling of the river.

original: 'on kyang rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par las yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang rang gi ngo bo'i khyad par las yin no //
translated: But it is not so, because of the particular nature of the reason.

original: de ni gangs zhu ba la sogs pa so sor bkag pas chu klung gang ba nyid khyad par du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni gangs zhu ba la sogs pa so sor bkag pas chu klung gang ba nyid khyad par du byas pa yin no //
translated: For, the filling of the river is distinguished by the exclusion of each individual reason, such as the melting of snow, etc.

original: 'o na char 'bab pa'i 'khrul pa so sor bkag pa tsam gyis thog la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na char 'bab pa'i 'khrul pa so sor bkag pa tsam gyis thog la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Well, by the mere exclusion of the error of rain, the reason for hail, etc., would also be understood.

original: 'di yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not reasonable.

original: gzhan gyi phyogs 'gegs pa'i thabs ni rnam pa gnyis so zhes bya ba 'di la /
analyzed: gzhan gyi phyogs 'gegs pa'i thabs ni rnam pa gnyis so zhes bya ba 'di la /
translated: In this matter, the method of refuting the position of the other is twofold.

original: 'gegs pa'i gtan tshigs gnyis ma yin //
analyzed: 'gegs pa'i gtan tshigs gnyis ma yin //
translated: There is not a second reason for refuting.

original: 'gegs pa ni thabs gnyis 'ba' zhig gi sgo nas ma yin gyi 'di ltar yan lag ma tshang ba'i skyon bstan pa las kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gegs pa ni thabs gnyis 'ba' zhig gi sgo nas ma yin gyi 'di ltar yan lag ma tshang ba'i skyon bstan pa las kyang ma yin no //
translated: The refutation is not by means of the two methods alone, nor is it by means of the demonstration of the fault of incompleteness.

original: de ltar re zhig bsal te 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar re zhig bsal te 'ongs pa'i mtshan nyid rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the characteristic of coming after having been removed is not reasonable.

original: sbyor ba gnyis kyang rigs ma yin //
analyzed: sbyor ba gnyis kyang rigs ma yin //
translated: The two applications are also unreasonable.

original: ji ltar byas nas she na /🔽de la re zhig rjes su 'gro ba bsal te 'ongs pa ni gal te med pa gtan nas 'byung ba'i skye gnas med pa'i phyir tha dad du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dis @56b ni skye gnas sngon du ma song ba can rnams tha mi dad
analyzed: ji ltar byas nas she na / de la re zhig rjes su 'gro ba bsal te 'ongs pa ni gal te med pa gtan nas 'byung ba'i skye gnas med pa'i phyir tha dad du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'dis @56b ni skye gnas sngon du ma song ba can rnams tha mi dad
translated: How is that?

original: pa nyid du dmigs par thal bar 'gyur zhes byas pa yin no //
analyzed: pa nyid du dmigs par thal bar 'gyur zhes byas pa yin no //
translated: Therein, first, the coming after having been removed is, if non-existent, due to the non-existence of origination from non-existence, there would be the consequence of difference. This is saying that those which do not have a prior origination would be observed as non-different.

original: rigs gcig gi rjes su 'gro ba ma dmigs pa yang de las bzlog pa nyid la sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs gcig gi rjes su 'gro ba ma dmigs pa yang de las bzlog pa nyid la sgro 'dogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The non-observation of the subsequent existence of a single type would be the superimposition of just the opposite.

original: de la re zhig skye gnas sngon du song ba can gyi tha mi dad ni 'gal yang 'dod pa ma yin la skye gnas sngon du song ba can rnams kyi rigs gcig gi rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa tsam gyis de phyin ci log tu thal bar 'gyur🔽ba yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la re zhig skye gnas sngon du song ba can gyi tha mi dad ni 'gal yang 'dod pa ma yin la skye gnas sngon du song ba can rnams kyi rigs gcig gi rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa tsam gyis de phyin ci log tu thal bar 'gyur ba yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: First, it is not asserted that the nondifferent ones who have already gone to birth are contradictory. It is not logical that the mere teaching of the one type of lineage of those who have already gone to birth would entail that error.

original: tha dad ma bstan pas rigs gcig gi rjes su 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: tha dad ma bstan pas rigs gcig gi rjes su 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin no //
translated: Also, it does not follow that they are of one type of lineage because they are not taught to be different.

original: gal te nyes pa med de /
analyzed: gal te nyes pa med de /
translated: If you say that there is no fault

original: skye gnas med pa'i phyir nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: skye gnas med pa'i phyir nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod do zhe na /
translated: because it would follow that they would not have birth,

original: de skad du brjod na rigs par ni ma brjod de tha dad rnams la rigs gcig gi rjes su 'gro ba yod pa ma yin pas gang /🔽thal ba brjod pa ni ci yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de skad du brjod na rigs par ni ma brjod de tha dad rnams la rigs gcig gi rjes su 'gro ba yod pa ma yin pas gang / thal ba brjod pa ni ci yang ma yin no //
translated: that is not logical, because it is said that different things do not have one type of lineage.🔽What is the point of stating that consequence?

original: gal te gcig nyid la mtha' gcig tu nges pa 'gegs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gcig nyid la mtha' gcig tu nges pa 'gegs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it refutes the ascertainment of one extreme in one,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: de'i yang ma bstan pas na bzlog pa thob par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i yang ma bstan pas na bzlog pa thob par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: and since that is not taught, the opposite would be established.

original: gcig nyid la mtha' gcig tu nges pa yang skye gnas sngon du ma song ba rnams la ma mthong bas na spyi dang bye brag nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gcig nyid la mtha' gcig tu nges pa yang skye gnas sngon du ma song ba rnams la ma mthong bas na spyi dang bye brag nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: And since it is not seen that a single thing is definitely one, the general and the specific would be established.

original: sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang bsal te 'ongs pa dag kyang tha mi dad du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang bsal te 'ongs pa dag kyang tha mi dad du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And it follows that what is concomitant with the various and what is excluded would be non-different.

original: de la mtha' gcig tu nges pa yod pa ma yin pas tha dad du sbyar bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de la mtha' gcig tu nges pa yod pa ma yin pas tha dad du sbyar bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Since there is no definite singularity in that, it is not to be applied as different.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ma bstan pa tsam gyis de bzlog par thal bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ma bstan pa tsam gyis de bzlog par thal bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not that the opposite is entailed merely by not teaching a reason.

original: bsgrub bya bzlog pa la ni rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya bzlog pa la ni rigs pa yin no //
translated: It is reasonable to reverse the probandum.

original: 'di ltar 'gyur te tha mi dad pa rnams kyi sngon du gcig song ba ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa yin pa'i phyir de las bzlog pa tha dad du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'gyur te tha mi dad pa rnams kyi sngon du gcig song ba ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa yin pa'i phyir de las bzlog pa tha dad du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be like this: Since what is non-different has definitely gone as one before, the opposite of that, difference, would be entailed.

original: de lta na yang /
analyzed: de lta na yang /
translated: Even so,

original: rjes thog ma ni bzlog pa la //
analyzed: rjes thog ma ni bzlog pa la //
translated: The second is the reverse.🔽Even if that were so, the inference of the existence of a single class would be from the second, not from the first. The existence of a single class would be inferred from the second, not from the first.

original: de ltar du gyur na yang rigs gcig pa can rnams kyi sngon du gcig song ba can nyid du rjes su dpog pa la rjes thog ma las med pa sngon du song ba can la sogs pa nyid ni tha dad du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar du gyur na yang rigs gcig pa can rnams kyi sngon du gcig song ba can nyid du rjes su dpog pa la rjes thog ma las med pa sngon du song ba can la sogs pa nyid ni tha dad du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: But that would lead to the undesirable consequence of difference.

original: rjes thog ma las gcig tu song ba can du rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin no //🔽de la yang tha dad du @57a * //
analyzed: rjes thog ma las gcig tu song ba can du rjes su dpag pa ni ma yin no // de la yang tha dad du @57a * //
translated: The inference of the existence of a single class would not be from the second.

original: thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even in that case, there would be the undesirable consequence of difference.

original: brjod pa de ni tha dad rnams rigs gcig gi rjes su 'gro ba can du brjod pa'i phyir 'di rnam par ldan pa las tha dad du dbye bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa de ni tha dad rnams rigs gcig gi rjes su 'gro ba can du brjod pa'i phyir 'di rnam par ldan pa las tha dad du dbye bar bya ba yin no //
translated: That is said because the differences are said to belong to a single class. This should be distinguished from the possession.

original: sbyor ba yang 'di ltar 'thad pa yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba yang 'di ltar 'thad pa yin te /
translated: The application is also tenable in this way.

original: gal te bsal ba nyid gcig las skye ba ma yin na skye gnas med pa'i phyir tha dad du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te bsal ba nyid gcig las skye ba ma yin na skye gnas med pa'i phyir tha dad du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If the manifestation does not arise from a single thing, there would be no origination, and the undesirable consequence of difference would follow,

original: rigs gcig pa can med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rigs gcig pa can med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because there would be no single class. This is the meaning.

original: 'di ltar rigs gcig dang rjes su 'brel ba rnams gcig sngon du 'gro ba can nyid du mthong gi / med pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid du ni ma yin na /
analyzed: 'di ltar rigs gcig dang rjes su 'brel ba rnams gcig sngon du 'gro ba can nyid du mthong gi / med pa sngon du 'gro ba can nyid du ni ma yin na /
translated: Thus, those that are related to a single type are seen to have a single antecedent, not an antecedent that is nonexistent.

original: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba can nyid du yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba can nyid du yang ma yin no //
translated: And they do not have a prior antecedent that is God, etc.

original: rjes thog ma las bsal te 'ongs par smra ba yang /
analyzed: rjes thog ma las bsal te 'ongs par smra ba yang /
translated: The assertion that they come from a prior antecedent that is removed is also untenable.

original: gcig bsal ba la 'di mi rigs //
analyzed: gcig bsal ba la 'di mi rigs //
translated: It is not tenable to remove one and then say that they come from that.

original: de lta bu'i sbyor ba rigs pa ma yin la med pa las skye ba la rjes thog mas gtso bo las skye ba zhes bya ba yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sbyor ba rigs pa ma yin la med pa las skye ba la rjes thog mas gtso bo las skye ba zhes bya ba yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Such a syllogism is not tenable. And it is not tenable to say that what arises from a nonexistent antecedent arises from the primal substance.🔽Moreover,

original: gzhan yang / rnam ldan bzhin du lnga nyid min //
analyzed: gzhan yang / rnam ldan bzhin du lnga nyid min //
translated: They are not five, like the one with parts.

original: bsal te 'ongs pa rnams kyi lnga nyid ni sbyar bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bsal te 'ongs pa rnams kyi lnga nyid ni sbyar bar bya ba yin no //
translated: The five that come from a prior antecedent that is removed are to be applied.

original: de ltar na rjes thog ma'i mtshan nyid las 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na rjes thog ma'i mtshan nyid las 'brel pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, there is no relation that has the characteristic of a prior antecedent.

original: 'di ltar gzhan gyi phyogs thams cad bkag pas kun gyi rjes thog ma las gcig nyid bsal te 'ongs pa'o zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan gyi phyogs thams cad bkag pas kun gyi rjes thog ma las gcig nyid bsal te 'ongs pa'o zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, since all other positions have been refuted, it follows that one should apply the term “truly existent” to the one remaining position.🔽

original: rgol ba re re bkag pa las //
analyzed: rgol ba re re bkag pa las //
translated: Thus, since all the positions of the opponent have been refuted, it is said that “only one remains, the position of the challenger.”

original: gal te rjes thog mar 'dod na //🔽rgol ba'i lan la mtha' med nyid //
analyzed: gal te rjes thog mar 'dod na // rgol ba'i lan la mtha' med nyid //
translated: If you accept the last one,🔽then there is no end to the opponent’s replies.

original: bsal 'ongs rnams su thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bsal 'ongs rnams su thal bar 'gyur //
translated: It follows that there is no proof.

original: zhes bya ba bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is an intermediate verse.🔽Therefore, the definition of a proof is not established.

original: de'i phyir sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid mngon par ma 'brel to zhes bya ba de dag gis ni grangs can rnams kyi gtan tshigs mi rigs pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /🔽rnam par ldan pa dang bsal te 'ongs pa yang ngo zhes brjod do //🔽gtan tshigs brjod nas gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid mngon par ma 'brel to zhes bya ba de dag gis ni grangs can rnams kyi gtan tshigs mi rigs pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / rnam par ldan pa dang bsal te 'ongs pa yang ngo zhes brjod do // gtan tshigs brjod nas gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dpyad par bya ste /
translated: The Enumerators’ reason is not only illogical, but it is also indeterminate and unproven.🔽Having stated the reason, we will now analyze the fallacious reasons.

original: de la re zhig rtsod pa sgrub pa nas ;
analyzed: de la re zhig rtsod pa sgrub pa nas ;
translated: In this regard, first, we will analyze the fallacious reasons that are stated in a debate.

original: ma grub pa dang ma nges dang // 'gal ba'i don ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa dang ma nges dang // 'gal ba'i don ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'o zhes zer ro //
translated: The reason is fallacious if it is unestablished, inconclusive, or contradictory.

original: de la ma grub pa la sogs pa ni dper ni brjod na mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la ma grub pa la sogs pa ni dper ni brjod na mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: An example is not a reason, even though it may be unestablished, inconclusive, or contradictory.

original: dper na mig gi gzung bya yin pa'i phyir mi rtag go zhes bya ba ma grub pa dang / lus can ma yin pa'i phyir rtag go @57b zhes bya ba ma nges pa dang / bye brag pa rnams kyi dbang po las byung ba'i phyir mi rtag go zhes bya ba 'gal ba gcig dang /
analyzed: dper na mig gi gzung bya yin pa'i phyir mi rtag go zhes bya ba ma grub pa dang / lus can ma yin pa'i phyir rtag go @57b zhes bya ba ma nges pa dang / bye brag pa rnams kyi dbang po las byung ba'i phyir mi rtag go zhes bya ba 'gal ba gcig dang /
translated: For example, “The eye is impermanent because it is an object of apprehension,” is unestablished. “ It is permanent because it is not corporeal,” is inconclusive. “ It is impermanent because it is derived from the elements according to the Vaiśeṣikas,” is contradictory.

original: grangs can pa'i rgyu la 'bras bu yod pa yin te /
analyzed: grangs can pa'i rgyu la 'bras bu yod pa yin te /
translated: “ The effect exists in the cause,

original: yod pa skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'gal ba gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: yod pa skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'gal ba gnyis pa'o //
translated: because that which exists is produced,” is contradictory.

original: de la yang /
analyzed: de la yang /
translated: And here:

original: ma grub dbye ba brjod ma yin //
analyzed: ma grub dbye ba brjod ma yin //
translated: The unestablished is not mentioned as a division.

original: de ni phyogs gcig la rab tu ma grub pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba rnam pa du ma yod pa ma bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni phyogs gcig la rab tu ma grub pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba rnam pa du ma yod pa ma bstan pa yin no //
translated: The unestablished is not taught as a division of the fallacious reason in one part.

original: 'khrul pa la yang brjod ma yin //
analyzed: 'khrul pa la yang brjod ma yin //
translated: Nor is error mentioned.

original: dbye ba ma brjod do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //🔽de ni thun mong min pa'ang yod //
analyzed: dbye ba ma brjod do zhes bya bar 'gyur ro // de ni thun mong min pa'ang yod //
translated: But it is not mentioned in the treatise.🔽There is also a non-common pervasion.

original: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can yang //
analyzed: 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can yang //
translated: There is also a contradictory pervasion.

original: kho bo cag gis ji lta ba bzhin du brjod do ;
analyzed: kho bo cag gis ji lta ba bzhin du brjod do ;
translated: We have stated it as it is.

original: /'gal ba gcig ni mtshungs pa ru brjod do //
analyzed: /'gal ba gcig ni mtshungs pa ru brjod do //
translated: One contradictory pervasion is stated as a similar pervasion.

original: bye brag pa'i spyi dbang po las byung ba rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa gnyis ka la mthong ba'i phyir 'di ma nges pa nyid yin gyi 'gal ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bye brag pa'i spyi dbang po las byung ba rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa gnyis ka la mthong ba'i phyir 'di ma nges pa nyid yin gyi 'gal ba ni ma yin no //
translated: The Vaiśeṣika’s thesis that the universal arises from the sense faculty is indeterminate because it is seen in both permanent and impermanent things, but it is not contradictory.

original: gcig ni ma grub thun mong min //
analyzed: gcig ni ma grub thun mong min //
translated: One non-established pervasion is not common.

original: 'gal ba gnyis pa ni /
analyzed: 'gal ba gnyis pa ni /
translated: The second contradictory pervasion is

original: ma grub pa dang thun mong ma yin pa de /
analyzed: ma grub pa dang thun mong ma yin pa de /
translated: the non-established and uncommon pervasion.

original: gang gi phyir 'di ltar sngar skyes pa las skye zhing 'byung ba na yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ltar sngar skyes pa las skye zhing 'byung ba na yod pa ma yin la /
translated: Because it is like this: when something arises and occurs from what has already arisen, it does not exist.

original: thams cad kyang sngar skyes pa las yod par sgrub pa ni yin zhing /
analyzed: thams cad kyang sngar skyes pa las yod par sgrub pa ni yin zhing /
translated: And everything is established as existing from what has already arisen.

original: sngar skyes pa las skye zhing 'byung ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: sngar skyes pa las skye zhing 'byung ba yang ma yin no //
translated: But it does not arise and occur from what has already arisen.

original: khas blangs na yang de kho na la yod pa yin no//
analyzed: khas blangs na yang de kho na la yod pa yin no//
translated: If you accept that, then it exists only in that.

original: 'di 'gal ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di 'gal ba ni ma yin te /
translated: This is not contradictory,

original: bzlog pa mi bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzlog pa mi bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the opposite is not established.

original: bzlog pa yi ni rgyu mtshan dang // 'dod la gnod byed kyang ma brjod //
analyzed: bzlog pa yi ni rgyu mtshan dang // 'dod la gnod byed kyang ma brjod //
translated: The reason for the opposite and the refutation of the thesis are not stated.

original: de bas na nyung bar snang ste /
analyzed: de bas na nyung bar snang ste /
translated: Therefore, it appears to be incomplete.

original: de dag nyid kyi khongs su bsdu bar yang mi nus la gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin te zhes kyang brjod par mi nus te /
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi khongs su bsdu bar yang mi nus la gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin te zhes kyang brjod par mi nus te /
translated: It cannot be included in those, and it cannot be said to be not a fallacious reason,

original: bzlog pa dang gnod par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzlog pa dang gnod par byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is a reason that refutes the opposite.

original: rigs pa can rnams ni 'khrul pa dang bcas pa dang / 'gal ba dang skabs dang mtshungs pa dang / bsgrub bya dang mtshungs pa dang / dus las 'das pa rnams ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: rigs pa can rnams ni 'khrul pa dang bcas pa dang / 'gal ba dang skabs dang mtshungs pa dang / bsgrub bya dang mtshungs pa dang / dus las 'das pa rnams ni gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'o zhes zer ro //
translated: The Naiyāyikas say that fallacious reasons are those that are inconclusive, contradictory, irrelevant, the same as the probandum, and untimely.

original: de la 'khrul pa dang bcas pa ni ma nges pa ste /
analyzed: de la 'khrul pa dang bcas pa ni ma nges pa ste /
translated: Among those, the inconclusive is the uncertain.

original: de ltar na khyad par yod min //
analyzed: de ltar na khyad par yod min //
translated: Thus, there is no distinction.

original: gang la ma nges pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang la ma nges pa yin zhe na /
translated: In what way is it uncertain?

original: gzhan las khyad par ram /
analyzed: gzhan las khyad par ram /
translated: nor is it a particular of something else.

original: skabs su babs pa na yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skabs su babs pa na yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it a universal that exists in some cases and not in others,

original: sgra'i spyi dang bye brag la yod pa ni gnyis ka'i yon tan no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //🔽ci ste 'di ltar spyi @58a * //
analyzed: sgra'i spyi dang bye brag la yod pa ni gnyis ka'i yon tan no zhes bya ba lta bu'o // ci ste 'di ltar spyi @58a * //
translated: like the statement, “The universal of sound and the particular of sound are the quality of both.”

original: 'di ni sgra ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni sgra ma yin te /
translated: If you say that the universal of sound is not a sound,🔽because it is the negation of a particular sound,

original: gcig tu nges pa 'gegs pa yin pa'i phyir dang / gang de ni bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gcig tu nges pa 'gegs pa yin pa'i phyir dang / gang de ni bsgrub par bya ba'i rigs nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: then it would be the probandum,

original: de yang 'di gcig tu nges pa 'gegs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de yang 'di gcig tu nges pa 'gegs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: and it would be the negation of a particular.

original: 'di ltar na yang khyad par yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar na yang khyad par yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Even so, there is no difference,

original: de lta na yang bsgrub bya med pa dang ; de las gzhan pa dang / de dang 'gal ba la yang 'jug par don gyis go bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta na yang bsgrub bya med pa dang ; de las gzhan pa dang / de dang 'gal ba la yang 'jug par don gyis go bar rig par bya'o //
translated: because in that case, the negation of the probandum, something other than that, and that which is incompatible with that are understood implicitly.

original: rnam pa thams cad du 'khrul pa can ma yin no zhes sngar brjod do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du 'khrul pa can ma yin no zhes sngar brjod do //
translated: We have already said that it is not a delusion in any way.

original: grub pa'i mtha' khas blangs na ni de dang 'gal ba yin pas 'gal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' khas blangs na ni de dang 'gal ba yin pas 'gal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If you accept a philosophical tenet, then it is incompatible, because it is incompatible with that.

original: dper na bye brag pa'i lus can ma yin pa'i phyir rtsom par byed pa ma yin te rdul phra rab rnams bzhin zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na bye brag pa'i lus can ma yin pa'i phyir rtsom par byed pa ma yin te rdul phra rab rnams bzhin zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, “The creator is not embodied because of being a particular, like the most subtle particles.”

original: de bzhin du brtag par bya ba la grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal bas brjod par bya ba ni sgrub pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du brtag par bya ba la grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal bas brjod par bya ba ni sgrub pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro //
translated: Similarly, in the case of the object of inquiry, the thesis is faulty because it contradicts tenets.

original: 'gal ba gzhan yang 'thob ste /🔽gtan tshigs ltar snang ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'di la ni lus can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ma grub pa'i don la gtan tshigs kyi skyon dang rtsom bar byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i skyon yang yin te /
analyzed: 'gal ba gzhan yang 'thob ste / gtan tshigs ltar snang ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi 'di la ni lus can yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ma grub pa'i don la gtan tshigs kyi skyon dang rtsom bar byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba dam bca' ba'i skyon yang yin te /
translated: One also obtains another contradiction.

original: sngar khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //🔽ci ste yang de ma grub pa nyid dang 'gal ba nyid gnyis kar 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: sngar khas blangs pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro // ci ste yang de ma grub pa nyid dang 'gal ba nyid gnyis kar 'gyur na ni /
translated: Not only is the reason fallacious, but also the thesis is faulty, because the meaning of “embodied” is unestablished, and because of the contradiction with what was previously asserted.🔽If it is both unestablished and contradictory,

original: dam bca' ba'i skyon dang 'gal ba nyid dag yin te /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i skyon dang 'gal ba nyid dag yin te /
translated: then the thesis is faulty and contradictory.

original: sbyor ba la ni de gnyis ka cig car du 'gal bar 'gyur la de yang cig shos kyi byed pa po la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: sbyor ba la ni de gnyis ka cig car du 'gal bar 'gyur la de yang cig shos kyi byed pa po la skur pa 'debs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: In the syllogism, both are contradictory at the same time, and that is a denial of the agent of the other.

original: de lta bur gyur la rag mod /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur la rag mod /
translated: Even if that were so,

original: gal te byed pa po'i sbyor ba bzhin du 'di'i chos gzhan 'gal ba nyid kyis ston par byed na ni der yang ma grub pa nyid du brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gal te byed pa po'i sbyor ba bzhin du 'di'i chos gzhan 'gal ba nyid kyis ston par byed na ni der yang ma grub pa nyid du brjod par bya ste /
translated: if the other were to show that the property of this is contradictory like the application of the agent, then there also it should be stated that it is not established.

original: dam bca' ba'i skyon yang /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i skyon yang /
translated: The fault of the thesis is

original: de bzhin min /
analyzed: de bzhin min /
translated: not like that.

original: der grub pa'i mtha' las ma grub pa'i don nyid bzhag nas phyogs dang 'gal ba'i skyon gzhan nyid gcig ni brjod du med do //
analyzed: der grub pa'i mtha' las ma grub pa'i don nyid bzhag nas phyogs dang 'gal ba'i skyon gzhan nyid gcig ni brjod du med do //
translated: In that, having posited the meaning of nonestablishment in the tenets, another fault of contradiction with the position is not to be stated.

original: byed pa po la chos gzhan rang dbang can dang gzhan dbang la sogs pa las yin pas 'gal ba la sogs pa med pa cig shos kyi sbyor ba ni dper na mda' bsnun no 'di'i bsnun no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: byed pa po la chos gzhan rang dbang can dang gzhan dbang la sogs pa las yin pas 'gal ba la sogs pa med pa cig shos kyi sbyor ba ni dper na mda' bsnun no 'di'i bsnun no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: The application of the other is like, for example, “the wielder of the arrow” and “the one who is wounded by this.”

original: gang 'di la grangs can gyis ni 'di skad du brjod do //
analyzed: gang 'di la grangs can gyis ni 'di skad du brjod do //
translated: The Sāṃkhya here says this:

original: gtso bo ni rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: gtso bo ni rgyu ma yin te /
translated: The primal substance is not the cause,

original: sems pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: sems pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: because it is not an agent.

original: de la yang @58b bsal ba ni gtso bo las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba'i ma nges pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de la yang @58b bsal ba ni gtso bo las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa'o zhes bya ba'i ma nges pa nyid yin no //
translated: Here, the rebuttal is that it is not ascertained that the primal substance is not the cause because it is not an agent, since it is not the case that the primal substance is not the cause because it is not an agent.

original: tha dad las gzhan nyid du rjod par byed na ni 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur na 'on kyang /
analyzed: tha dad las gzhan nyid du rjod par byed na ni 'gal ba nyid du 'gyur na 'on kyang /
translated: If it is said that it is different from that, then it would be contradictory.

original: de bzhin min /
analyzed: de bzhin min /
translated: But it is not like that.

original: de ni kho na zhig sgrub pa'i 'gal ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: de ni kho na zhig sgrub pa'i 'gal ba nyid yin te /
translated: That is just a contradiction in the proof,

original: bzlog pa sgrub par byed ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzlog pa sgrub par byed ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it proves the opposite.

original: grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba'i phyir zhes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba'i phyir zhes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not because it contradicts the tenets.

original: gang la skabs su bab pa de gtan la dbab pa'i phyir nye bar 'god pa ni skabs dang mtshungs pa ste /
analyzed: gang la skabs su bab pa de gtan la dbab pa'i phyir nye bar 'god pa ni skabs dang mtshungs pa ste /
translated: The context is the same when something is presented in order to determine what is relevant.

original: dper na bdag ni rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: dper na bdag ni rtag pa yin te /
translated: For example, it is like saying, “The self is permanent,

original: lus las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: lus las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: because it is not different from the body.”

original: 'dir yang lus las gzhan ma yin pa nyid las bdag spyod pa ni ma yin te 'di ltar /
analyzed: 'dir yang lus las gzhan ma yin pa nyid las bdag spyod pa ni ma yin te 'di ltar /
translated: Here also, the self is not the experiencer because it is not different from the body, because it is not different from the body.

original: ma nges par 'gyur /🔽gang gi phyir 'di ltar rtag pa nam mkha' la sogs pa dang / mi rtag pa bum pa la sogs pa gnyis ka la lus las gzhan ma yin pa nyid mthong ba de'i phyir ci 'di rtag pa yin nam /
analyzed: ma nges par 'gyur / gang gi phyir 'di ltar rtag pa nam mkha' la sogs pa dang / mi rtag pa bum pa la sogs pa gnyis ka la lus las gzhan ma yin pa nyid mthong ba de'i phyir ci 'di rtag pa yin nam /
translated: It is not different from the unestablished.

original: 'on te mi rtag pa yin zhes dpyod par byed do //
analyzed: 'on te mi rtag pa yin zhes dpyod par byed do //
translated: Because both the permanent, such as space, and the impermanent, such as a pot, are seen to be not different from the body, therefore one analyzes, “Is this permanent or is it impermanent?”

original: de'i phyir 'di ma nges pa las tha dad du bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ma nges pa las tha dad du bya ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not different from the unestablished.

original: bsgrub bya dang khyad par med pas sgrub pa'i phyir bsgrub bya dang mtshungs pa ste /
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang khyad par med pas sgrub pa'i phyir bsgrub bya dang mtshungs pa ste /
translated: Because it proves what is to be proven, it is the same as what is to be proven.

original: dper na sgra rtag ste reg par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir blo bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na sgra rtag ste reg par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir blo bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, “Sound is permanent because it is not touchable, like the intellect.”

original: 'dir yang sgra la reg par bya ba ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs grub pa'i phyir /🔽ma grub min /
analyzed: 'dir yang sgra la reg par bya ba ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs grub pa'i phyir / ma grub min /
translated: Here also, because the reason “not touchable” is established for sound,🔽it is not unestablished.

original: gang der gtan tshigs ma grub pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang der gtan tshigs ma grub pa ni ma yin no //
translated: That is not unestablished as a reason.

original: gang las bsgrub bya dang khyad par med pa nyid kyis bsgrub bya dang mtshungs par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang las bsgrub bya dang khyad par med pa nyid kyis bsgrub bya dang mtshungs par 'gyur /
translated: Because it is not different from the probandum, it is the same as the probandum.

original: 'on kyang 'dir dpe bsgrub bya dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'dir dpe bsgrub bya dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: But here the example is the same as the probandum.

original: gzhan du rtog par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan du rtog par byed de /
translated: Others imagine it differently.

original: dpe gang la bsgrub byas khyad par du ma byas pa'i gtan tshigs de bsgrub bya dang khyad par med pa yin no zhes yang dag par brtag dpyad byed pa ni gzhi mthun pa rnams 'bru mang po pa'o //
analyzed: dpe gang la bsgrub byas khyad par du ma byas pa'i gtan tshigs de bsgrub bya dang khyad par med pa yin no zhes yang dag par brtag dpyad byed pa ni gzhi mthun pa rnams 'bru mang po pa'o //
translated: They imagine that the reason is not different from the probandum when the example is not specified by the probandum.

original: thams cad du ni 'thob pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad du ni 'thob pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not obtained in all cases.

original: khas blangs nas kyang gtan tshigs ma grub pa ste /
analyzed: khas blangs nas kyang gtan tshigs ma grub pa ste /
translated: Even if it is accepted, the reason is not established.

original: 'di bsgrub bya dang khyad par med pa'i dpe ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di bsgrub bya dang khyad par med pa'i dpe ni ma yin no //
translated: This is not an example of the reason not being different from the probandum.

original: 'on kyang 'di ltar ngag 'dus pa la yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di ltar ngag 'dus pa la yin no //
translated: But it is like this in the case of a verbal collection.

original: de'i phyir ma grub pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yang yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma grub pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba yang yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not only unestablished, but also a seemingly correct reason.🔽If you say that,

original: de ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar zhe na /
translated: then what?

original: chos gang gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar bstan pa de chos can la ma grub pa'am /
analyzed: chos gang gtan tshigs nyid du nye bar bstan pa de chos can la ma grub pa'am /
translated: The reason is not established with respect to the subject,

original: @59a * // rgol ba dang cig shos las ma grub pa'am /
analyzed: @59a * // rgol ba dang cig shos las ma grub pa'am /
translated: or it is not established for one or the other of the two parties in the debate,

original: the tshom za na yang ngo //
analyzed: the tshom za na yang ngo //
translated: or it is doubtful.

original: dus las nur nas brjod pa ni dus las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: dus las nur nas brjod pa ni dus las 'das pa ste /
translated: The time has passed for stating it, if one states it after the proper time has passed.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag ste /
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag ste /
translated: For example, it is like stating, “Sound is impermanent,

original: bum pa bzhin no zhes brjod pa la gtan tshigs ma brjod do zhes smras pa dang byas pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: bum pa bzhin no zhes brjod pa la gtan tshigs ma brjod do zhes smras pa dang byas pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa lta bu'o //
translated: because of being a product,” and then stating, “The reason has not been stated.”

original: 'di yang ma tshang ba brjod pa'am /
analyzed: 'di yang ma tshang ba brjod pa'am /
translated: This is also a case of stating an incomplete reason,🔽or it is a case of stating it later in order to clarify the meaning.

original: nges par bya ba'i don du phyis rjod par byed pa yin yang rung phyis gnyis ka yang gtan tshigs ltar snang bar mi sbyor ro //
analyzed: nges par bya ba'i don du phyis rjod par byed pa yin yang rung phyis gnyis ka yang gtan tshigs ltar snang bar mi sbyor ro //
translated: But in either case, it is not connected as a reason.

original: ci'i phyir ma tshang ba bsgrub bya grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ci'i phyir ma tshang ba bsgrub bya grub pa'i phyir /
translated: Why? Because the incomplete reason establishes the probandum.

original: gal te re zhig ma tshang ba brjod pa ltar na ni de nyung ba yin pa'i phyir ma tshang ba yin pas yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te re zhig ma tshang ba brjod pa ltar na ni de nyung ba yin pa'i phyir ma tshang ba yin pas yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin no //
translated: If it is said that it is incomplete because it is not complete at first, then it is not a fallacious reason because it is not existent, since it is incomplete because it is deficient.

original: gal te nges par bya ba'i don du phyis rjod par byed na ni de lta na gtan tshigs kyi ma tshan nyid du 'thad pa nyid kyis bsgrub bya grub pa yin gyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te nges par bya ba'i don du phyis rjod par byed na ni de lta na gtan tshigs kyi ma tshan nyid du 'thad pa nyid kyis bsgrub bya grub pa yin gyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin no //
translated: If it is stated later in order to make it certain, then it is not a fallacious reason because it is tenable as a part of the reason, and the probandum is established.

original: gtan tshigs kyi gnas su yod bzhin pa de gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir 'di gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi gnas su yod bzhin pa de gtan tshigs ltar snang ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir 'di gtan tshigs ltar snang ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: It is not a fallacious reason because it is not the definition of a fallacious reason that exists in the locus of the reason.

original: bye brag pa rnams kyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ni gsum ste /
analyzed: bye brag pa rnams kyi gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ni gsum ste /
translated: The Vaiśeṣikas say that there are three fallacious reasons:

original: ma grub pa dang / ma bstan pa dang / yod pa ma yin par the tshom za'o zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs las so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: ma grub pa dang / ma bstan pa dang / yod pa ma yin par the tshom za'o zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs las so zhes zer ro //
translated: unproven, undetailed, and doubtful.

original: ma grub pa ni re zhig gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ma grub pa ni re zhig gtan tshigs ltar snang ba ma yin no //
translated: The unestablished is not a fallacious reason.

original: 'di ltar dpe la med pa'am /🔽ma grub pa'i don nyid yin yang rung ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar dpe la med pa'am / ma grub pa'i don nyid yin yang rung ste /
translated: For example, in the case of the proposition, “Sound is impermanent, because it is produced,”🔽the unestablished is the meaning of the reason.

original: gtan tshigs kyi don du'o zhes bya ba ni'am zhes rnam par rtag pa'i sgra yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don du'o zhes bya ba ni'am zhes rnam par rtag pa'i sgra yin no //
translated: The word “or” is a disjunctive particle.

original: de lta na ni dpe la rab tu grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na ni dpe la rab tu grub pa yin no //
translated: In this way, the example is well established.

original: ci ste yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma grub par brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang bsgrub par bya ba nyid ma grub par brjod do zhe na /
translated: But if it is said that the unestablished is the probandum,

original: de lta na ni gtan tshigs kyi don du 'gal bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta na ni gtan tshigs kyi don du 'gal bar 'gyur /
translated: then the reason would be contradictory.

original: grub pa sngon du 'gro ba can las bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di la ni 'brel pa'i dus na rab tu grub pa'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: grub pa sngon du 'gro ba can las bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di la ni 'brel pa'i dus na rab tu grub pa'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be taught that the reason is preceded by the established. In this case, it should be said that it is well established at the time of the relation.

original: yod pa ma yin pa ni med la the tshom yang ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa ni med la the tshom yang ma yin no //
translated: The non-existent is not, and also is not doubt.

original: rva can nyid ni grub pa yin pa'i phyir grub par byas na de la dper brjod pa /
analyzed: rva can nyid ni grub pa yin pa'i phyir grub par byas na de la dper brjod pa /
translated: Since the horn-ness is established, if it is established, that is the example.

original: gal te rva can yin na ni rta'am ba lang gcig yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: gal te rva can yin na ni rta'am ba lang gcig yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: If it has horns, then it is either a horse or a cow.

original: ci ste yang yod pa ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs ni yod pa ma yin pa ste yid gnyis can gyi gtan tshigs ni the tshom @59b du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang yod pa ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs ni yod pa ma yin pa ste yid gnyis can gyi gtan tshigs ni the tshom @59b du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if you say that an unreal reason is an unreal reason, then a reason that is doubtful is a doubtful reason.

original: re zhig yod pa ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig yod pa ma yin pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: First, it is not an unreal reason.

original: yod pa ma yin pa tsam ni mi rtogs so //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa tsam ni mi rtogs so //
translated: For one does not understand mere nonexistence.

original: de ltar yod pa ma yin pa tsam shes par 'gyur ba ni med kyi 'on kyang bzlog pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yod pa ma yin pa tsam shes par 'gyur ba ni med kyi 'on kyang bzlog pa yin no //
translated: In that way, there is no understanding of mere nonexistence, but rather the opposite.

original: de la rva can las ni rta ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de la rva can las ni rta ma yin gyi /
translated: From one who has horns, a horse is not produced.

original: shes pa skye'i /
analyzed: shes pa skye'i /
translated: But a cognition arises.

original: de'i shes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i shes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But not a cognition of that.

original: de'i phyir bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir bzlog pa bsgrub pa'i phyir 'gal ba nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, because of establishing the opposite, there is contradiction.

original: dogs pa can gyi gtan tshigs ni the tshom du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dogs pa can gyi gtan tshigs ni the tshom du brjod par bya'o //
translated: A reason that is doubtful should be stated as doubtful.

original: ma tshang brjod pa yin /
analyzed: ma tshang brjod pa yin /
translated: It is a deficient statement.

original: rva can yin pa'i phyir ba lang ngo zhes bya ba de dag nyid the tshom gyi gtan tshigs ni ma yin gyi 'di ltar thun mong ma yin pa yang ste dper na rdzas drug la rna bas gzung bar bya ba nyid de ni thams cad la med pa
analyzed: rva can yin pa'i phyir ba lang ngo zhes bya ba de dag nyid the tshom gyi gtan tshigs ni ma yin gyi 'di ltar thun mong ma yin pa yang ste dper na rdzas drug la rna bas gzung bar bya ba nyid de ni thams cad la med pa
translated: The horns of a cow are not a reason for doubt, but rather, it is the uncommon reason, for example, the fact that the six substances are apprehended by the ear, which does not exist in all.

original: ste yul du ma the tshom gyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: ste yul du ma the tshom gyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: It is a reason for doubt in many objects.

original: gal te bye brag gnyis ka la mthong ba'i phyir de spyi nyid yin te /
analyzed: gal te bye brag gnyis ka la mthong ba'i phyir de spyi nyid yin te /
translated: If you say that it is a universal because it is seen in both particulars,

original: bsgreng ba bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: bsgreng ba bzhin no zhe na /
translated: like an upright stick,

original: de mi rigs te gang bzlog pa med pa de ni de ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de mi rigs te gang bzlog pa med pa de ni de ltar snang ba'o //
translated: that is illogical, because that which is not reversed appears in that way.

original: rdzas gcig dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir the tshom du mi 'gyur chug nas la sogs pa la the tshom yin no //
analyzed: rdzas gcig dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir the tshom du mi 'gyur chug nas la sogs pa la the tshom yin no //
translated: It is not possible that there is doubt because of possessing one substance, but there is doubt about water and so on.

original: 'di thams cad las log pa mi srid ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di thams cad las log pa mi srid ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is impossible that all of these are reversed.

original: de'i phyir rnam pa kun la the tshom gyi gtan tshigs gzhan thun mong ma yin pa nyid ni mi brjod do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam pa kun la the tshom gyi gtan tshigs gzhan thun mong ma yin pa nyid ni mi brjod do //
translated: Therefore, in all cases, the uncommon reason for doubt is not stated.

original: de bzhin du 'gal ba dang ma nges pa'i mtha' can du ma brjod do /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'gal ba dang ma nges pa'i mtha' can du ma brjod do /
translated: Likewise, it is not said to have the extremes of contradiction and non-certainty.

original: ji skad du sa la sogs pa 'dus nas lus po brtsams par brjod pa la ci rang rang gi rigs su'am zhes the tshom du 'gyur te /
analyzed: ji skad du sa la sogs pa 'dus nas lus po brtsams par brjod pa la ci rang rang gi rigs su'am zhes the tshom du 'gyur te /
translated: As it is said, When it is said that earth and so on come together to form the body, there is doubt as to whether it is of its own kind or not.

original: lnga'i rtags dmigs pa'i phyir dang / rigs mi mthun gyi rtsom pa bkag pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
analyzed: lnga'i rtags dmigs pa'i phyir dang / rigs mi mthun gyi rtsom pa bkag pa'i phyir ro zhes so //
translated: Because the sign of the five is observed, and because the composition of dissimilar kinds is refuted.

original: the tshom gyi mdo de tsam gyis mi chog go zhes brjod do //
analyzed: the tshom gyi mdo de tsam gyis mi chog go zhes brjod do //
translated: It is said that this much of the sutra on doubt is not sufficient.

original: 'dir yang spyir mngon sum pa las yang autpala'i dkar po las yon tan nyid dang brten pa nyid dang yon tan med pa nyid rnams la nges par mthong gi the tshom ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang spyir mngon sum pa las yang autpala'i dkar po las yon tan nyid dang brten pa nyid dang yon tan med pa nyid rnams la nges par mthong gi the tshom ni ma yin no //
