translated: The specific is that which is dependent on the self.

original: rang la brten par nges pa ni bye brag yin pas bum pa la sogs pa lta bu ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang la brten par nges pa ni bye brag yin pas bum pa la sogs pa lta bu ni ma yin te /
translated: The specific is that which is dependent on the self, not that which is like a pot, etc.

original: byas pa sgra ma yin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byas pa sgra ma yin pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is produced from non-sound.

original: de lta na yang nye bar sbyar ba med do //
analyzed: de lta na yang nye bar sbyar ba med do //
translated: Even so, there is no application.

original: chos mi mthun pa'i nye bar sbyar ba ni nam mkha' bzhin du ma byas pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: chos mi mthun pa'i nye bar sbyar ba ni nam mkha' bzhin du ma byas pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: The application of the dissimilar is like the statement, “It is not unproduced like space.”

original: de la gal te dgag pa gnyis las byas pa nyed 'gegs pa tsam du brjod pa yin na ni /
analyzed: de la gal te dgag pa gnyis las byas pa nyed 'gegs pa tsam du brjod pa yin na ni /
translated: In that regard, if the negation is stated as the mere negation of the produced from the two negations,

original: gtan tshigs de'i don du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i don du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then that reason is not the meaning.

original: gal te byas pa ni mi 'gegs kyi de dang lhan cig tu rgyu ba'i rtag pa 'gegs pa'i don du yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te byas pa ni mi 'gegs kyi de dang lhan cig tu rgyu ba'i rtag pa 'gegs pa'i don du yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is not the negation of the produced, but the meaning of the negation of the permanent that moves together with it,

original: de ltar yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin te /
translated: then it is not like that.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: gnyen po'i phyogs dang ldan ma yin //
analyzed: gnyen po'i phyogs dang ldan ma yin //
translated: it does not possess the antidote.

original: gtan tshigs nyid du ma brjod pa'i byas pa'i spyi brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid du ma brjod pa'i byas pa'i spyi brjod pa yin te /
translated: The produced in general is stated as the reason, not the produced that is stated as the reason.

original: dang gi sgra smos pas byas pa nyid yod pas na gnyen po'i phyogs kyi go skabs yod pa ma yin na gang de dgag par bya ba'i don du chos ni mthun pa nye bar sbyor bar byed de ma byas pa dang lhan cig tu rtag pa nyid dgag
analyzed: dang gi sgra smos pas byas pa nyid yod pas na gnyen po'i phyogs kyi go skabs yod pa ma yin na gang de dgag par bya ba'i don du chos ni mthun pa nye bar sbyor bar byed de ma byas pa dang lhan cig tu rtag pa nyid dgag
translated: Since the word “and” is mentioned, since there is that which is produced, there is no opportunity for the side of the antidote. Therefore, one applies a similar property to the object of negation, in order to refute permanence in relation to that which is produced.

original: par bya ba'i don du yang nye bar sbyor bar mi brjod do //
analyzed: par bya ba'i don du yang nye bar sbyor bar mi brjod do //
translated: One does not apply it in order to refute permanence in relation to that which is not produced.

original: de lta bas na gnyen po'i phyogs dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na gnyen po'i phyogs dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is the side of the antidote.

original: chos mthun pa'i sgo nas byas pa nyid kyis mi rtag pa nyid rtogs pa ni med do //
analyzed: chos mthun pa'i sgo nas byas pa nyid kyis mi rtag pa nyid rtogs pa ni med do //
translated: There is no understanding of impermanence through production by means of a similar property.

original: de'i gnyen po'i phyogs rtag pa nyid dang ldan par yod pa gang gis 'gegs par byed /
analyzed: de'i gnyen po'i phyogs rtag pa nyid dang ldan par yod pa gang gis 'gegs par byed /
translated: By what does one refute permanence, which is the side of the antidote, in relation to that which exists?

original: ci ste yang ma grub pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid la chos mi mthun pa tsam gyis rtag pa nyid 'gegs so zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang ma grub pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid la chos mi mthun pa tsam gyis rtag pa nyid 'gegs so zhe na /
translated: But if one refutes permanence by means of a mere dissimilar property in relation to permanence, because it is not established,

original: de lta na yang /
analyzed: de lta na yang /
translated: then in that case,

original: khyad par sgo nas kyang der 'gyur //
analyzed: khyad par sgo nas kyang der 'gyur //
translated: it would also be so by means of a distinction.

original: gal te chos mthun pa ma brjod par khyad par gyi sgo nas kyang ste de chos de'i gnyen po'i phyogs dang lhan cig tu rgyu ba 'gegs pa yin par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te chos mthun pa ma brjod par khyad par gyi sgo nas kyang ste de chos de'i gnyen po'i phyogs dang lhan cig tu rgyu ba 'gegs pa yin par 'gyur te /
translated: If, without stating a common property, one were to refute by way of a distinction, then the non-eternality of sound would be refuted in common with what is not to be heard, because it is a property of that.

original: dper na mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir sgra mi rtag go zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mnyan bya yin pa'i phyir sgra mi rtag go zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it would be like saying, “Sound is impermanent because it is to be heard,”

original: bum pa la sogs pa mi rtag pa la mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa dang lhan cig tu rgyu ba mi rtag pa nyid bkag pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa mi rtag pa la mnyan par bya ba ma yin pa dang lhan cig tu rgyu ba mi rtag pa nyid bkag pa'i phyir /
translated: because the impermanence in common with what is not to be heard, such as a pot, would be refuted.

original: mi 'dod pa'i rtag pa nyid grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'dod pa'i rtag pa nyid grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, permanence, which is not accepted, would be established.

original: mi rtag pa nyid grub par mtshungs pa'i phyir 'dir yang rtag pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid grub par mtshungs pa'i phyir 'dir yang rtag pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: Because impermanence is established in the same way, here also permanence would occur,

original: rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir glog la sogs pa bzhin no zhes chos mthun pas ni 'di la 'ga' zhig kyang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir glog la sogs pa bzhin no zhes chos mthun pas ni 'di la 'ga' zhig kyang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: because it arises from effort, like lightning, etc.

original: gang gi phyir nam mkha' bzhin ma byas pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de nyid rtag pa ma yin pas na'o /
analyzed: gang gi phyir nam mkha' bzhin ma byas pa ma yin pa de'i phyir de nyid rtag pa ma yin pas na'o /
translated: But by way of a common property, nothing is reasonable here, because, like space, it is not unproduced. Therefore, it is not permanent.

original: @66a * // ma byas pa nyid ni rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: @66a * // ma byas pa nyid ni rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: Non-production is not a reason for permanence,

original: gang de med pa las rtag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang de med pa las rtag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: because that which is non-existent does not become permanent.

original: mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs lus can ma yin pa la sogs pa yang med pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid 'gegs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid kyi gtan tshigs lus can ma yin pa la sogs pa yang med pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid 'gegs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And non-production is not a reason for impermanence, because the body, etc., are not non-existent.

original: nam mkha' ni ngag gi don la ltos nas nye bar sbyar bar rigs te gang gi phyir ma byas pa las phyi rol du gyur pa'i rtag pa ni cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni ngag gi don la ltos nas nye bar sbyar bar rigs te gang gi phyir ma byas pa las phyi rol du gyur pa'i rtag pa ni cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Space is properly applied in relation to the meaning of negation, because apart from non-production, there is no other permanent external object.

original: nam mkha' bzhin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin no //
translated: Like space.

original: mi rtag pa la yang bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba yin no //🔽de'i phyir mi rtag pa'o zhes bya ba nyid kyis nye bar sbyar bar yang rigs pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: mi rtag pa la yang bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba yin no // de'i phyir mi rtag pa'o zhes bya ba nyid kyis nye bar sbyar bar yang rigs pa ma yin no ;
translated: And impermanence, like a pot.🔽Therefore, it is not proper to apply the term “impermanence” to space.

original: / mjug bsdu ba la ni slar gyi tshig mi brjod pa nyid de de la yan lag ma yin no zhes 'chad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: / mjug bsdu ba la ni slar gyi tshig mi brjod pa nyid de de la yan lag ma yin no zhes 'chad par mi bya'o //
translated: In a conclusion, the word “but” is not used, and it is not proper to explain that space is not a part of the elements.

original: bye brag pa rnams ni gnyis ka rab tu grub pa dpe'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: bye brag pa rnams ni gnyis ka rab tu grub pa dpe'o zhes zer ro //
translated: The Vaiśeṣikas say that the example is established for both parties.

original: de la yang /
analyzed: de la yang /
translated: But in that case,

original: mkha' dper brjod pa'i sbyor ba'am //
analyzed: mkha' dper brjod pa'i sbyor ba'am //
translated: The example of space is not a syllogism,

original: ngag gi phyogs gcig nyid kyang min //
analyzed: ngag gi phyogs gcig nyid kyang min //
translated: Nor is it a part of the statement.

original: gnyis rab grub pa zhes bya ba la gal te dam bca' dang gtan tshigs dag nam mkha' la grub pa de'i yon tan yin pa'i phyir zhe na ni thams cad nam mkha' dper 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis rab grub pa zhes bya ba la gal te dam bca' dang gtan tshigs dag nam mkha' la grub pa de'i yon tan yin pa'i phyir zhe na ni thams cad nam mkha' dper 'gyur ro //
translated: If you say that the thesis and the reason are established for space because it is a quality, then everything would be an example of space.

original: ci ste bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de gang la grub pa de nyid do zhe na ni /
analyzed: ci ste bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de gang la grub pa de nyid do zhe na ni /
translated: But if you say that the example is that for whom the property to be proven is established,

original: de lta na yang dag gi cha shas nyid mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de lta na yang dag gi cha shas nyid mi 'thad de /
translated: then it is not tenable that it is a part of the statement.

original: rjes 'gro rjod par mi byed pa //
analyzed: rjes 'gro rjod par mi byed pa //
translated: It does not express the pervasion.

original: de ni dpe yi gzugs brnyan yin //
analyzed: de ni dpe yi gzugs brnyan yin //
translated: It is a mere reflection of an example.

original: gang du gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba mi ston pa de ni dpe ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: gang du gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba mi ston pa de ni dpe ltar snang ba'o //
translated: When it does not teach the pervasion of the reason and the property to be proven, it is a mere reflection of an example.

original: gnyis ka'i dpe ni snga ma bzhin no zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i dpe ni snga ma bzhin no zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The example of both is like the previous one.

original: sgrub byed nye bar sbyar don ni //
analyzed: sgrub byed nye bar sbyar don ni //
translated: The application of the proof

original: rang rgyud yin yang don med 'gyur //
analyzed: rang rgyud yin yang don med 'gyur //
translated: Even if it were an autonomous syllogism, it would be pointless.

original: gal te dpe rang gi rgyud kyi yin na ni gtan tshigs kyi don gyi phyogs gcig ma yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: gal te dpe rang gi rgyud kyi yin na ni gtan tshigs kyi don gyi phyogs gcig ma yin no zhes brjod do //
translated: If the example were in one’s own continuum, it would not be one part of the meaning of the reason.

original: de lta bas na sgrub par byed pa nyid mi srid pa nye bar sbyar ba'i don yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na sgrub par byed pa nyid mi srid pa nye bar sbyar ba'i don yang ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the application is not that it is impossible to establish.

original: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin no //
translated: It is just as explained above.

original: tshad ma kun las btus pa las dpe dang dpe ltar snang ba brtags pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: tshad ma kun las btus pa las dpe dang dpe ltar snang ba brtags pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o /
translated: This concludes the fourth chapter of the Compendium of Valid Cognition, the analysis of examples and pseudo-examples.

original: // / tshad ma gnyis su brjod pa la kha cig sgra las byung ba yang tshad ma nyid du 'dod do //🔽de la / sgra las byung ba rjes dpag las //
analyzed: // / tshad ma gnyis su brjod pa la kha cig sgra las byung ba yang tshad ma nyid du 'dod do // de la / sgra las byung ba rjes dpag las //
translated: Regarding the two types of valid cognition, some assert that that which arises from words is also valid cognition.🔽In that regard,

original: tshad ma gzhan min 'di ltar te //🔽rang gi don la bya sogs bzhin //
analyzed: tshad ma gzhan min 'di ltar te // rang gi don la bya sogs bzhin //
translated: That which arises from words is not a separate valid cognition🔽from inference, because

original: gzhan sel sgo nas ston par @66b byed ;
analyzed: gzhan sel sgo nas ston par @66b byed ;
translated: it is taught by means of the exclusion of other,🔽like a bird’s path in the sky.

original: / sgra ni yul gang la med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa nyid rab tu sbyor bar byed pa de'i cha nas de'i byas pa la sogs pa bzhin du don gzhan rnam par bcad nas ston par byed do //
analyzed: / sgra ni yul gang la med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa nyid rab tu sbyor bar byed pa de'i cha nas de'i byas pa la sogs pa bzhin du don gzhan rnam par bcad nas ston par byed do //
translated: Sound is related to the object in such a way that it does not occur in the absence of the object. From that point of view, it is like a product, etc. It indicates the object by excluding other objects.

original: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa las tha dad pa ma yin no //🔽gang la la dag ni thams cad du rigs kyi sgra rang rang gi tha dad pa las yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa las tha dad pa ma yin no // gang la la dag ni thams cad du rigs kyi sgra rang rang gi tha dad pa las yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not different from inference.🔽Some say that the word “type” is always used to indicate a difference from the individual.

original: smras pa rnams la ni nges pa'i don du khyad par gyi sgra yin no zhes 'dzer to //
analyzed: smras pa rnams la ni nges pa'i don du khyad par gyi sgra yin no zhes 'dzer to //
translated: In the case of statements, the word “type” has a specific meaning.

original: de la lan brjod pa /
analyzed: de la lan brjod pa /
translated: The response to that is:

original: tha dad rnams kyi rigs sgra med //
analyzed: tha dad rnams kyi rigs sgra med //
translated: There is no word for “type” for the different things.

original: rjod par byed pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: It should be said that it is the expresser.

original: re zhig rigs kyi sgra yod pa la sogs pa rdzas la sogs pa rnams kyi rjod par byed pa ma yin te ;
analyzed: re zhig rigs kyi sgra yod pa la sogs pa rdzas la sogs pa rnams kyi rjod par byed pa ma yin te ;
translated: First, the word “type” is not the expresser of substances, etc. that exist as types.

original: mtha' yod min phyir /
analyzed: mtha' yod min phyir /
translated: Because there is no end.

original: mtha' med ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: mtha' med ces bya ba ni /
translated: “Endless” means:

original: tha dad pa rnams sgra dang 'brel par byed mi nus la /
analyzed: tha dad pa rnams sgra dang 'brel par byed mi nus la /
translated: The different things cannot be connected with a word.

original: 'brel par ma byas pa'i sgras don brjod pa yang rigs pa ma yin pas rang gi ngo bo tsam zhig rtogs par byed par zad do //
analyzed: 'brel par ma byas pa'i sgras don brjod pa yang rigs pa ma yin pas rang gi ngo bo tsam zhig rtogs par byed par zad do //
translated: It is not reasonable for a word that is not related to express a meaning, so it is merely the nature itself that is understood.

original: gzhan yang / 'khrul pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang / 'khrul pa'i phyir /
translated: Moreover, because of confusion.

original: ji ltar rdzas la yod pa'i sgra 'jug pa de bzhin du yon tan la sogs pa la yang 'jug pas 'khrul pa'i phyir the tshom du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rdzas la yod pa'i sgra 'jug pa de bzhin du yon tan la sogs pa la yang 'jug pas 'khrul pa'i phyir the tshom du 'gyur gyi /
translated: Because the word that applies to a substance also applies to qualities and so on, there is confusion, so there is doubt.

original: rjod par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not an expression.

original: 'ga' zhig ni 'di snyam du sems te /🔽rigs kyi sgra tsam mam /🔽de dang ldan pa tsam la ni /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ni 'di snyam du sems te / rigs kyi sgra tsam mam / de dang ldan pa tsam la ni /
translated: Some think this:🔽It is easy to relate the mere word of the class🔽or the mere possession of that

original: 'brel par sla ba yin pa'i phyir dang / mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
analyzed: 'brel par sla ba yin pa'i phyir dang / mi 'khrul pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
translated: because there is no confusion.

original: de dag kyang /🔽rigs sam ldan sgra tha dad kyi //
analyzed: de dag kyang / rigs sam ldan sgra tha dad kyi //
translated: But they are also🔽not individual expressions

original: de la so sor rjod byed min /
analyzed: de la so sor rjod byed min /
translated: of the class or the word of possession.

original: de lta na ni rdzas yod do yon tan yod do las yod do zhes tha dad pa'i don gyi rdzas la sogs pa'i sgras gzhi mthun pa nyid du mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: de lta na ni rdzas yod do yon tan yod do las yod do zhes tha dad pa'i don gyi rdzas la sogs pa'i sgras gzhi mthun pa nyid du mi 'gyur na /
translated: If that were so, then the words substance, quality, and action would not be coextensive with regard to the same basis, because the meanings of substance and so on are different.

original: de ltar yang mthong ba na yod pa'am /
analyzed: de ltar yang mthong ba na yod pa'am /
translated: If it is seen in that way, it exists.🔽

original: de dang ldan pa la rdzas sam yon tan la ni mi srid do //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa la rdzas sam yon tan la ni mi srid do //
translated: If it is seen in this way, it is impossible for it to be a substance or a quality that exists or🔽possesses it.

original: 'di ltar rdzas kyi'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar rdzas kyi'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Thus, it should be said to be of substance.

original: yang brjod pa /
analyzed: yang brjod pa /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: yon tan dang ni yon tan can //
analyzed: yon tan dang ni yon tan can //
translated: The quality and the possessor of the quality

original: brjod pa'i rnam dbye tha dad du //🔽nges phyir gzhi dang mthun pa yi //
analyzed: brjod pa'i rnam dbye tha dad du // nges phyir gzhi dang mthun pa yi //
translated: are definitely different in the expression.🔽Therefore, the substance and the sound

original: rdzas dang sgra dag rab tu grub //🔽'brel pa ni 'dir 'brel can gyi //
analyzed: rdzas dang sgra dag rab tu grub // 'brel pa ni 'dir 'brel can gyi //
translated: are well-established in accordance with the basis.🔽The relation here is said to be

original: chos kyi 'phangs par brjod bya ste //
analyzed: chos kyi 'phangs par brjod bya ste //
translated: the projection of the property of the related.

original: de ltas nges byas nas brjod kyi //
analyzed: de ltas nges byas nas brjod kyi //
translated: Thus, having ascertained it, it is expressed,

original: dngos po gzhan gyis sbyar mi bya //
analyzed: dngos po gzhan gyis sbyar mi bya //
translated: but not by applying another entity.🔽The relation is not necessarily a relation, like a change in color, etc.,

original: 'brel pa ni gdon mi za bar 'brel par 'gyur ba'i nges pa med de kha bsgyur ba la sogs pa bzhin gzhan gyi gegs byed pa srid do //
analyzed: 'brel pa ni gdon mi za bar 'brel par 'gyur ba'i nges pa med de kha bsgyur ba la sogs pa bzhin gzhan gyi gegs byed pa srid do //
translated: because it is possible for another to obstruct it.

original: de'i phyir 'brel pa can gyi chos kyis 'brel pa brjod par bya ba yin pa'i @67a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'brel pa can gyi chos kyis 'brel pa brjod par bya ba yin pa'i @67a * //
translated: Therefore, the relation should be expressed by the property of the related.

original: phyir rang gi chos kyi ni 'brel pa'i rjod par byed pa'i sgra'o zhes yod pa ma yin par mtshon pas na /🔽'di yi rigs kyi sgra yis ni //
analyzed: phyir rang gi chos kyi ni 'brel pa'i rjod par byed pa'i sgra'o zhes yod pa ma yin par mtshon pas na / 'di yi rigs kyi sgra yis ni //
translated: The word “own” is a term that expresses a relation to its dharma, but it is not a real entity.🔽The word “kind”

original: brjod par bya ba nyid mi 'thad //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba nyid mi 'thad //
translated: is not tenable as a term that expresses.

original: la la dag ni khyad par gyi sgra rnams dang gzhi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir dang / 'brel par sla ba'i phyir dang / mi 'khrul pa'i phyir rigs dang ldan pa tsam brjod par bya'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: la la dag ni khyad par gyi sgra rnams dang gzhi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir dang / 'brel par sla ba'i phyir dang / mi 'khrul pa'i phyir rigs dang ldan pa tsam brjod par bya'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Some say that the word “kind” should be used because it is a term that expresses a particular, because it is easy to relate to, and because it is non-erroneous.

original: de la / rang dbang med phyir de ldan min //
analyzed: de la / rang dbang med phyir de ldan min //
translated: But it is not so, because it is not independent.

original: de lta na yang rdzas kyi rang gi ngo bo tsam yod pa'i sgras khyad par du byas nas rdzas zhes brjod kyi /
analyzed: de lta na yang rdzas kyi rang gi ngo bo tsam yod pa'i sgras khyad par du byas nas rdzas zhes brjod kyi /
translated: Even so, the word “substance” is used, qualifying the word “existent,” to indicate the mere intrinsic reality of substance.

original: dngos su ni ma yin pas des bum pa la sogs pa'i tha dad mi dben pa'i phyir de nyid tha dad pa nyid la gzhi mthun pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos su ni ma yin pas des bum pa la sogs pa'i tha dad mi dben pa'i phyir de nyid tha dad pa nyid la gzhi mthun pa yod pa ma yin no //

original: med pa dang ma byas pa dag la ni gzhi mthun pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa dang ma byas pa dag la ni gzhi mthun pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //

original: dper na dkar po dang sgra lta bu rang gi yon tan brjod par bya ba la rdzas kyi khyad par du byas nas brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dper na dkar po dang sgra lta bu rang gi yon tan brjod par bya ba la rdzas kyi khyad par du byas nas brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For example, in the expression “the substance of white and sound,” the substance is mentioned as a quality that is to be expressed.

original: yod pas rdzas la mngar ba la sogs pa ni mi 'phen no //
analyzed: yod pas rdzas la mngar ba la sogs pa ni mi 'phen no //
translated: But sweetness, etc., are not mentioned as substances in the expression “the substance of sweetness, etc.”

analyzed: de lta bas na 'dir yang de bzhin du tha dad pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, in the same way, the consequence of difference would apply here.🔽Moreover,

original: gzhan yang / nye bar brtags phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang / nye bar brtags phyir /

original: sgra ni rang gi ngo bo'am rigs su brjod pa de la 'jug cing de dang ldan par nye bar brtags pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni rang gi ngo bo'am rigs su brjod pa de la 'jug cing de dang ldan par nye bar brtags pa yin no //

original: gang zhig gang la nye bar brtags pa'i don de ni yang dag pa'i don ma yin no zhes brjod do //
analyzed: gang zhig gang la nye bar brtags pa'i don de ni yang dag pa'i don ma yin no zhes brjod do //

analyzed: yon tan gyis phan btags pa'i 'dra ba yang mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The similarity of the cognition is impossible, because the similarity of the quality is impossible, and the similarity of the benefit conferred by the quality is impossible.

analyzed: ji ltar shas pa 'pho ba mi srid ce na / nye bar btags pa ni /

original: blo med par yang 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: blo med par yang 'jug par 'gyur //
translated: and it would also operate without a mind.

original: gal te shes bzhin du yon tan gyis phan btags pa las yon tan gyi dngos po de dang ldan par 'gyur ba nyid yin na ni rdzas la 'jug pa'i blo yon tan la 'jug pa'i blo la mi ltos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te shes bzhin du yon tan gyis phan btags pa las yon tan gyi dngos po de dang ldan par 'gyur ba nyid yin na ni rdzas la 'jug pa'i blo yon tan la 'jug pa'i blo la mi ltos par 'gyur ro //

original: shel dmar po'i blo'i dngos po ni rten la ltos pa ma yin te /
analyzed: shel dmar po'i blo'i dngos po ni rten la ltos pa ma yin te /
translated: The nature of the mind that is aware of a red crystal is not dependent on a basis,

original: rnam par ma sbyangs pa rnams la tha dad pa'i blo med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par ma sbyangs pa rnams la tha dad pa'i blo med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the mind that is aware of a difference does not exist for those who are not trained.🔽Moreover,

original: gzhan yang / 'dres pa'i tshul nas thams cad du //🔽log pa'i shes par thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan yang / 'dres pa'i tshul nas thams cad du // log pa'i shes par thal bar 'gyur //
translated: in all cases, there would be a confusion🔽in the way things are perceived.

original: sgra dang shes pa thams cad don dang 'dres pa'i tshul nas ni rnam par bslad pa ste /
analyzed: sgra dang shes pa thams cad don dang 'dres pa'i tshul nas ni rnam par bslad pa ste /

original: de'i phyir shel bzhin du shes pa thams cad don ji lta ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir shel bzhin du shes pa thams cad don ji lta ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, like a crystal, all cognitions would not be in accordance with the way things are.🔽Moreover,

original: gzhan yang / spyi sogs mang po nyid dang ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang / spyi sogs mang po nyid dang ni //
translated: in the case of many things, such as universals,

original: cig car 'dzin pa rnams la yang //
analyzed: cig car 'dzin pa rnams la yang //
translated: there would be a simultaneous apprehension.

original: phan 'dogs pa ni 'gal bar 'gyur ;
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa ni 'gal bar 'gyur ;
translated: The benefit would be contradictory.

original: / gang yang mang po 'dzin par 'gyur ba ni dkar po la sogs pa ni yon tan lta bu ste /
analyzed: / gang yang mang po 'dzin par 'gyur ba ni dkar po la sogs pa ni yon tan lta bu ste /

original: dper na bum pa dang / sa las byung ba dang / rdzas dang / kha ba dang / mngar ba dang / dri zhim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa de'i tshe yon tan gyis phan 'dogs pa 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na bum pa dang / sa las byung ba dang / rdzas dang / kha ba dang / mngar ba dang / dri zhim pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa de'i tshe yon tan gyis phan 'dogs pa 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, it is like a pot, earth element, substance, white, sweet, fragrant, etc. At that time, the benefit of the qualities would be contradictory.

original: de'i tshe yon tan gyi tshul nas rdzas dang gcig 'gyur bar ni nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe yon tan gyi tshul nas rdzas dang gcig 'gyur bar ni nus pa ma yin te /
translated: At that time, it is not possible for the substance to be one with the qualities,

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there would be no difference.

original: yul gcig pa rnams la yon tan gyi tshul nas nyams su myong bar yang nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gcig pa rnams la yon tan gyi tshul nas nyams su myong bar yang nus pa ma yin no //

original: lan cig tu bum pa la sogs pa'i dngos po rtogs so zhes pa de la /
analyzed: lan cig tu bum pa la sogs pa'i dngos po rtogs so zhes pa de la /
translated: In the case of the cognition of a single thing such as a pot, etc.,

original: gzi ya  khra bo thams cad mthong //
analyzed: gzi ya  khra bo thams cad mthong //
translated: it is said that all the variegated colors are seen.

original: ci ste thams cad bum pa yin pa'i phyir zhes pas ni cig car du dus gcig so sor phan 'dogs par byed par 'gyur na bum pa la sogs pa'i dngos po la ni gzung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ci ste thams cad bum pa yin pa'i phyir zhes pas ni cig car du dus gcig so sor phan 'dogs par byed par 'gyur na bum pa la sogs pa'i dngos po la ni gzung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If you say, “Because all are pots,” then all would simultaneously and separately benefit, but there is no apprehension of things such as pots.

original: gzi'i khra bo thams cad mthong ba ni dngos po thams cad ni cig car du thob pa yin no //
analyzed: gzi'i khra bo thams cad mthong ba ni dngos po thams cad ni cig car du thob pa yin no //
translated: When one sees all the colors of a cow, one obtains all things simultaneously.

original: de dag tha dad rnams la yang //
analyzed: de dag tha dad rnams la yang //
translated: And also with regard to those that are different,

original: de dang ldan pa'i skyon de mtshungs //🔽rigs rang ngo bo'am de ldan gyi //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i skyon de mtshungs // rigs rang ngo bo'am de ldan gyi //

original: ngo bo gang las sbyor mi bya //
analyzed: ngo bo gang las sbyor mi bya //
translated: From what nature of the class or what nature possessing that🔽is the application not made?

original: tha dad pa'i ngo bo la yang gdon mi za bar brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa'i ngo bo la yang gdon mi za bar brjod pa yin te /
translated: Even with regard to different natures, it is certainly expressed.

analyzed: rigs kyi ngo bo tha dad du brjod par bya ba dang / dngos kyi rigs dag @68a * //
translated: The nature of the class is to be expressed as different, and the actual class🔽is to be expressed as different from that.🔽With regard to those that are different, the designation is made.

original: la tha dad pa rnams la nye bar btags pa'i zhes de dang ldan pa la brjod pa bzhin du skyon thams cad brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: la tha dad pa rnams la nye bar btags pa'i zhes de dang ldan pa la brjod pa bzhin du skyon thams cad brjod par bya'o //
translated: As with the expression “possessing that,” all errors should be expressed.

original: brjod par bya ba'i rigs dag la yang sgra'i rang gi ngo bo sgro btags nas rdzas su brjod pa yin no zhes srid pas rigs dang ldan pa dang rigs kyi ngo bo yod pa la sogs pas brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba'i rigs dag la yang sgra'i rang gi ngo bo sgro btags nas rdzas su brjod pa yin no zhes srid pas rigs dang ldan pa dang rigs kyi ngo bo yod pa la sogs pas brjod pa yin no //

analyzed: 'dir yang skyon ji ltar srid pa ltar brjod par bya'o //
translated: Here, the fault is to be stated as it is possible.

original: de ldan tha dad nyid brjod na //
analyzed: de ldan tha dad nyid brjod na //

original: de yang sngar nyid bsal zin to //
analyzed: de yang sngar nyid bsal zin to //

original: rigs kyi sgra ru'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra ru'o //

analyzed: bsal zhes pa ni /
translated: “Refuted” means

analyzed: ci ste yang rigs ni rigs dang ldan pa tsam gyis rjod par byed pa yin gyi tha dad pa'i ngo bor ni ma yin no zhes brjod do zhe na /
translated: But if it is said that the universal is expressed merely by the possessor of the universal, not by a different nature,

analyzed: gal te de lta na / de ldan tsam yang 'brel pa'am //
translated: then if that is so,🔽it is analyzed as to whether the mere possessor is related

original: yod pa yin zhes rnam par dpyad //
analyzed: yod pa yin zhes rnam par dpyad //
translated: or existent.

analyzed: gzhan la grags pa'i tha dad pa'i dngos po 'khrul pa med par 'brel pa dag las so // zhes pa de la yang /

analyzed: rigs sam ldan sgras tha dad kyi ; / don la so sor rjod byed min // zhes brjod zin to //

original: de'i spyi nyid du sgro btags pa'i don ci yin /
analyzed: de'i spyi nyid du sgro btags pa'i don ci yin /
translated: What is the meaning of the superimposition of “universality” on that?🔽The word “exists” is a term that expresses a universal.

original: 'di ltar yod pa'i sgra ni spyi brjod pa'i tshig go zhes dam bca' ba la yod pa la sogs pa la yang yod pa la sogs pa med pa'i phyir de la 'jug pas ni brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar yod pa'i sgra ni spyi brjod pa'i tshig go zhes dam bca' ba la yod pa la sogs pa la yang yod pa la sogs pa med pa'i phyir de la 'jug pas ni brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: Since “existence” and so on do not exist in “existence” and so on, it is not to be applied to that.

original: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar spyi'i don khas blang bar bya na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar spyi'i don khas blang bar bya na /
translated: Therefore, one must certainly accept the meaning of “universal.”

original: de yang don la yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang don la yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: But that does not exist in reality.

original: sgra don 'ba' zhig pa dang mtshungs //
analyzed: sgra don 'ba' zhig pa dang mtshungs //
translated: Therefore, it is similar to a mere sound object.

original: de dang ldan pa'i bum pa la sogs pa ni yod pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa yod pa dang sbyor ba ni sngar cung zad kyang grub pa med do //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i bum pa la sogs pa ni yod pa'i sgras brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir de dang ldan pa yod pa dang sbyor ba ni sngar cung zad kyang grub pa med do //
translated: Since a pot that possesses that is to be expressed by the word “exists,” the application of “existence” to that which possesses it is not established in the least.

original: de yang @68b rgyu mtshan med par 'dod //
analyzed: de yang @68b rgyu mtshan med par 'dod //
translated: And that is accepted without a reason.

original: sgra tha dad rnams la ni tha mi dad kyi rgyu mtshan gzhan ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: sgra tha dad rnams la ni tha mi dad kyi rgyu mtshan gzhan ma mthong ngo //
translated: We do not see any other reason for the nondifference of different sounds.

original: de'i phyir de yang spyi ru sbyar bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de yang spyi ru sbyar bar mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, that also should not be applied universally.

original: de lta bas na khyad par du bya ba dag ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na khyad par du bya ba dag ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the qualifier and the qualified do not exist.

original: ci ste yod pa'i sgra las yon tan yod pa las gzhan ma yin pa'i rdzas la 'jug pa ni shin tu sngo ba la sogs pa bzhin du bum pa la sogs pa la yang 'dod pa yin la khyad par du byed pa dang khyad par du bya bar🔽'gyur ro zhe na /🔽gal te gcig la'ang sngo sogs bzhin //
analyzed: ci ste yod pa'i sgra las yon tan yod pa las gzhan ma yin pa'i rdzas la 'jug pa ni shin tu sngo ba la sogs pa bzhin du bum pa la sogs pa la yang 'dod pa yin la khyad par du byed pa dang khyad par du bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na / gal te gcig la'ang sngo sogs bzhin //
translated: But if you maintain that the word “existent” applies to substance, which is not different from the existent qualities, just as the word “very blue” applies to the pot, then the substance would be both the qualifier and the qualified.🔽If you maintain that the word “existent” applies to substance, which is not different from the existent qualities, just as the word “very blue” applies to the pot, then the substance would be both the qualifier and the qualified.

original: 'brel pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa'i yon tan du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were one, it would be related to the qualities, like blue.

original: de lta'ang ma yin /
analyzed: de lta'ang ma yin /
translated: But it is not so.

original: sngon po'i sgra ni shin tu sngo ba la sogs pa med par gzhan gyis da dang ldan par 'thad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon po'i sgra ni shin tu sngo ba la sogs pa med par gzhan gyis da dang ldan par 'thad pa ma yin no //

analyzed: 'gyur du chug na yang don gyi bye brag gi sgra las yin te /
translated: Even if it were so, it would be from the specific term, not from the general term.

original: spyi rtogs pa la ni 'khrul ba'i phyir gang yang 'di skad du bye brag gi khongs su spyi 'dus pa'i zhes brjod par bya grang na de ltar brjod par bya ba las brjod par bya ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi rtogs pa la ni 'khrul ba'i phyir gang yang 'di skad du bye brag gi khongs su spyi 'dus pa'i zhes brjod par bya grang na de ltar brjod par bya ba las brjod par bya ba yang ma yin no //
translated: But in general, because of error, it should be said that the universal is included in the particular. But it is not even to be said that it is included.

original: 'di ltar / gzhan sel min /
analyzed: 'di ltar / gzhan sel min /
translated: Thus: It is not an other-exclusion.

original: 'di ltar sngon po'i sgra dang me tog kun+da la sogs pa bzhin sngon po la sogs pa gzhan sel ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar sngon po'i sgra dang me tog kun+da la sogs pa bzhin sngon po la sogs pa gzhan sel ba ma yin no //
translated: Thus, like the word “blue” and the flower kundā, etc., the blue, etc. are not other-exclusions.

original: de'i phyir khongs su 'dus pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khongs su 'dus pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be said that it is included.

original: khas blangs kyang brjod par bya ba nyid kyi khongs su 'dus pa yin no ;
analyzed: khas blangs kyang brjod par bya ba nyid kyi khongs su 'dus pa yin no ;
translated: Even if it is accepted, it is included in the very thing to be expressed.

original: / gal te gnyis ka yang bye brag gi don du yin na ni rnam grangs pa'i sgrar 'gyur te /
analyzed: / gal te gnyis ka yang bye brag gi don du yin na ni rnam grangs pa'i sgrar 'gyur te /
translated: If both are for the sake of the particular, it becomes a synonym.

original: gcig las rnam grangs su 'gyur bas mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: gcig las rnam grangs su 'gyur bas mthong ba yin no //
translated: It is seen that a synonym comes from one.

original: rnam grangs kyi sgra ni ma rtogs pa dang / don du ma la yin gyi sngar gyi don de nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rnam grangs gzhan sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam grangs kyi sgra ni ma rtogs pa dang / don du ma la yin gyi sngar gyi don de nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rnam grangs gzhan sbyor ba yin no //
translated: The term “synonym” means that it is not understood, and it is applied to many meanings, but another synonym is applied in order to understand that very meaning.

original: de ltar na ni rnam grangs kyi sgra rnams kyi sgra nyid de /
analyzed: de ltar na ni rnam grangs kyi sgra rnams kyi sgra nyid de /
translated: In that case, the term “synonym” is the very term itself.

original: gang rnam grangs kyi sgra des don de brjod pa yin gyi cig car ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang rnam grangs kyi sgra des don de brjod pa yin gyi cig car ba ni ma yin no //
translated: That meaning is expressed by that synonym term, but not all at once.

original: de ltar na yang sngon po'i sgra nyid kyis autpala'i don rtogs pas na khyad par du byed pa dang khyad par du bya ba dag yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na yang sngon po'i sgra nyid kyis autpala'i don rtogs pas na khyad par du byed pa dang khyad par du bya ba dag yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Even so, since the meaning of the blue lotus is understood by the term “blue” alone, there is no distinction between that which is distinguished and that which is distinguished.

original: de dag ni re zhig tha mi dad @70b pa'i phyogs la skyon brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni re zhig tha mi dad @70b pa'i phyogs la skyon brjod pa'o //
translated: Those are the faults stated in the position of non-difference.

original: ji ltar tha mi dad pa la brjod pa de bzhin du tha dad pa la yang ste /
analyzed: ji ltar tha mi dad pa la brjod pa de bzhin du tha dad pa la yang ste /
translated: Just as it is said in non-difference, so it is in difference as well.

original: tha dad pas kyang 'dus pa rnams las 'dus pa gzhan nyid gcig bsgrub par bya ba de la de'i de dag rnams la'am /
analyzed: tha dad pas kyang 'dus pa rnams las 'dus pa gzhan nyid gcig bsgrub par bya ba de la de'i de dag rnams la'am /
translated: By difference, the mere collection is established as different from the collection itself, and those are in that.

original: de dag rnams kyi yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi yod pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not exist.

original: ma lus par phyogs gcig nas 'jug pa yang mi srid do //
analyzed: ma lus par phyogs gcig nas 'jug pa yang mi srid do //
translated: It is impossible for them to be engaged in one and the same object.

original: khas blangs kyang /🔽tha dad na yang gnyis ka med //
analyzed: khas blangs kyang / tha dad na yang gnyis ka med //
translated: Even if you accept that,🔽they are not both nonexistent when they are different.

original: de la yang gzhi mthun yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: de la yang gzhi mthun yod pa ma yin la /
translated: There is no common locus for them.

original: khyad par du byed pa dang khyad par du bya ba yang yod pa ma yin no //🔽de ni don dag gam /
analyzed: khyad par du byed pa dang khyad par du bya ba yang yod pa ma yin no // de ni don dag gam /
translated: There is no distinction between that which is distinguished and that which is to be distinguished.🔽Do they refer to the same object or

original: sgra dag gcig tu 'gyur grang /
analyzed: sgra dag gcig tu 'gyur grang /
translated: to the same word?

original: don du 'gyur ba ltar na yang yon tan dang rdzas dag gam /
analyzed: don du 'gyur ba ltar na yang yon tan dang rdzas dag gam /
translated: If they refer to the same object, do they refer to a quality and a substance

original: de dang ldan par 'gyur grang /
analyzed: de dang ldan par 'gyur grang /
translated: or to that which possesses them?

original: de bzhin du sgra las yang yon tan dang rdzas dag gam /
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra las yang yon tan dang rdzas dag gam /
translated: In the same way, if they refer to the same word, do they refer to a quality and a substance🔽or to that which possesses them?

original: de dang ldan par 'gyur grang ngo zhes brtag cing dpyad par bya'o //
analyzed: de dang ldan par 'gyur grang ngo zhes brtag cing dpyad par bya'o //
translated: You should investigate and analyze this.

original: de la / don gyis rdzas dang yon tan dag / gal te don gcig la 'jug na //
analyzed: de la / don gyis rdzas dang yon tan dag / gal te don gcig la 'jug na //
translated: If the meaning of a word refers to a substance and a quality,

original: spyi dang bye brag gnyis yod min //
analyzed: spyi dang bye brag gnyis yod min //
translated: there is neither a universal nor an instance.

original: gal te yon tan sngon po dang sngon po autpala'i rigs dag rdzas gcig la 'jug pa'i phyir gzhi mthun pa dang khyad par du byed pa dang khyad par du bya ba dag yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te yon tan sngon po dang sngon po autpala'i rigs dag rdzas gcig la 'jug pa'i phyir gzhi mthun pa dang khyad par du byed pa dang khyad par du bya ba dag yod pa ma yin no //
translated: If the quality blue and the universal blue were to occur in the same substance, there would be no common locus, nor would there be the relation of qualifier and qualified.

original: yon tan sngon po autpala'i rigs dang ldan pa la yang yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: yon tan sngon po autpala'i rigs dang ldan pa la yang yod pa ma yin la /
translated: Nor would the quality blue occur in the universal blue,

original: autpala'i rigs yon tan sngon po dang ldan pa yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: autpala'i rigs yon tan sngon po dang ldan pa yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: nor would the universal blue occur in the quality blue.

original: de ldan gnyis dang yod ma yin //
analyzed: de ldan gnyis dang yod ma yin //
translated: Nor would there be the relation of possessor and possessed.

original: gang gi tshe yon tan sngon po dang / autpala'i rigs spyi'i don la ldan pa de'i tshe gzhi mthun pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe yon tan sngon po dang / autpala'i rigs spyi'i don la ldan pa de'i tshe gzhi mthun pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: When the quality blue and the universal blue are related to the meaning of the universal, then there would be no common locus.

original: gzhan la 'jug pa'i rdzas dag la yang khyad par du byed pa dang khyad par bya ba'i dngos po'am gnyis ka gcig pa dag yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan la 'jug pa'i rdzas dag la yang khyad par du byed pa dang khyad par bya ba'i dngos po'am gnyis ka gcig pa dag yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Nor would there be the relation of qualifier and qualified or the relation of identity between substances that occur in different things,

original: spyi dang bye brag nyid dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi dang bye brag nyid dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are not related to the universal and the particular.

original: de ltar na re zhig don la gnyis srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig don la gnyis srid pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, in the first place, the two are not possible in the object.

original: don la gnyis ji lta ba //🔽de bzhin du sgra rigs dang ni //
analyzed: don la gnyis ji lta ba // de bzhin du sgra rigs dang ni //
translated: How is it that the two are not possible in the object?

original: yon tan tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur //
analyzed: yon tan tsam zhig brjod par 'gyur //
translated: In the same way, the word would express only the class and the quality.

original: shin tu tha dad na ni rigs dang yon tan ni sgra brjod par 'gyur ba yin na de yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shin tu tha dad na ni rigs dang yon tan ni sgra brjod par 'gyur ba yin na de yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: If they are completely different, the word would express the class and the quality, but that is not the case.

original: de dag gi gzhi mthun pa la yang 'brel pa ma brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi gzhi mthun pa la yang 'brel pa ma brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because the connection is not stated in the common basis of those,

original: de'i sgra dag la yang khyad par byed pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i sgra dag la yang khyad par byed pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: there is no distinction in their words.

original: de ltar na re zhig rigs dang yon tan tsam brjod pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig rigs dang yon tan tsam brjod pa nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, in the first place, the word expresses only the class and the quality.

original: de ldan brjod pa nyid la ni //
analyzed: de ldan brjod pa nyid la ni //
translated: In the expression of that possessor,

original: mtshungs mi mtshungs su thal bar 'gyur //🔽gal te rigs dang @71a * //
analyzed: mtshungs mi mtshungs su thal bar 'gyur // gal te rigs dang @71a * //
translated: it follows that there is similarity and dissimilarity.

original: yon tan gyi sgra dag rdzas kyi khyad par gcig la brjod pa de'i phyir rten mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yon tan gyi sgra dag rdzas kyi khyad par gcig la brjod pa de'i phyir rten mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the words class and quality express one particular substance, then there would be a common basis.

original: gang gi phyir khyad par du byed pa tha dad pa'i rdzas brjod pa de'i phyir mi mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir khyad par du byed pa tha dad pa'i rdzas brjod pa de'i phyir mi mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the substance that is distinguished is stated to be different, therefore it is not similar.

original: de'i phyir nges pa med pa la gzhi mthun pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir nges pa med pa la gzhi mthun pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no common locus for the absence of determination.

original: gal te / mtshungs phyir brjod par mi 'dod ces //
analyzed: gal te / mtshungs phyir brjod par mi 'dod ces //
translated: If you say, “Because they are similar, we do not assert that they are stated,”

original: gal te 'di snyam du re zhig nye bar blangs pa'i gzhi mthun par mtshungs par 'gyur bas brjod par mi 'dod pa ni 'brel par byas pa khyad par med do //
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du re zhig nye bar blangs pa'i gzhi mthun par mtshungs par 'gyur bas brjod par mi 'dod pa ni 'brel par byas pa khyad par med do //
translated: if you think, “Because they are similar in being a common locus of appropriation, we do not assert that they are stated,” then the distinction that they are related is not different.

original: gang la blo mtshungs pa'i rgyu yod pa nyid gzhi mthun pa yin par brjod kyi /
analyzed: gang la blo mtshungs pa'i rgyu yod pa nyid gzhi mthun pa yin par brjod kyi /
translated: We say that a common locus is the mere existence of the cause of a similar mind.

original: de la gzhan me tog kha zum pa la sogs pa'i khyad par ni yod du zin kyang brjod par mi 'dod do zhe na /
analyzed: de la gzhan me tog kha zum pa la sogs pa'i khyad par ni yod du zin kyang brjod par mi 'dod do zhe na /
translated: Even though there are other distinctions, such as the flower closing, we do not assert that they are stated.

original: 'di ni mi zad par brgal ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni mi zad par brgal ba ste /
translated: This is an endless debate.

original: gnyi ga rnam par bsal ba rjes su bzung na ni ji srid du don yod pa de la sgra'i bya ba yod pas na de tsam brjod par 'dod par sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnyi ga rnam par bsal ba rjes su bzung na ni ji srid du don yod pa de la sgra'i bya ba yod pas na de tsam brjod par 'dod par sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: If one accepts both, then as long as there is an existent object, there is the function of the word, and so one should apply just that much to what one wishes to express.

original: 'brel pa can du byas pa la ni brjod par 'dod pa'i khyad par ma yin pa la ji ltar dngos por brjod par bya /
analyzed: 'brel pa can du byas pa la ni brjod par 'dod pa'i khyad par ma yin pa la ji ltar dngos por brjod par bya /
translated: But if one makes it related, then how can one say that it is a thing, when it is not a particular that one wishes to express?🔽Moreover,

original: gzhan yang / ba lang rta sogs la yang mtshungs //
analyzed: gzhan yang / ba lang rta sogs la yang mtshungs //
translated: it would be the same for a cow, a horse, and so on.

original: ba lang dang rta la sogs pa yang ba lang nyid kyi yod pa la sogs pas 'brel par byas pa khyad par med par 'gyur na /
analyzed: ba lang dang rta la sogs pa yang ba lang nyid kyi yod pa la sogs pas 'brel par byas pa khyad par med par 'gyur na /
translated: A cow and a horse, etc., would be undifferentiated, since they are related by the existence of cowness, etc.

original: de la ni spyi brjod par mi 'dod la /
analyzed: de la ni spyi brjod par mi 'dod la /
translated: But one does not wish to express a universal there.

original: de'i dngos por brjod par bya ba yin pas na autpala dang sngon po la sogs pa bzhin pa lang dang rta dag kyang gzhi mthun par thal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i dngos por brjod par bya ba yin pas na autpala dang sngon po la sogs pa bzhin pa lang dang rta dag kyang gzhi mthun par thal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: And since it is to be expressed as a thing, it follows that a cow and a horse would be a common locus, like a blue lotus, etc.

original: gal te / der bye brag tu ma byas she na /
analyzed: gal te / der bye brag tu ma byas she na /
translated: If it is asked, “Why is it not specified there?”

original: gal te 'di snyam du ba lang dang rta la sogs pa la dbyibs kyi bye brag tu byas te yod par ma brjod do //
analyzed: gal te 'di snyam du ba lang dang rta la sogs pa la dbyibs kyi bye brag tu byas te yod par ma brjod do //
translated: If you think, “We do not say that the shape of a cow, horse, and so on exists as a particular shape.🔽We say that the shape of a cow, horse, and so on is the particular shape of the individual parts that are the cause of the type of entity that is the cow, horse, and so on.”

original: rang rang gi bsal ba'i rigs kyi rgyu'i bye brag der byas pa de dag de bzhin du brjod pa yin par ji ltar na brjod par mi 'dod /
analyzed: rang rang gi bsal ba'i rigs kyi rgyu'i bye brag der byas pa de dag de bzhin du brjod pa yin par ji ltar na brjod par mi 'dod /
translated: How could we not accept that?

original: don de autpala dang sngon po bzhin no zhes pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: don de autpala dang sngon po bzhin no zhes pa yang ma yin la /
translated: The meaning is like the blue color of the utpala flower.

original: de bzhin du gzhi mthun par thal bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhi mthun par thal bar 'gyur ba yang ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Also, it is not the case that the error of the consequence that they are the same thing arises.

original: de lta na ni /
analyzed: de lta na ni /
translated: In that case,

original: du mar byas pa 'dus par 'gyur //
analyzed: du mar byas pa 'dus par 'gyur //
translated: it would be a composite of many.

original: dngos po gcig la spyi du mas gsal bar byed pa'i phyir dbyibs du ma 'dus par 'gyur na de ltar na yang ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po gcig la spyi du mas gsal bar byed pa'i phyir dbyibs du ma 'dus par 'gyur na de ltar na yang ma mthong ngo //
translated: Because many universals would clarify one thing, shape would be a composite of many. But that is not seen.🔽Moreover,

original: gzhan yang / mtshungs pa ni ba lang dang rta la sogs pa yang rten mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs pa nyid du ma brjod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang / mtshungs pa ni ba lang dang rta la sogs pa yang rten mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs pa nyid du ma brjod pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is not said that cows, horses, and so on are the same or not the same in terms of their support,

original: ba lang nyid kyi yod pa nyid la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa ma yin no zhes de la @71b yang mtshungs par brjod pa ni gzhi mthun par thal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: ba lang nyid kyi yod pa nyid la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa ma yin no zhes de la @71b yang mtshungs par brjod pa ni gzhi mthun par thal bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The opponent’s response to this is that the consequence of a common locus is similar.

original: 'dod pa yang med /
analyzed: 'dod pa yang med /
translated: But we do not accept that.

original: gang la gzhi mthun yod par 'dod pa'i autpala dang rdzas la sogs pa yod do zhes pa de la yang mi 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang la gzhi mthun yod par 'dod pa'i autpala dang rdzas la sogs pa yod do zhes pa de la yang mi 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you accept that there is a common locus of the existence of the lotus and the existence of the substance, then you cannot deny that.

original: gal te spyi tha dad par gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ba lang dang / rta dag la gzhi mthun pa med pa yin na ni de lta na autpala'i yang yod pa dang rdzas la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa nyid du mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te spyi tha dad par gsal bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ba lang dang / rta dag la gzhi mthun pa med pa yin na ni de lta na autpala'i yang yod pa dang rdzas la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa nyid du mthong ba yin no //
translated: If you say that there is no common locus of cow and horse because the universal is manifested separately, then in that case, the existence of the lotus and the substance are also seen to be manifested separately.

original: gzhan yang / yon tan rdzas dag gsal mi 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan yang / yon tan rdzas dag gsal mi 'gyur //
translated: Moreover: Qualities and substances would not be manifested.

original: yon tan dang rdzas dag ni dbyibs ma yin pa'i phyir de dang 'brel pa'i spyi gsal bar byed pa ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yon tan dang rdzas dag ni dbyibs ma yin pa'i phyir de dang 'brel pa'i spyi gsal bar byed pa ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because qualities and substances are not shape, it follows that the universal that is related to them would not manifest.

original: gal te nus pa'i bye brag gis rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid gsal bar byed pa'i phyir rdzas la sogs pa'i tha dad la ni dbyibs kyi bye brag yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te nus pa'i bye brag gis rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid gsal bar byed pa'i phyir rdzas la sogs pa'i tha dad la ni dbyibs kyi bye brag yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the difference in shape does not exist in the difference of substance, etc., because it manifests the universal and particular characteristics by the difference in potentiality,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: dngos po tha dad la yang nus pa'i bye brag khas blangs pa'i phyir te autpala'i dngos po bzhin no //
analyzed: dngos po tha dad la yang nus pa'i bye brag khas blangs pa'i phyir te autpala'i dngos po bzhin no //
translated: Because you accept the difference in potentiality even in different things, like the thing called lotus.

original: gal te gang dag spyi tha dad pa mngon par gsal ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gang dag spyi tha dad pa mngon par gsal ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod do zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is because it is the cause of manifesting the difference in the universal,

original: de la ba lang nyid dang rta nyid la sogs pa'i bye brag ci zhig yin zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de la ba lang nyid dang rta nyid la sogs pa'i bye brag ci zhig yin zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: then what is the difference between cow-ness and horse-ness, etc.?

original: 'di la ci zhig ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la ci zhig ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: What is this?

original: re zhig ba lang la sogs pa'i rjod par byed pa'i sgrar byas pa de dag gi sgra 'dod rgyal ba la rang rang gi sgras brjod par bya ba de dag khyad par yin no //
analyzed: re zhig ba lang la sogs pa'i rjod par byed pa'i sgrar byas pa de dag gi sgra 'dod rgyal ba la rang rang gi sgras brjod par bya ba de dag khyad par yin no //
translated: The difference is that those which are the words expressing cow, etc., are the objects of the words of one’s own choice, and those are the objects of the words of one’s own choice.🔽In that regard,

original: de la / tha dad rjod byed tha dad las //
analyzed: de la / tha dad rjod byed tha dad las //
translated: The expression of difference is from difference.

original: zhe na rang las khyad med sgra //
analyzed: zhe na rang las khyad med sgra //
translated: If you say that the word is not different from the individual,

original: de lta na ni spyi dang bye brag rnams kyi sgra tsam tha dad pa ni de'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na ni spyi dang bye brag rnams kyi sgra tsam tha dad pa ni de'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
translated: then the mere word is not the universal and the particular.

original: gal te khyad par med pa'i dngos po la ni rjod par byed pa'i sgras tha dad du nye bar 'dogs so zhe na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par med pa'i dngos po la ni rjod par byed pa'i sgras tha dad du nye bar 'dogs so zhe na /
translated: If you say that the word is applied to the thing which is not different,

original: brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: we reply that it is not so.

original: bye brag ni spyi gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽ba lang la sogs pa khyad par med pas 'gyur bas na'o //
analyzed: bye brag ni spyi gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro // ba lang la sogs pa khyad par med pas 'gyur bas na'o //
translated: Because the particular is the cause of the manifestation of the universal.

original: gal te nag pa la sogs pa'i bzhin rjod par byed pa tha dad pas so zhe na /
analyzed: gal te nag pa la sogs pa'i bzhin rjod par byed pa tha dad pas so zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is so because the particular, such as the cow, etc. is not different,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: we reply that it is not so.

original: de nyid da phyad par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de nyid da phyad par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is the particular itself which is to be manifested.

original: gcig la yang sgra'i rnam grangs du ma brjod par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig la yang sgra'i rnam grangs du ma brjod par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the word is applied to the one thing in many ways.

original: 'di la ji lta ba bzhin du sgra dag rang las khyad par yod pa ma yin no zhes 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di la ji lta ba bzhin du sgra dag rang las khyad par yod pa ma yin no zhes 'gyur te /
translated: Here, as in the case of the word, the word is not different from the individual.

original: sgra la yang ba lang la sogs pa dang rang las bye brag tu gyur pa ni med kyang /🔽'on kyang spyi las bye brag tu byas par zad na de la ni de bzhin du rnam @72a * //
analyzed: sgra la yang ba lang la sogs pa dang rang las bye brag tu gyur pa ni med kyang / 'on kyang spyi las bye brag tu byas par zad na de la ni de bzhin du rnam @72a * //
translated: And even though there is no particular in sound, such as a cow, etc.,

original: par brtag go //
analyzed: par brtag go //
translated: nevertheless, it is only a particular that is made known by a word, and so it is imagined to be just like that.

original: gal te mngon sum nyid ba lang gi sgra la sogs pa'i bye brag ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum nyid ba lang gi sgra la sogs pa'i bye brag ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn’t the particular itself directly perceived in the word cow, etc.?

original: mngon sum la bye brag yod du zin kyang de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum la bye brag yod du zin kyang de ni brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Even if the particular is directly perceived, it is not expressed,

original: don dang lhan cig ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dang lhan cig ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not seen together with the object.

original: shing rta la sogs pa rmongs pa rnams kyi tha snyad kyang don rjod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: shing rta la sogs pa rmongs pa rnams kyi tha snyad kyang don rjod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: And the convention of the ignorant, such as a chariot, etc., does not express the object.

original: de bas na spyi las sgra rnams la bye brag tu byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na spyi las sgra rnams la bye brag tu byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the particular is made known by a word through a universal.

original: bye brag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis spyi rnams kyi bye brag yod pa ste /
analyzed: bye brag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis spyi rnams kyi bye brag yod pa ste /
translated: The Vaiśeṣikas say that the particulars of universals exist by nature,

original: rang rang la brten pa'i spyi gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rang rang la brten pa'i spyi gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: and they make known the individual that is the substratum of each universal.

original: de yang ji skad du /
analyzed: de yang ji skad du /
translated: And this is stated:

original: mgo bo dang rgyab dang gsus pa dang lag pa'o zhes bya ba'i bye brag de dag las so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: mgo bo dang rgyab dang gsus pa dang lag pa'o zhes bya ba'i bye brag de dag las so zhes zer ro //
translated: head, back, belly, and arms.

original: de dag gi ltar na yang /
analyzed: de dag gi ltar na yang /
translated: But according to them,

original: gsal byed gsal ba tha dad la //
analyzed: gsal byed gsal ba tha dad la //
translated: the manifestor and the manifested

original: phan tshun brten pa 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: phan tshun brten pa 'thob par 'gyur //
translated: would be mutually dependent.

original: phan tshun brten pa zhes bya ba ni bshad pa de dag 'thob par 'gyur ba ste /🔽rdzas kyi rang bzhin ci zhig rang gi ci gsal bar byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: phan tshun brten pa zhes bya ba ni bshad pa de dag 'thob par 'gyur ba ste / rdzas kyi rang bzhin ci zhig rang gi ci gsal bar byed pa nyid do //
translated: The manifestor and the manifested would be mutually dependent.🔽What is the nature of the substance? It is the manifestor.

original: spyi'i rang bzhin ci zhig rang gi rdzas kyi gsal bar bya ba nyid do zhes nus pa'o //
analyzed: spyi'i rang bzhin ci zhig rang gi rdzas kyi gsal bar bya ba nyid do zhes nus pa'o //
translated: What is the nature of the universal? It is the manifested substance.🔽Moreover,

original: gzhan yang / rang bzhin du ma dang gcig gi / phan tshun gsal ba mang por 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan yang / rang bzhin du ma dang gcig gi / phan tshun gsal ba mang por 'gyur //
translated: if the nature were both multiple and unitary,🔽there would be many manifestors.

original: gsal ba mang po zhes bya ba ni mang po rnams kyi gsal ba dang / mang po rnams kyi gsal ba ste /
analyzed: gsal ba mang po zhes bya ba ni mang po rnams kyi gsal ba dang / mang po rnams kyi gsal ba ste /
translated: Many manifestors means the manifestor of many and the manifestor of one.

original: rdzas ni yod pa la sogs pa spyi du ma'i gsal bar byed pa'o zhes spyi gcig gi rang bzhin du mar bya ba dang / sa las byung ba la sogs pa'i rdzas du mas yod pa rnams kyi gsal bar byed do zhes yod pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mar bya ba'o //🔽'di la rnam pa thams cad du yon tan dang 'brel pa tha dad pa'i phyir dang / nus pa tha dad pa'i phyir dang / rjod par byed pa tha dad pa'i phyir gcig yin yang /
analyzed: rdzas ni yod pa la sogs pa spyi du ma'i gsal bar byed pa'o zhes spyi gcig gi rang bzhin du mar bya ba dang / sa las byung ba la sogs pa'i rdzas du mas yod pa rnams kyi gsal bar byed do zhes yod pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du mar bya ba'o // 'di la rnam pa thams cad du yon tan dang 'brel pa tha dad pa'i phyir dang / nus pa tha dad pa'i phyir dang / rjod par byed pa tha dad pa'i phyir gcig yin yang /
translated: Thus, it is made to have many natures as a single universal. And it is the manifester of existents such as earth, etc., which are many substances. Thus, it is made to have many natures as the nature of existents.

original: khas blangs pa'i bdag nyid du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khas blangs pa'i bdag nyid du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, because of the difference of connection with the qualities, because of the difference of potency, and because of the difference of expression, even though it is one, it follows that it has many natures as the nature of the one accepted.

original: yang brjod pa /
analyzed: yang brjod pa /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: yon tan nus pa rjod byed kyi //🔽dbye bas tha dad rab tu brtag / gcig mang po dang 'brel pa'i phyir //
analyzed: yon tan nus pa rjod byed kyi // dbye bas tha dad rab tu brtag / gcig mang po dang 'brel pa'i phyir //
translated: Because of the difference of qualities, potency, and expression,🔽it is imagined to be different.🔽Because of the connection with one and many,

original: du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: du ma nyid du thal bar 'gyur //
translated: it follows that it is manifold.

original: zhes bya ba bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is an intermediate verse.

original: de ltar na re zhig gzhi mthun pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig gzhi mthun pa nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, first of all, there is no common locus.

original: khyad par byed dang khyad par du //
analyzed: khyad par byed dang khyad par du //
translated: The Distinctive and the Distinquishable

original: bya nyid rang dbang min sngar brjod //
analyzed: bya nyid rang dbang min sngar brjod //
translated: Are Not Independent, as Was Previously Explained.

original: ji ltar de dang ldan par brjod pa la khyad par byed pa dang khyad par bya ba nyid mi srid do //
analyzed: ji ltar de dang ldan par brjod pa la khyad par byed pa dang khyad par bya ba nyid mi srid do //
translated: As was previously explained, it is impossible for the distinctive and the distinquishable to exist in the expression of the possession of that.

original: de ni sngar nyid du brjod zin to //
analyzed: de ni sngar nyid du brjod zin to //
translated: That was explained previously.

original: de lta @72b bas na don gzhan sel ba'i sgra'i don nyid la gzhi mthun pa dang / khyad par byed pa dang / khyad par bya ba'i dngos po 'thad pa yin gyi de las gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta @72b bas na don gzhan sel ba'i sgra'i don nyid la gzhi mthun pa dang / khyad par byed pa dang / khyad par bya ba'i dngos po 'thad pa yin gyi de las gzhan du ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the common locus, the distinctive, and the distinquishable are tenable only in the meaning of the word that excludes other objects, not in anything else.

original: de la yang /
analyzed: de la yang /
translated: And in that regard,

original: gzhan nyid du min spyi dang ni //
analyzed: gzhan nyid du min spyi dang ni //
translated: It Is Not As Other, But Is A General,

original: tha dad rnam grangs brjod bskul yin //
analyzed: tha dad rnam grangs brjod bskul yin //
translated: Distinctive, Synonymous, And Eliciting Expression.

original: mtshungs su zin kyang gzhan nyid du ni ma yin gyi spyi dang khyad par du byed pa dang / khyad par du bya ba'i rnam grangs kyi sgra rnams kyi don la gzhan sel ba'i sgra ste /
analyzed: mtshungs su zin kyang gzhan nyid du ni ma yin gyi spyi dang khyad par du byed pa dang / khyad par du bya ba'i rnam grangs kyi sgra rnams kyi don la gzhan sel ba'i sgra ste /
translated: Even though it is similar, it is not as other, but is the meaning of the words that exclude other objects, which are the general, the distinctive, the distinctive, and the synonymous expressions.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no contradiction.

original: re zhig rnam grangs kyi sgra la ni cig car du sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir gzhan sel bar mtshungs pa yin gyi rang gi don so sor spong ba ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig rnam grangs kyi sgra la ni cig car du sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir gzhan sel bar mtshungs pa yin gyi rang gi don so sor spong ba ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: In the case of the term “enumeration,” it is applied simultaneously, and so the exclusion of other is the same, but it is not reasonable to exclude each individual object.

original: spyi'i sgras kyang rang gi tha dad pa rnams la don gzhan sel ba ni /
analyzed: spyi'i sgras kyang rang gi tha dad pa rnams la don gzhan sel ba ni /
translated: And in the case of the term “universal,” the exclusion of other objects from its own particulars

original: tha dad kyi sgra ched cher mi 'dzin pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: tha dad kyi sgra ched cher mi 'dzin pa yang ma yin te /
translated: is not the same as the term “different,”

original: don du gnyer ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don du gnyer ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is sought as an object.

original: 'di ltar shing sha pa ni pa la sogs pa ma yin pa de bzhin du bum pa la sogs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar shing sha pa ni pa la sogs pa ma yin pa de bzhin du bum pa la sogs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Just as a śimśapā is not a palāśa, etc., so it is not a pot, etc.

original: de dag gis ni spyi ma yin pa sgra'i don gzhan spong ba la lan brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag gis ni spyi ma yin pa sgra'i don gzhan spong ba la lan brjod pa yin no //
translated: They have responded to the question of how the exclusion of other objects, which is not a universal, is the meaning of a word.

original: de bzhin du spyi'i sgra rang gi 'dod pa'i don gyi yul nye bar 'god par byed pa na khyad par du byed pa rnams /
analyzed: de bzhin du spyi'i sgra rang gi 'dod pa'i don gyi yul nye bar 'god par byed pa na khyad par du byed pa rnams /
translated: In the same way, when the term “universal” is applied to its own desired object, the particulars

original: khyad par du bya ba'i sgra la ji ltar na mi ltos pa yin //
analyzed: khyad par du bya ba'i sgra la ji ltar na mi ltos pa yin //
translated: How can the word be used without depending on the exclusion of other?

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: In the same way,

original: 'gal med phyir na /
analyzed: 'gal med phyir na /
translated: because there is no contradiction,

original: tshogs spyi la sogs pa'i sgra'i don la gzhan sel ba slar yang mi rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshogs spyi la sogs pa'i sgra'i don la gzhan sel ba slar yang mi rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: it is not unreasonable to apply the exclusion of other to the meaning of words such as “collection” and “universal.”

original: tshogs pa yang /
analyzed: tshogs pa yang /
translated: A collection

original: de bzhin don gzhan brjod par byed //🔽de bzhin du spyi dang khyad par gyi sgra dag gi rang gi don la spyi la 'jug par byed pas na gnyis sam mang po yang rung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin don gzhan brjod par byed // de bzhin du spyi dang khyad par gyi sgra dag gi rang gi don la spyi la 'jug par byed pas na gnyis sam mang po yang rung ste /
translated: also expresses another meaning.

original: des khyad par du byas pa'i don gzhan rjod par byed pa nyid du 'thad pa yin te /
analyzed: des khyad par du byas pa'i don gzhan rjod par byed pa nyid du 'thad pa yin te /
translated: In the same way, because the words “universal” and “particular” engage their own meanings, it is tenable that they express another meaning that is qualified by either two or many.

original: sngar ji skad du brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sngar ji skad du brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: This is as stated previously.

original: yang brjod pa /
analyzed: yang brjod pa /
translated: Again it is said:

original: de tsam 'dod pa'i phyir tha dad //
analyzed: de tsam 'dod pa'i phyir tha dad //
translated: Because they assert just that, they are different.

original: rang dang spyi yis bar ma yin //
analyzed: rang dang spyi yis bar ma yin //
translated: They are intermediate by their own and universal characteristics.

original: ma bzung na ni don gcig la /
analyzed: ma bzung na ni don gcig la /
translated: If they are not apprehended, then in one object

original: 'di dag the tshom bskyed par mtshungs //🔽dus ma yin du zin kyang spyi //
analyzed: 'di dag the tshom bskyed par mtshungs // dus ma yin du zin kyang spyi //
translated: they are equal in producing doubt.🔽Even if they are apprehended at the wrong time,

original: bzung na tha dad kyis mi 'khrul //
analyzed: bzung na tha dad kyis mi 'khrul //
translated: the universal is not confused by the difference.

original: khyad par byed dang khyad par du //
analyzed: khyad par byed dang khyad par du //
translated: and the particular, and the particular action,

original: bya ba de dag nyid mtshungs min //
analyzed: bya ba de dag nyid mtshungs min //
translated: are not the same as the universal.

original: zhes bya ba bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag go //
translated: These are the verses that summarize the chapter.

original: ci yang rgyu gang gis na tha dad pa'i sgra'i don gzhan sel bar byed ce na /
analyzed: ci yang rgyu gang gis na tha dad pa'i sgra'i don gzhan sel bar byed ce na /
translated: By what means does a word, which has a different meaning, exclude another?

original: tha dad tha dad gzhan rnams dang // 'gal ba'i phyir na sel bar byed //
analyzed: tha dad tha dad gzhan rnams dang // 'gal ba'i phyir na sel bar byed //
translated: It excludes by reason of the contradiction of the different with the different.

original: tha dad pa'i don gyi sgra ni rang dang @73a * //
analyzed: tha dad pa'i don gyi sgra ni rang dang @73a * //
translated: The word that has a different meaning,

original: spyi'i don dbang du byed pa'i phyir rgyal po'i bu bzhin phan tshun du 'gal ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: spyi'i don dbang du byed pa'i phyir rgyal po'i bu bzhin phan tshun du 'gal ba nyid yin no //
translated: because it is governed by its own meaning and the general meaning, is contradictory to the other, like the son of the king.

original: de'i phyir don gzhan gyis bzod par mi nus te /
analyzed: de'i phyir don gzhan gyis bzod par mi nus te /
translated: Therefore, it cannot tolerate another meaning.

original: dper na 'di shing sha pa yin no zhes /
analyzed: dper na 'di shing sha pa yin no zhes /
translated: For example, when it is said, “This is a śiṃśapā tree,”

original: shing sha pa'i sgra shing dang lhan cig tu sbyar bas seng ldeng la sogs pa'i shing rnam par spyad nas rang gi yul du nye bar 'jog par byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: shing sha pa'i sgra shing dang lhan cig tu sbyar bas seng ldeng la sogs pa'i shing rnam par spyad nas rang gi yul du nye bar 'jog par byed pa bzhin no //
translated: the word śiṃśapā, being applied together with the word tree, excludes other trees such as the khadira, and establishes its own object.

original: de bzhin du cig shos la yang ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du cig shos la yang ste /
translated: The same is true of the other.

original: de bzhin du re zhig tha dad pa'i sgra la rdzas gcig btang snyoms su byed pa'i phyir khyad par du gzhan gyi sgra'i don sel bar rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du re zhig tha dad pa'i sgra la rdzas gcig btang snyoms su byed pa'i phyir khyad par du gzhan gyi sgra'i don sel bar rigs pa yin no //
translated: Likewise, the word different is indifferent to the one substance, and therefore it is proper that the word other should exclude the meaning of that.

original: gal te bum pa la sogs pa dang ma 'brel pa'i spyi gzhan tha dad pa'i don la ci ltar sel bar byed ce na /
analyzed: gal te bum pa la sogs pa dang ma 'brel pa'i spyi gzhan tha dad pa'i don la ci ltar sel bar byed ce na /
translated: If it is asked how the exclusion of the meaning of other, which is a universal not related to pot, etc., is made, it is like this:

original: 'di ltar / spyi gzhan tha dad don rnams kyi //
analyzed: 'di ltar / spyi gzhan tha dad don rnams kyi //
translated: The universal other of other things

original: rang dang spyi dag 'gal ba yin //
analyzed: rang dang spyi dag 'gal ba yin //
translated: is contradictory to its own universal.

original: shing gi sgras ni bum pa la sogs pa'i sa las byung ba dbang du byas pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: shing gi sgras ni bum pa la sogs pa'i sa las byung ba dbang du byas pa'i phyir 'gal ba yin no //
translated: The word tree is contradictory because it is governed by the earth element of pot, etc.

original: des na des spang bar bya ba'i dngos po la grogs po'i sgra bzhin rjes su yi rang bar byed do //
analyzed: des na des spang bar bya ba'i dngos po la grogs po'i sgra bzhin rjes su yi rang bar byed do //
translated: Therefore, it is like the word friend in the matter of what is to be excluded by it.

original: don la yang de des spangs so zhes shes par bya'o //
analyzed: don la yang de des spangs so zhes shes par bya'o //
translated: And it should be understood that the meaning of that is excluded by it.
