original: de dag gis ni spyi gzhan gyi tha dad pa rnams dang / yon tan la sogs pa rnams dang / de'i bye brag rnams gzugs la sogs pa dang / 'brel pa can dang 'brel pa can ma yin pa yang grogs po dang grogs po'i sgra bzhin dang /
analyzed: de dag gis ni spyi gzhan gyi tha dad pa rnams dang / yon tan la sogs pa rnams dang / de'i bye brag rnams gzugs la sogs pa dang / 'brel pa can dang 'brel pa can ma yin pa yang grogs po dang grogs po'i sgra bzhin dang /
translated: These words, in fact, exclude other universals, qualities, etc., and their subclasses, such as form, etc., and they also exclude the related and the unrelated, just like the words “friend” and “non-friend.”

original: sel bar byed pa dang / btang snyoms su byed par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: sel bar byed pa dang / btang snyoms su byed par rig par bya'o //
translated: One should understand that they exclude and they ignore.

original: de la yang /
analyzed: de la yang /
translated: And in this regard,

original: de de'i dngos su bsil byim na  //
analyzed: de de'i dngos su bsil byim na  //
translated: it is the particular that is directly excluded.

original: shing sha pa'i sgras bum pa la sogs pa dngos su sel bar byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shing sha pa'i sgras bum pa la sogs pa dngos su sel bar byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The word “tree” does not directly exclude the pot, etc.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: spyi ni mtshungs pa nyid ma yin//
analyzed: spyi ni mtshungs pa nyid ma yin//
translated: The universal is not the same.

original: gal te dngos su sel bar byed na ni /
analyzed: gal te dngos su sel bar byed na ni /
translated: If it directly excludes,

original: shing gi sgra dang don mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shing gi sgra dang don mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the word “tree” and the word “pot” would have the same meaning.

original: de bzhin khyad par gzhan rnams ni //
analyzed: de bzhin khyad par gzhan rnams ni //
translated: In the same way, the other distinctions

original: de yis sel bar 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: de yis sel bar 'gyur ma yin //
translated: are not excluded by that.

original: ji ltar shing gi sgras pa la sha la sogs pa sel bar mi byed pa de bzhin du shing sha pa'i sgras kyang sel bar mi byed de /
analyzed: ji ltar shing gi sgras pa la sha la sogs pa sel bar mi byed pa de bzhin du shing sha pa'i sgras kyang sel bar mi byed de /
translated: Just as the word “tree” does not eliminate “animal,” etc., so also the word “śimśapā tree” does not eliminate “tree,”

original: des mtshungs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des mtshungs par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is similar to the latter.

original: gal te nyes pa med de nyung ngu dang mang por sel ba nyid kyis tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te nyes pa med de nyung ngu dang mang por sel ba nyid kyis tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no fault, because it is different in terms of the elimination of a few and many,

original: de ltar 'gyur bar rigs pa ma yin te /🔽ji ltar shing dang shing sha pa'i sgra dag ni /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur bar rigs pa ma yin te / ji ltar shing dang shing sha pa'i sgra dag ni /
translated: then it is not logical that it should be so.🔽For example, the words “tree” and “śimśapā tree”

original: shing nyid dang shing sha pa nyid kyis bye brag tu byas pa'i dngos po rjod par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shing nyid dang shing sha pa nyid kyis bye brag tu byas pa'i dngos po rjod par byed pa'i phyir /
translated: express things that are distinguished by “treeness” and “śimśapāness,”

original: shin @73b tu tha dad pa'i don rjod par byed do //
analyzed: shin @73b tu tha dad pa'i don rjod par byed do //
translated: so they express very different meanings.

original: de bzhin du 'di la yang don ma 'dres par bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'di la yang don ma 'dres par bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: In the same way, here too, the meaning is not mixed up,

original: nyung ngu dang mang por sel ba zhes pa ni don la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyung ngu dang mang por sel ba zhes pa ni don la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: because the expression “the elimination of a few and many” is also meaningful.

original: gal te khyad par gzhan gyi don sel bar byed pa yin na ni gang 'di yon tan dang yon tan gzhan gyis gzhi mthun pa ste /
analyzed: gal te khyad par gzhan gyi don sel bar byed pa yin na ni gang 'di yon tan dang yon tan gzhan gyis gzhi mthun pa ste /
translated: If it is the elimination of another object, then it is the common locus of a quality and another quality.🔽

original: ro mngar pa la snum pa dang / bsil ba dang / lci ba nyid do zhes pa de ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ro mngar pa la snum pa dang / bsil ba dang / lci ba nyid do zhes pa de ji ltar zhe na /
translated: If the difference is the exclusion of another object, then how is it that the sweet taste, the unctuous, cold, and heavy qualities are common to the same substance?

original: 'di la 'jug pa'i phyir //🔽gzhi yi mi 'gal bar byas nyid //
analyzed: 'di la 'jug pa'i phyir // gzhi yi mi 'gal bar byas nyid //
translated: In order to respond to this, [the root text] says,

original: rdzas yod pa gyur pa ste //
analyzed: rdzas yod pa gyur pa ste //
translated: “Because they are not contradictory in the same substance.”

original: yon tan dang ni yon tan gzhan //
analyzed: yon tan dang ni yon tan gzhan //
translated: The qualities and other qualities🔽are in the same substance.

original: de rdzas gcig la 'jug pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de rdzas gcig la 'jug pa'i phyir //
translated: Because they are in the same substance,

original: gzhi yi mi 'gal bar byas nyid //
analyzed: gzhi yi mi 'gal bar byas nyid //
translated: they are not contradictory in the same substance.

original: rdzas yod pa la ni /
analyzed: rdzas yod pa la ni /
translated: In the case of substantial existence,

original: ro mngar ba la snum pa nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan nye bar 'dogs par byed do //
analyzed: ro mngar ba la snum pa nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan nye bar 'dogs par byed do //
translated: the qualities such as unctuousness are attributed to the sweet taste.

original: don gcig la 'phrod pa 'du ba'i phyir zhes pa'i nyes pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don gcig la 'phrod pa 'du ba'i phyir zhes pa'i nyes pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is no fault of the contradiction of being in the same object.

original: ma mthong phyir yang sel ba yin //
analyzed: ma mthong phyir yang sel ba yin //
translated: It is also exclusion because it is not seen.

original: gang gi phyir tha dad kyi sgra tha dad pa'i don gzhan la mthong ba de'i phyir yang sel ba nyid do //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha dad kyi sgra tha dad pa'i don gzhan la mthong ba de'i phyir yang sel ba nyid do //
translated: Because the word “different” is seen to have a different meaning in “different from that,” therefore it is also exclusion.

original: ci ste gang gi phyir na ma mthong ngo zhes bya /
analyzed: ci ste gang gi phyir na ma mthong ngo zhes bya /
translated: But if you ask, “Why is it not seen? ”

original: dngos po'i don la ni kho bo cag gi nga rgyal tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i 'jug pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po'i don la ni kho bo cag gi nga rgyal tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa'i 'jug pa bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because we have refuted the engagement of the mere pride of the object of a thing.

original: de lta na ni /
analyzed: de lta na ni /
translated: In that case,

original: rang tha dad la spyi sel 'gyur //
analyzed: rang tha dad la spyi sel 'gyur //
translated: the universal would be excluded from each individual.

original: gal te ma mthong ba las sel bar byed na spyi'i sgra yang rang rang gi tha dad pa rnams la ma mthong ngo zhes gzhan sel bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te ma mthong ba las sel bar byed na spyi'i sgra yang rang rang gi tha dad pa rnams la ma mthong ngo zhes gzhan sel bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If exclusion were from what is not seen, then the word “universal” would also be an exclusion of other, since it is not seen in each individual.

original: gzhan min rigs par mthong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan min rigs par mthong ba'i phyir //
translated: Because it is seen as a universal in what is not other.

original: mthong zhes pa ni skabs la sogs pa spyi'i sgra las bye brag spong bar ro //
analyzed: mthong zhes pa ni skabs la sogs pa spyi'i sgra las bye brag spong bar ro //
translated: “ Seen” is in the context of the word “universal,” which excludes the particular.

original: de lta de snang la the tshom //
analyzed: de lta de snang la the tshom //
translated: In that case, there is doubt about the appearance of that.

original: de ltar byas na ni spyi'i sgra de bye brag gi snang ba la the tshom za bar rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar byas na ni spyi'i sgra de bye brag gi snang ba la the tshom za bar rigs pa yin no //
translated: If that is the case, then it is reasonable that there is doubt about the appearance of the particular in the word “universal.”

original: gal te de rnams la yang sngar dmigs pa yin na ni re zhig 'greng ba la yang /🔽the tshom za bar rigs she na /
analyzed: gal te de rnams la yang sngar dmigs pa yin na ni re zhig 'greng ba la yang /🔽the tshom za bar rigs she na /
translated: If it is observed previously in those, then it is reasonable to have doubt about the standing.

original: 'di snyam du gal te skabs la sogs pa dang don dag lhan cig dmigs pa yin na ni de'i phyir ji ltar na the tshom za zhe na /
analyzed: 'di snyam du gal te skabs la sogs pa dang don dag lhan cig dmigs pa yin na ni de'i phyir ji ltar na the tshom za zhe na /
translated: If you think that if the time, etc., and the object are simultaneously observed, then how can there be doubt?

original: nges par yan gar ba la zhes de ltar du brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: nges par yan gar ba la zhes de ltar du brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: It should not be said that “certainty is with regard to the isolated object.”

original: de la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i the tshom za ba ni don la sogs pa dang ldan par nges pa la dus phyis yan gar ba las the tshom za ba yin no //
analyzed: de la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i the tshom za ba ni don la sogs pa dang ldan par nges pa la dus phyis yan gar ba las the tshom za ba yin no //
translated: Doubt with regard to the object, etc., that are associated with the time, etc., is later doubt with regard to the isolated object.

original: gal te yan gar ba tha dad pa med de /🔽'di ltar spyi'i sgra khyad par du byas pa rnams la yan gar ba ma mthong ba rnams ni ji skad du /
analyzed: gal te yan gar ba tha dad pa med de / 'di ltar spyi'i sgra khyad par du byas pa rnams la yan gar ba ma mthong ba rnams ni ji skad du /
translated: If the isolated object does not exist,🔽then just as the word “cow” is not a basis for the word “non-ox,”🔽the word “non-ox” is not a basis for the word “cow.”🔽The word “cow” is not a basis for the word “non-ox” because the word “cow” is not a basis for the word “ox.”

original: rigs kyi sgra tha dad rnams kyi rjod byed ma yin no zhes brjod pa bzhin no zhe na /🔽nyan pa po la ltos pa mthong //
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra tha dad rnams kyi rjod byed ma yin no zhes brjod pa bzhin no zhe na / nyan pa po la ltos pa mthong //
translated: The word “non-ox” is not a basis for the word “cow” because the word “non-ox” is not a basis for the word “ox.”🔽The word “cow” is not a basis for the word “non-ox” because the word “cow” is not a basis for the word “ox.”🔽The word “non-ox” is not a basis for the word “cow” because the word “non-ox” is not a basis for the word “ox.”🔽The word “cow” is not a basis for the word “non-ox” because the word “cow” is not a basis for the word “ox.”🔽The word “non-ox” is not a basis for the word “cow” because the word “non-ox” is not a basis for the word “ox.”🔽The word “cow” is not a basis for the word “non-ox” because the word “cow” is not a basis for the word “ox.”🔽The word “non-ox” is not a basis for the word “cow” because the word “non-ox” is not a basis for the word “ox.”🔽The word “cow” is not a basis for the word “non-ox” because the word “cow” is not a basis for the word “ox.”🔽The word “non-ox” is not a basis for the word “cow” because the word “non-ox” is not a basis for the word “ox.”🔽The word “cow” is not a basis for the word “non-ox” because the word “cow” is not a basis for the word “ox.”

original: nyan @74a * //🔽pa po gang dag spyi gzhan bsal nas /🔽yan gar ba don du gnyer ba yin te /🔽'di ltar ci shing 'di sa las byung ba'am /
analyzed: nyan @74a * //🔽pa po gang dag spyi gzhan bsal nas /🔽yan gar ba don du gnyer ba yin te /🔽'di ltar ci shing 'di sa las byung ba'am /
translated: The word “non-ox” is not

original: 'on te 'byung ba lnga las byung ba yin zhes pa las las byung ba'o zhes brjod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'on te 'byung ba lnga las byung ba yin zhes pa las las byung ba'o zhes brjod pa bzhin no //
translated: Or is it produced from the five elements? ” The answer is, “It is produced from action.”

original: de nges pa'i ltar na ni de'i shing las las byung ba'i sgra sbyor ro zhes pa'i the tshom gang las yin zhes de'i nges pa'o zhes pa 'di 'ba' zhig las the tshom 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de nges pa'i ltar na ni de'i shing las las byung ba'i sgra sbyor ro zhes pa'i the tshom gang las yin zhes de'i nges pa'o zhes pa 'di 'ba' zhig las the tshom 'byung ba yin no //
translated: If that is the case, then the doubt, “What is the source of the sound of the tree?” would arise from the statement, “The sound of the tree is produced from the tree.”

original: gangs las 'byung ba 'ba' zhig thos so zhes pa yod na srid do //
analyzed: gangs las 'byung ba 'ba' zhig thos so zhes pa yod na srid do //
translated: But if one hears only “produced from snow,” it is possible.

original: yan gar ba'i sbyor ba'o zhes pa'i nyes pa ni med do //
analyzed: yan gar ba'i sbyor ba'o zhes pa'i nyes pa ni med do //
translated: There is no fault in the expression “produced from snow alone.”

original: ji ltar don gzhan sel ba de bzhin du spyi yang /🔽sgra gzhan rnam par dpyad nas ni //
analyzed: ji ltar don gzhan sel ba de bzhin du spyi yang / sgra gzhan rnam par dpyad nas ni //
translated: Just as the exclusion of other objects, so also the universal

original: sgra'i spyi rjod par byed pa yin /
analyzed: sgra'i spyi rjod par byed pa yin /
translated: is expressed by the word “universal”🔽after analyzing other words.

original: ji ltar byas pas ma byas pa rnam par bsal ba'i spyi'i mi rtag pa la sogs pa go bar byed pa bzhin du sgra gzhan rnam par dpyad pa'i sgra'i spyis rjod par byed do //
analyzed: ji ltar byas pas ma byas pa rnam par bsal ba'i spyi'i mi rtag pa la sogs pa go bar byed pa bzhin du sgra gzhan rnam par dpyad pa'i sgra'i spyis rjod par byed do //
translated: Just as the word “impermanent” expresses the universal of impermanence, which excludes that which is not impermanent, after analyzing that which is not impermanent, in the same way, the word “universal” expresses the universal of sound after analyzing other words.

original: don la sbyar bar bya ba ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: don la sbyar bar bya ba ma yin pa ste /
translated: and it is not to be applied to the meaning.

original: de la yang /
analyzed: de la yang /
translated: And in this regard,

original: don gang la gcig the tshom za ;
analyzed: don gang la gcig the tshom za ;
translated: when there is doubt about one meaning,

original: / gang du aaksha la sogs pa'i sgra'i don shing rta'i gshol mda' la sogs pa la the tshom skyed par byed do //🔽de la sgra gcig nyid /
analyzed: / gang du aaksha la sogs pa'i sgra'i don shing rta'i gshol mda' la sogs pa la the tshom skyed par byed do // de la sgra gcig nyid /
translated: where there is doubt about the meaning of the word akṣa, etc., with regard to the meaning of a chariot’s axle, etc.

original: du ma la the tshom na yang //
analyzed: du ma la the tshom na yang //
translated: And when there is doubt about the one word🔽with regard to many meanings,

original: der sgra la sogs pa dag la sgra la sogs par the tshom za ru chug na yang de la nyan pa pos spyi la yang sgra'i bye brag blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: der sgra la sogs pa dag la sgra la sogs par the tshom za ru chug na yang de la nyan pa pos spyi la yang sgra'i bye brag blta bar bya'o //
translated: even though one may doubt that the word, etc. is a word, etc., the listener should look at the particular word, etc. in the universal.

original: yang ji ltar na sgras don gzhan bsal nas /
analyzed: yang ji ltar na sgras don gzhan bsal nas /
translated: Moreover, how is it that a word, having excluded other meanings,

original: rang gi don brjod de /
analyzed: rang gi don brjod de /
translated: expresses its own meaning?

original: skyon snga ma rnams su thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyon snga ma rnams su thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The previous faults would follow.🔽In this way,

original: 'di ltar / sgra yis don gzhan ma mthong yang //
analyzed: 'di ltar / sgra yis don gzhan ma mthong yang //
translated: even though a word does not see another meaning,

original: rang don cha shas ston pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rang don cha shas ston pa'i phyir //
translated: because it reveals a portion of its own meaning,

original: sgra yis 'brel ba shin tu sla //
analyzed: sgra yis 'brel ba shin tu sla //
translated: the connection with the word is very easy.

original: 'khrul pa nyid kyang yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid kyang yod ma yin //
translated: And there is no error.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ni sgras don brjod pa'i sgo nas de dag dang 'dra ba dang / mi 'dra ba dag la 'jug pa dang mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ni sgras don brjod pa'i sgo nas de dag dang 'dra ba dang / mi 'dra ba dag la 'jug pa dang mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: The concomitance and the reverse concomitance are the application and the non-application of the word to the similar and the dissimilar.

original: de la 'dra ba la ni gdon mi za bar thams cad la ni 'jug par ma brjod do //
analyzed: de la 'dra ba la ni gdon mi za bar thams cad la ni 'jug par ma brjod do //
translated: In the similar, the word is necessarily applied to all.

original: mtha' med ba'i don kha cig ni mi brjod pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mtha' med ba'i don kha cig ni mi brjod pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But in the dissimilar, the word is not necessarily applied to all, because it is possible that some of the dissimilar are not expressed.

original: mi 'dra ba las na don yod du zin kyang mtha' med pa la 'jug par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mi 'dra ba las na don yod du zin kyang mtha' med pa la 'jug par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: And even when the dissimilar are expressed, the word is not capable of being applied to all the dissimilar,

original: ma brjod pa ni ma mthong ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma brjod pa ni ma mthong ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because non-expression is merely non-perception.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rang dang 'brel pa can dag las gzhan la ma mthong ba'i phyir de rnam par spyad pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni rang gi don rjod par byed pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rang dang 'brel pa can dag las gzhan la ma mthong ba'i phyir de rnam par spyad pa'i rjes su dpag pa ni rang gi don rjod par byed pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, because it is not perceived in anything other than what is related to it, the inference of the exclusion is said to be the expression of the meaning for itself.

original: rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas kyang dngos po gcig @74b rjes su dpog pa la shing sha pa la sogs par snang ba the tshom du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas kyang dngos po gcig @74b rjes su dpog pa la shing sha pa la sogs par snang ba the tshom du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: And by the method of concomitance, there is doubt about the appearance of a tree, etc., in the inference of a single entity.

original: the tshom de bzhin du sa las byung ba ni rdzas ma yin pa la sogs pa nyid du snang ba the tshom du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: the tshom de bzhin du sa las byung ba ni rdzas ma yin pa la sogs pa nyid du snang ba the tshom du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: And in the same way, there is doubt about the appearance of non-substance, etc. in the inference of earth, etc.

original: gang du shing gi sgra sa las byung ba la sogs pa ma yin pa la ma mthong ba de'i phyir ldog pa nyid las rjes su dpag pa'o ;
analyzed: gang du shing gi sgra sa las byung ba la sogs pa ma yin pa la ma mthong ba de'i phyir ldog pa nyid las rjes su dpag pa'o ;
translated: And because the word tree is not seen to apply to non-earth, etc., the exclusion itself is inferred from the word.

original: / yang brjod pa /
analyzed: / yang brjod pa /
translated: Again it is said:

original: shing dang sa las byung dang rdzas //
analyzed: shing dang sa las byung dang rdzas //
translated: A tree, earth, substance,

original: yod dang gzhal bya rim bzlog pas //
analyzed: yod dang gzhal bya rim bzlog pas //
translated: existence, and the object of knowledge, in reverse order,

original: gzhi gsum gnyis gcig the tshom du //
analyzed: gzhi gsum gnyis gcig the tshom du //
translated: are the three grounds of doubt,

original: 'gyur gzhan nges pa'i rgyu mtshan yin //
analyzed: 'gyur gzhan nges pa'i rgyu mtshan yin //
translated: and the other is the reason for certainty.

original: zhes bya ba bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
translated: This is an intermediate verse.

original: 'brel pa can gyi phyogs gzhan nas sgra'am rtags kyi rang bzhin don brjod pa'i cha yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa can gyi phyogs gzhan nas sgra'am rtags kyi rang bzhin don brjod pa'i cha yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The word or the nature of the sign does not have the part that expresses the meaning in another related place.

original: de'i don du ma nyid la rnam pa thams cad du rab tu sbyor ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i don du ma nyid la rnam pa thams cad du rab tu sbyor ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible for the word “cow” to be applied in every way to non-cow.

original: rang gi don la 'khrul pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi don la 'khrul pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there error with regard to its own meaning,

original: tha dad par rjod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad par rjod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is expressed as distinct.

original: de ltar na re zhig nyes pa snga ma med do //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig nyes pa snga ma med do //
translated: Thus, there is no first fault.

original: yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not nonexistent.

original: ji ltar zhe na 'di ltar /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na 'di ltar /
translated: How is that?

original: gzhan la khyab pa bkag pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan la khyab pa bkag pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the pervader is negated in the other,

original: tha dad don ni tha dad min //
analyzed: tha dad don ni tha dad min //
translated: the distinct meaning is not distinct.

original: spyi'i sgras ni gang don gzhan rnam par gsal bar byas pa rang gi bye brag de mi 'phen pas na tha dad pa'i sgra dang gzhi mthun pa dang lhan cig par 'thad do //
analyzed: spyi'i sgras ni gang don gzhan rnam par gsal bar byas pa rang gi bye brag de mi 'phen pas na tha dad pa'i sgra dang gzhi mthun pa dang lhan cig par 'thad do //
translated: Since the word “universal” does not indicate its own particular that is clarified by the other meaning, it is tenable that it is concomitant with the word “distinct.”

original: des na 'di'i tha dad pa'i don dang sgra tha dad pa'i nyes pa med do //
analyzed: des na 'di'i tha dad pa'i don dang sgra tha dad pa'i nyes pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault of the word “distinct” having a distinct meaning.

original: de ni mthun pa'i sgra dang don gzhan sel ba'i don gnyis ka sgra'i brjod bya'o //
analyzed: de ni mthun pa'i sgra dang don gzhan sel ba'i don gnyis ka sgra'i brjod bya'o //
translated: Thus, the word “universal” has two meanings: the concordant and the exclusion of other, both of which are the expressed meaning of the word.

original: de lta na rang gi don la mi 'khrul ba ste /
analyzed: de lta na rang gi don la mi 'khrul ba ste /
translated: Thus, there is no error with regard to its own meaning.

original: yan gar ba ni gzhan la 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yan gar ba ni gzhan la 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: The individual is not engaged in another.

original: nyes pa phyi ma yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nyes pa phyi ma yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there the subsequent fault.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it?

original: dngos 'jug tha dad min phyir yang //
analyzed: dngos 'jug tha dad min phyir yang //
translated: Because the engagement of the entity is not different.

original: don gzhan nye bar len pa'i sgras rang rang gis tha dad pa rnams la 'jug pa ni med do //
analyzed: don gzhan nye bar len pa'i sgras rang rang gis tha dad pa rnams la 'jug pa ni med do //
translated: The word “other” does not engage in the different things of its own.

original: de'i phyir dang gzhan gyi dbang gis rang gi ngang gis tha dad pa mi 'phen pa'i nyes pa med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir dang gzhan gyi dbang gis rang gi ngang gis tha dad pa mi 'phen pa'i nyes pa med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault of the non-implication of the difference by nature of the dependent.

original: tha dad thug pa med phyir dang // khyab par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir rjod par byed pa ma yin pas spyi'i nyes pa yang med do //
analyzed: tha dad thug pa med phyir dang // khyab par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir rjod par byed pa ma yin pas spyi'i nyes pa yang med do //
translated: Because the difference is not ultimate and because it is not a pervader, there is no fault of the general.

original: don gzhan sel ba tsam ni tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / rdzas ma yin pa'i phyir yang ngo //
analyzed: don gzhan sel ba tsam ni tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / rdzas ma yin pa'i phyir yang ngo //
translated: The mere exclusion of other things is not different, and it is not a substance.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir spyi'i bye brag gzhan dang ldan pa btsal bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'dir spyi'i bye brag gzhan dang ldan pa btsal bar mi bya ste /
translated: For that very reason, here the particular of the general should not be sought in another,

original: dngos su don gzhan 'gegs pa yin pa'i phyir na'o //
analyzed: dngos su don gzhan 'gegs pa yin pa'i phyir na'o //
translated: because it is the actual exclusion of other things.

original: de ltar sngar brjod pa'i skyon med pa'i phyir don gzhan sel ba nyid sgra'i don yin na mdzes so //
analyzed: de ltar sngar brjod pa'i skyon med pa'i phyir don gzhan sel ba nyid sgra'i don yin na mdzes so //
translated: Thus, since the previously mentioned faults do not apply, it is beautiful that the meaning of a word is the exclusion of other.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: rigs kyi chos rnams rnam par @75a * //
analyzed: rigs kyi chos rnams rnam par @75a * //
translated: The properties of a class are🔽present in it.

original: gnas ; / rigs kyi chos rnams zhes pa ni gcig nyid dang / rtag pa nyid dang / so so ba kun la khyab pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid brtag par bya /
analyzed: gnas ; / rigs kyi chos rnams zhes pa ni gcig nyid dang / rtag pa nyid dang / so so ba kun la khyab pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid brtag par bya /
translated: The properties of a class are the characteristics of oneness, permanence, and the pervasiveness of each.

original: 'di nyid la rnam par gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di nyid la rnam par gnas pa yin te /
translated: They are present in it,

original: tha mi dad pa'i phyir dang / rten rnam par ma chad pa'i phyir dang / don ma lus pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tha mi dad pa'i phyir dang / rten rnam par ma chad pa'i phyir dang / don ma lus pa rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya'o //
translated: because there is no difference, because the substratum is not destroyed, and because all objects are understood.

original: de ltar na brjod pa'i nyes pa med pa'i phyir dang / yon tan yod pa'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi sgra'i don gzhan bzlog pas khyad par du byas pa nyid brjod do //
analyzed: de ltar na brjod pa'i nyes pa med pa'i phyir dang / yon tan yod pa'i phyir dngos po rnams kyi sgra'i don gzhan bzlog pas khyad par du byas pa nyid brjod do //
translated: Thus, since the faults of the expression do not apply and since there are good qualities, the meaning of a word is said to be a thing qualified by the exclusion of other.

original: gal te de ltar na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na /
translated: If that is so,

original: gang las gzhan sel nges she na /
analyzed: gang las gzhan sel nges she na /
translated: how is the exclusion of other ascertained?

original: gal te gzugs kyi sgras ro la sogs pa sel gyi /
analyzed: gal te gzugs kyi sgras ro la sogs pa sel gyi /
translated: If the word form excludes taste, etc.,

original: kha dog gis lhag par ma brjod pa'i phyir lhag ma sel du zin kyang /
analyzed: kha dog gis lhag par ma brjod pa'i phyir lhag ma sel du zin kyang /
translated: Because color is not mentioned as a remainder, even though it is included in the remainder,

original: shin tu tha dad pa de ji ltar byed pa yin /
analyzed: shin tu tha dad pa de ji ltar byed pa yin /
translated: how can it be a remainder that is completely different?

original: gang dag tha mi dad pa'i gzugs nyid 'dod pa la ni nyes pa de dag yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang dag tha mi dad pa'i gzugs nyid 'dod pa la ni nyes pa de dag yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Those who assert that form is not different from the other aggregates do not have that fault.

original: sngon po la sogs pa nyid ro la sogs pa yod pa ma yin pas so zhe na /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa nyid ro la sogs pa yod pa ma yin pas so zhe na /
translated: Because blue and so on do not exist in taste and so forth.

original: nyes pa de ni med de 'di ltar /
analyzed: nyes pa de ni med de 'di ltar /
translated: That fault does not exist because it is like this.

original: 'jig rten grags pa'i rjes mi btsal //
analyzed: 'jig rten grags pa'i rjes mi btsal //
translated: Do not seek to analyze what is known in the world.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
translated: The Bhagavān also said:

original: so so'i skye bo'i ming la mngon par zhen par mi bya zhing 'jig rten pa'i ming la yang mngon par mi rgyug go zhes gsungs so //🔽de'i phyir kho bo cag gis ni rgyu mtshan las byung ba dang / yongs su bshad pa las byung ba 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad du yin gyi /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i ming la mngon par zhen par mi bya zhing 'jig rten pa'i ming la yang mngon par mi rgyug go zhes gsungs so // de'i phyir kho bo cag gis ni rgyu mtshan las byung ba dang / yongs su bshad pa las byung ba 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad du yin gyi /
translated: Do not cling to the name of an ordinary being and do not pursue the name of the world.

original: yang dag pa'i don nyid du tshol bar mi byed do //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i don nyid du tshol bar mi byed do //
translated: Therefore we do not seek to analyze what is known in the world as arising from a reason or arising from a complete explanation, but rather as the meaning of reality.

original: 'jig rten pa bzhin du go bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa bzhin du go bar bya ste /
translated: We understand it to be like the world.

original: 'jig rten pa la gzugs kyi sgra sngon po la sogs pa las grub kyi //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa la gzugs kyi sgra sngon po la sogs pa las grub kyi //
translated: The word “form” is established in the world for blue, yellow, etc.,

original: ro la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ro la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but not for taste, etc.

original: de ltar gzugs nyid la mtshungs 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar gzugs nyid la mtshungs 'gyur //
translated: Thus, form itself is similar.

original: gang yang shin tu tha dad pa'i sngon po la sogs pa 'jug pa'i gzugs nyid de ro la sogs pa la cis ma yin /
analyzed: gang yang shin tu tha dad pa'i sngon po la sogs pa 'jug pa'i gzugs nyid de ro la sogs pa la cis ma yin /
translated: But why is the word “form” not applied to taste, etc., since form is that which is engaged by the eye, which is quite different from taste, etc.?

original: ro la sogs pa la mi 'jug na ni der ser po la sogs pa yang mi 'jug go //
analyzed: ro la sogs pa la mi 'jug na ni der ser po la sogs pa yang mi 'jug go //
translated: If the word “form” is not applied to taste, etc., then the word “form” should not be applied to yellow, etc., either.

original: gal te 'di la rgyu yod de /
analyzed: gal te 'di la rgyu yod de /
translated: But if you say that the word “form” is applied to taste, etc., because of a cause,

original: mig gi gzung bya nyid ni sngon po la sogs pa nyid dang tha mi dad cing ro la sogs pa la med pa ni rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa las so zhe na /
analyzed: mig gi gzung bya nyid ni sngon po la sogs pa nyid dang tha mi dad cing ro la sogs pa la med pa ni rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa las so zhe na /
translated: then the fact that the object of the eye is not different from blue, etc., and is not found in taste, etc., is due to a difference in nature.

original: de ltar na ni /🔽mig gzung bya nyid bya bar byas //
analyzed: de ltar na ni / mig gzung bya nyid bya bar byas //
translated: If that is so,🔽then the object of the eye is made into the object of the eye.

original: mig gi gzung byar gzung ba mig gi gzung bya yin pa de lta na ni bya ba'i rgyu mtshan nas sngon po la sogs pa la gzugs kyi sgrar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: mig gi gzung byar gzung ba mig gi gzung bya yin pa de lta na ni bya ba'i rgyu mtshan nas sngon po la sogs pa la gzugs kyi sgrar 'gyur gyi /
translated: If the object of the eye is apprehended as the object of the eye, then the word “form” is applied to blue, etc., on the basis of the cause of the object of the eye.

original: rigs kyi rgyu mtshan nas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs kyi rgyu mtshan nas ni ma yin no //
translated: but not from the reason of the class.

original: mig gi gzung bya nyid tha mi dad na ni cis @75b na gzugs nyid yin //
analyzed: mig gi gzung bya nyid tha mi dad na ni cis @75b na gzugs nyid yin //
translated: If the object of the eye is not different, then why is it form?

original: ci ste gzugs nyid dang 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan mig gi gzung bya nyid brjod do zhe na //
analyzed: ci ste gzugs nyid dang 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan mig gi gzung bya nyid brjod do zhe na //
translated: If you say that the reason of the object of the eye is the connection with form,

original: de lta na dang pas de dag la'ang gzugs nyid yod par thal bar 'gyur ro /🔽nyid kyi mngon par gsal ba 'thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na dang pas de dag la'ang gzugs nyid yod par thal bar 'gyur ro / nyid kyi mngon par gsal ba 'thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it follows that form exists in the other elements as well.🔽The eye is the basis for the manifestation of the eye consciousness.

original: mig gi gzung bya spyi nyid kyang rung ste /
analyzed: mig gi gzung bya spyi nyid kyang rung ste /
translated: The object of the eye is either the universal or the particular.

original: gal te nges pa yin zhes gdon mi za bar dngos po pa nyid rten du bya'o //
analyzed: gal te nges pa yin zhes gdon mi za bar dngos po pa nyid rten du bya'o //
translated: If it is the universal, then the universal must be a real entity.

original: rdzas la sogs par thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rdzas la sogs par thal bar 'gyur //
translated: It follows that it is a substance.

original: rdzas dang grangs dang bong tshod la sogs pa yang mig gi gzung bar bya ba yin pas de dag la'ang gzugs nyid yod par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzas dang grangs dang bong tshod la sogs pa yang mig gi gzung bar bya ba yin pas de dag la'ang gzugs nyid yod par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since number, size, and so on are also objects of the eye, it follows that form exists in those as well.🔽Moreover,

original: gzhan yang / dkar min sogs la khyad med 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan yang / dkar min sogs la khyad med 'gyur //
translated: white and so on would be undifferentiated.

original: mig gi gzung bya nyid du khyad par med pa yin pas sngon po dang ser po dang / ches sngo ba dang / ches shin tu sngo ba'o zhes bya ba'i khyad par med par 'gyur //
analyzed: mig gi gzung bya nyid du khyad par med pa yin pas sngon po dang ser po dang / ches sngo ba dang / ches shin tu sngo ba'o zhes bya ba'i khyad par med par 'gyur //
translated: because there would be no difference in their being objects of the eye. There would be no difference in the expressions “blue and yellow,” “very blue,” and “very, very blue.”

original: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar mig gi gzung bya nyid med par /
analyzed: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar mig gi gzung bya nyid med par /
translated: Therefore, without doubt,

original: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i tha dad pa la yang gzugs kyi sgra 'jig rten la grags pa khas blang bar bya ba'i ro la sogs pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon po dang ser po la sogs pa'i tha dad pa la yang gzugs kyi sgra 'jig rten la grags pa khas blang bar bya ba'i ro la sogs pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: the expression “form” is to be accepted as a conventional term for the world, for the differences of blue, yellow, etc., but not for taste, etc.

original: de lta bas na gzhan sel ba nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na gzhan sel ba nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the exclusion of other is ascertained.

original: gal te don gzhan las log pa la mi ltos par sgra'i don rjod pa de'i ltar na ni /
analyzed: gal te don gzhan las log pa la mi ltos par sgra'i don rjod pa de'i ltar na ni /
translated: If the meaning of a word were expressed without regard to the exclusion of other objects,

original: rjes 'gro 'ba' zhig las gru ba 'gyur //
analyzed: rjes 'gro 'ba' zhig las gru ba 'gyur //
translated: then the word would be established from mere concomitance.

original: sgra'i don rjod par byed pa'i lta na ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra'i don rjod par byed pa'i lta na ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: If the meaning of a word were expressed by the view, then the desired meaning would not be established from concomitance and exclusion.

original: khyad par gzhan gnyis ka nges par bzung bas rjod par byed pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par gzhan gnyis ka nges par bzung bas rjod par byed pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In particular, the other two are expressed by the exclusion of the other, because the expression is accompanied by the result.

original: ldog pa'i phyogs la ni don rjod par byed pa dper na ches shin tu byed par byed pa dang las bzhin no //
analyzed: ldog pa'i phyogs la ni don rjod par byed pa dper na ches shin tu byed par byed pa dang las bzhin no //
translated: In the case of the opposite, the expression is accompanied by the result, as in the case of the very active and the very passive.

original: gal te sgra'i don gzhan sel ba tsam yin na ni ldog pa 'ba'i zhig rjod par byed pa yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te sgra'i don gzhan sel ba tsam yin na ni ldog pa 'ba'i zhig rjod par byed pa yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If the meaning of the word is the mere exclusion of the other, then the expression would be accompanied by the opposite.

original: gal te rjes su 'gro ba mi 'dod na ni de ltar 'gyur na dngos po'i phyogs nas ni /
analyzed: gal te rjes su 'gro ba mi 'dod na ni de ltar 'gyur na dngos po'i phyogs nas ni /
translated: If you do not accept the pervasion, then that would be the case, but from the perspective of the thing,

original: khyab pa dngos su 'dod ma yin //
analyzed: khyab pa dngos su 'dod ma yin //
translated: the pervasion is not accepted in actuality.

original: dngos po rnams la tha dad pa'am tha mi dad par 'gyur ba'i rigs ni srid pa ma yin no zhes brjod zin to //
analyzed: dngos po rnams la tha dad pa'am tha mi dad par 'gyur ba'i rigs ni srid pa ma yin no zhes brjod zin to //
translated: It has already been said that it is impossible for things to be either different or non-different.

original: sgra'i don gzhan ma mthong yang zhes bya ba 'di'i skabs su rigs med par don gzhan gsal bas khyad par du byas pa'i don la sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ni don gzhan med pa yin no zhes bstan to //🔽'ga' zhig na re 'di skad du //
analyzed: sgra'i don gzhan ma mthong yang zhes bya ba 'di'i skabs su rigs med par don gzhan gsal bas khyad par du byas pa'i don la sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ni don gzhan med pa yin no zhes bstan to // 'ga' zhig na re 'di skad du //
translated: Although the meaning of the word is not seen as different, in this context, it is taught that the word is applied to and withdrawn from an object qualified by a different object, namely, manifestation, without a universal.

original: ba lang la sogs pa'i bsal ba thams cad med pa las rnam par gyur pa ste //🔽thams @76a * //
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa'i bsal ba thams cad med pa las rnam par gyur pa ste // thams @76a * //
translated: Some say: In this way, all instances of the word cow are distinguished from noncow,

original: cad kyi bdag nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yod pa ma yin pa'i bdag nyid du rab tu thob pa nyid do zhes zer ba la /🔽'dir / thams cad med pa dang 'brel zhes //
analyzed: cad kyi bdag nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yod pa ma yin pa'i bdag nyid du rab tu thob pa nyid do zhes zer ba la / 'dir / thams cad med pa dang 'brel zhes //
translated: and since it would follow that all are the nature of cow, they are definitely established as having the nature of nonexistence.🔽Here, it is said:

original: gang zhig khas len du 'gro na //🔽yod de du ma'i bdag nyid las //
analyzed: gang zhig khas len du 'gro na // yod de du ma'i bdag nyid las //
translated: If one asserts that all are related to nonexistence,

original: yin zhes ci zhig gang gis sbyor //
analyzed: yin zhes ci zhig gang gis sbyor //
translated: then how could one apply the word🔽to an existent that is the nature of many?

original: gal te de ltar khas len par byed na ni thams cad med pa dang 'brel pa yin no zhes pa de la yod pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan pa lang la sogs pa'i med pa ni gang yin /
analyzed: gal te de ltar khas len par byed na ni thams cad med pa dang 'brel pa yin no zhes pa de la yod pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan pa lang la sogs pa'i med pa ni gang yin /
translated: What is the nonexistence of a cow, etc., that is different from the existence of a cow, etc.?

original: ba lang la sogs pa yod par sgro btags pa thams cad ni rjes su 'gro ba las khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ba lang la sogs pa yod par sgro btags pa thams cad ni rjes su 'gro ba las khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: All superimpositions of the existence of cows, etc., must be accepted to be related to nonexistence.

original: thams cad med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i lan 'di ni sbyar bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i lan 'di ni sbyar bar mi bya'o //
translated: The response that it follows that everything is nonexistent should not be applied.

original: gang 'ga' zhig na re /🔽med pa dang yod pa dag shes pa tha dad du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang 'ga' zhig na re / med pa dang yod pa dag shes pa tha dad du mi 'gyur te /
translated: Someone might say,🔽“Nonexistence and existence are not different cognitions because the cognition of a pot, etc., is seen to be a cognition of clay, and the cognition of a nature is seen to change.”

original: kham phor la sogs pa la 'jim pa'i shes pa bzhin rang bzhin gyi shes pa 'gyur ba la yang mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ba de la /
analyzed: kham phor la sogs pa la 'jim pa'i shes pa bzhin rang bzhin gyi shes pa 'gyur ba la yang mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ba de la /
translated: If you assert that the cognition of a pot, etc.,

original: 'jim pa tha dad la kham phor //🔽la sogs tha dad blor 'dod na //
analyzed: 'jim pa tha dad la kham phor // la sogs tha dad blor 'dod na //
translated: is different in regard to different clay,

original: med tha dad pa gzhan min yang //
analyzed: med tha dad pa gzhan min yang //
translated: then, although different nonexistences are not different,🔽the cognition of a pot, etc.,

original: tha dad ci blo ci ste dgag / ji ltar 'jim pa las gzhan ma yin na ni de tsam gyi blor thal bar 'gyur ba la /
analyzed: tha dad ci blo ci ste dgag / ji ltar 'jim pa las gzhan ma yin na ni de tsam gyi blor thal bar 'gyur ba la /
translated: If they are not different from clay, it follows that there would be only the cognition of clay.

original: gang gis na bsgrub pa'i sgo nas kham phor la sogs pa'i blo tha dad khas len par byed /
analyzed: gang gis na bsgrub pa'i sgo nas kham phor la sogs pa'i blo tha dad khas len par byed /
translated: But why do you not accept that the cognition of a pot and so on is different in terms of the object?

original: de bzhin du med pa la yod pa'i blo tha dad pa ni sgra'i rang bzhin tha dad pa'i dbang gis so zhes ci nas mi 'dod /
analyzed: de bzhin du med pa la yod pa'i blo tha dad pa ni sgra'i rang bzhin tha dad pa'i dbang gis so zhes ci nas mi 'dod /
translated: Likewise, why do you not accept that the cognition of existence and nonexistence is different due to the power of the difference in the nature of the words?

original: khyed kyi yang /
analyzed: khyed kyi yang /
translated: In your system,🔽the supreme nature of the qualities,

original: yon tan rnams kyi rang bzhin mchog / snang ba'i lam du gang ma gyur //🔽snang ba'i lam du gang gyur pa //
analyzed: yon tan rnams kyi rang bzhin mchog / snang ba'i lam du gang ma gyur // snang ba'i lam du gang gyur pa //
translated: which does not become the path of appearance,

original: sgyu ma bzhin du shin tu stong //
analyzed: sgyu ma bzhin du shin tu stong //
translated: is like an illusion, completely empty.

original: phan tshun tha dad dag yod kyang //
analyzed: phan tshun tha dad dag yod kyang //
translated: Although they exist as mutually different,

original: nog la sogs pa mthong ba las //
analyzed: nog la sogs pa mthong ba las //
translated: from seeing the hump and so on,

original: de'i blo dper brjod 'gal ba de //
analyzed: de'i blo dper brjod 'gal ba de //
translated: the cognition of an ox is an example of contradiction.

original: khyed kyi lugs la brten pa yin //
analyzed: khyed kyi lugs la brten pa yin //
translated: This is based on your system.

original: gang ba lang ma yin pa las log pa'i ba lang gi blo de ji ltar na nog la sogs pa mthong ba'i rgyu mtshan can du smra bar byed /
analyzed: gang ba lang ma yin pa las log pa'i ba lang gi blo de ji ltar na nog la sogs pa mthong ba'i rgyu mtshan can du smra bar byed /
translated: How could the cognition of a cow that is the opposite of non-cow be said to have as its reason the seeing of a dewlap and so on?

original: ba lang dang nog la sogs pa sgra tha dad pas tha dad du sel ba can yin yang khyod kyi lugs khas blangs nas /
analyzed: ba lang dang nog la sogs pa sgra tha dad pas tha dad du sel ba can yin yang khyod kyi lugs khas blangs nas /
translated: Even though the cow and the dewlap and so on are different in sound and are different in the exclusion, you accept this system.

original: 'gal bzhin du yang de nges par bstan to //
analyzed: 'gal bzhin du yang de nges par bstan to //
translated: Even though they are contradictory, you still insist on teaching this!

original: de mi ltos shes pa 'di ni //
analyzed: de mi ltos shes pa 'di ni //
translated: This cognition that does not depend on that

original: rang gi rnam rtog spros par zad //
analyzed: rang gi rnam rtog spros par zad //
translated: is just the proliferation of your own thoughts.

original: sel ba min pa'i sgra yis ni //
analyzed: sel ba min pa'i sgra yis ni //
translated: A word that does not exclude

original: rang bzhin 'ga' yang brjod mi bya //
analyzed: rang bzhin 'ga' yang brjod mi bya //
translated: does not express any nature at all.

original: nog la sogs pa la spyi'i ngo bo dang ldan pa gzhan med par mi ltos pa ni mi srid do zhes sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: nog la sogs pa la spyi'i ngo bo dang ldan pa gzhan med par mi ltos pa ni mi srid do zhes sngar bshad zin to //
translated: As was explained earlier, it is impossible for the dewlap and so on not to depend on something else that possesses a general nature.

original: rang gi ngo bo ni brjod @76b par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir de'i sgo nas tha snyad du mi bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni brjod @76b par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir de'i sgo nas tha snyad du mi bya'o //
translated: Since its own nature is not to be expressed, it is not to be conventionally designated.

original: gang dag dang po'i shes pa med do zhes zer ba de la /
analyzed: gang dag dang po'i shes pa med do zhes zer ba de la /
translated: To those who say that the initial cognition does not exist,

original: thog ma med phyir 'dod pa grub //
analyzed: thog ma med phyir 'dod pa grub //
translated: we reply: Since there is no beginning, your assertion is established.

original: dang po'i shes pa zhes bya ba ni med pa nyid de /
analyzed: dang po'i shes pa zhes bya ba ni med pa nyid de /
translated: The so-called first cognition does not exist,

original: tha snyad pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag la dus kyi thog ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dag la dus kyi thog ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no beginning in time for the succession of conventional cause and effect.

original: gang la dang po'i shes pa med na ni rigs dang ldan pas khyab par yang mi nus la /
analyzed: gang la dang po'i shes pa med na ni rigs dang ldan pas khyab par yang mi nus la /
translated: If there is no first cognition, then it is not possible to pervade all with the possession of a nature.🔽And it is not possible to determine whether or not the possession of a nature is negated.🔽And it is not the case that one is engaged in all.

original: rigs dang ldan pa las log pa'am ma log par yang mi nus shing gcig mtha' dag la 'jug pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i skyon de dag yod do //
analyzed: rigs dang ldan pa las log pa'am ma log par yang mi nus shing gcig mtha' dag la 'jug pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i skyon de dag yod do //
translated: These are the errors.

original: gang dag shes pa yang dag par rab tu 'jug pa nyid med do zhes pa de la yang brjod pa /
analyzed: gang dag shes pa yang dag par rab tu 'jug pa nyid med do zhes pa de la yang brjod pa /
translated: But for those who say that there is no real engagement of cognition, we say:

original: spyi'i sgo nas sel bar byed //
analyzed: spyi'i sgo nas sel bar byed //
translated: Exclusion is by way of the general.

original: de gzhan rnams la rigs lta bur sel bar byed pa'i rdzas ni med kyi /
analyzed: de gzhan rnams la rigs lta bur sel bar byed pa'i rdzas ni med kyi /
translated: There is no substance that excludes one thing from another, like a nature.

original: 'on kyang 'di ltar rnam par bcad par bya ba'i yul la gang spyi'i chos kyis yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di ltar rnam par bcad par bya ba'i yul la gang spyi'i chos kyis yin te /
translated: However, it is like this: the object of exclusion is a general property.

original: 'di la yang /
analyzed: 'di la yang /
translated: And in this regard,

original: rigs mi mthun pa la ma mthong bar bstan pa tsam gyis rjes su dpog go zhes brjod zin te /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa la ma mthong bar bstan pa tsam gyis rjes su dpog go zhes brjod zin te /
translated: We have already explained that one infers the non-perception of a dissimilar example merely from the teaching of perception of a similar example.

original: khyed kyi phyogs la yang nyes pa de dag mtshungs te /
analyzed: khyed kyi phyogs la yang nyes pa de dag mtshungs te /
translated: The same faults apply to your position.

original: gal te rigs mthun la khyab par 'jug pa'i lta na khyab pa la ni mtha' yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te rigs mthun la khyab par 'jug pa'i lta na khyab pa la ni mtha' yod pa ma yin no //
translated: If you claim that the pervasion is the case because of a similar example, then the pervasion is not established.

original: de'i phyir 'di ltar rva can yin pa'i phyir rta ma yin no zhes bya ba la rva can nyid ma lus par ma mthong ba de rnam par bcad pa rjes su dpag pa'i phyir rta dang ba la sogs pa so sor rnam par sel ba ma yin zhing
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ltar rva can yin pa'i phyir rta ma yin no zhes bya ba la rva can nyid ma lus par ma mthong ba de rnam par bcad pa rjes su dpag pa'i phyir rta dang ba la sogs pa so sor rnam par sel ba ma yin zhing
translated: Therefore, in the case of “It is not a horse because it has horns,” the non-perception of the entirety of that which has horns is not a separate exclusion of a horse, etc.

original: / ba lang la sogs pa so so la 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: / ba lang la sogs pa so so la 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: Nor is it the case that it applies to each individual cow, etc.

original: yin na yang ldog pa dang 'jug pa dag ni blo de bzhin du 'di la yang rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: yin na yang ldog pa dang 'jug pa dag ni blo de bzhin du 'di la yang rigs pa yin no //
translated: However, it is reasonable that the exclusion and the application are like that cognition in this case as well.

original: bdag gzhan yod par khas len na //
analyzed: bdag gzhan yod par khas len na //
translated: If you accept that self and other exist,

original: gcig nyid du nyid kyis brtag pa //
analyzed: gcig nyid du nyid kyis brtag pa //
translated: then it is reasonable to analyze whether they are the same or different.

original: de dag dngos po la mi rigs //
analyzed: de dag dngos po la mi rigs //
translated: It is unreasonable for them to be entities.

original: gal te bdag dngos po la yod na ni de la gcig dang du ma nyid du brtag par mi rigs so //
analyzed: gal te bdag dngos po la yod na ni de la gcig dang du ma nyid du brtag par mi rigs so //
translated: If the self exists as a real entity, it is not reasonable to investigate whether it is one or many.

original: bdag gzhan yod par khas mi len na ni khyod kyi'ang gsal ba nus par 'gyur /
analyzed: bdag gzhan yod par khas mi len na ni khyod kyi'ang gsal ba nus par 'gyur /
translated: If you do not accept that the self and other exist, then your manifestation and potency would be untenable.

original: gal te dngos po la med na ni brtag pa de dag rigs na khyod kyi'ang gsal ba dang nus pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te dngos po la med na ni brtag pa de dag rigs na khyod kyi'ang gsal ba dang nus pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If they do not exist as real entities, then those investigations are reasonable, and your manifestation and potency would be the same.

original: gal te nus pa rnams kyi gsal ba dang mi gsal ba gcig nyid yin na ni gsal ba'i dbye ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te nus pa rnams kyi gsal ba dang mi gsal ba gcig nyid yin na ni gsal ba'i dbye ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the manifestation and non-manifestation of potencies are the same, then there would be no difference in manifestation.

original: ci ste du ma nyid yin na ni nus pa 'di rnams las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir gtso bo gcig ces bya ba 'gal lo //🔽sgra yi brjod @77a * //
analyzed: ci ste du ma nyid yin na ni nus pa 'di rnams las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir gtso bo gcig ces bya ba 'gal lo // sgra yi brjod @77a * //
translated: If they are many, then because they are not different from these potencies, it contradicts your claim that there is one primal substance.

original: don la dpyod pa //
analyzed: don la dpyod pa //
translated: The investigation of the meaning of the words

original: 'di yang dbang po'i spyod yul min //🔽gang zhig sgra la sogs pa 'di'i //
analyzed: 'di yang dbang po'i spyod yul min // gang zhig sgra la sogs pa 'di'i //
translated: is also not the domain of the senses.🔽Whatever is the domain of the senses

original: 'jug pa'i dbang po so sor min //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i dbang po so sor min //
translated: is not the individual sense faculty that engages these sounds and so on.

original: mngon sum gyi yul ni bstan du med do //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi yul ni bstan du med do //
translated: The domain of direct perception is not demonstrable.

original: bstan du med pa'i lta na bdag gzhan med pa bdag gzhan yin no zhes brjod pa yin no ;
analyzed: bstan du med pa'i lta na bdag gzhan med pa bdag gzhan yin no zhes brjod pa yin no ;
translated: But when one sees that which is not to be seen, that is, the nonexistence of self and other, one says that there is self and other.

original: / de'i phyir 'di mngon sum gyi 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: / de'i phyir 'di mngon sum gyi 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is not the domain of direct perception.

original: 'di la yang /🔽gang zhig tshig gi brjod pa 'di //🔽ngag las don du rnam par brtags //
analyzed: 'di la yang / gang zhig tshig gi brjod pa 'di // ngag las don du rnam par brtags //
translated: And here:🔽That which is imagined as an object🔽from the expression of words,

original: ngag don so sor snang brjod gang //
analyzed: ngag don so sor snang brjod gang //
translated: that which is expressed as the appearance of the object and the word,

original: de yis dang po nye bar bskyed //
analyzed: de yis dang po nye bar bskyed //
translated: is first generated.

original: tshig gi brjod pa la don med du zin kyang kha yar ba la nus pa med pa'i phyir lung las ji ltar gzhag pa ngag las rnam par 'jog par byed de /
analyzed: tshig gi brjod pa la don med du zin kyang kha yar ba la nus pa med pa'i phyir lung las ji ltar gzhag pa ngag las rnam par 'jog par byed de /
translated: Even though the expression of words has no object, it is established from speech just as it is established from scripture, because the word has the power to do so.

original: rang bzhin dang rkyen bzhin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang rkyen bzhin no //
translated: It is like the case of the intrinsic nature and the conditions.

original: lung nas gzhag pa de yang lung gzhan rnams su mi rigs par 'dzin pa'i phyir 'di don gzhan nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: lung nas gzhag pa de yang lung gzhan rnams su mi rigs par 'dzin pa'i phyir 'di don gzhan nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
translated: And that which is established from scripture is established as having another object, because it is apprehended as unreasonable in other scriptures.

original: de'i phyir tshig gi don gzung bar bya ba'i thabs ngag gi don du snang ba dang po'i ma goms pa'i sgra'i don dang 'brel pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshig gi don gzung bar bya ba'i thabs ngag gi don du snang ba dang po'i ma goms pa'i sgra'i don dang 'brel pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the method of apprehending the meaning of the words is related to the meaning of the words, which is the first appearance of the meaning of speech.

original: ngag nyid dang de'i don dag la dngos su ni sgra'i don du tha dad med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: ngag nyid dang de'i don dag la dngos su ni sgra'i don du tha dad med pa'i phyir la /
translated: This is because the meaning of the words is not different from the speech and its meaning in reality.

original: phyis sgra'i don 'dzin pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis gzhag pa ste lcags kyu med pa pa yin phyir ro //
analyzed: phyis sgra'i don 'dzin pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis gzhag pa ste lcags kyu med pa pa yin phyir ro //
translated: Later, it is posited by the manifest pride of apprehending the meaning of the words, but it is not established by a hook.

original: gang dag so sor snang ba'i don rnams la phyi'i don gzhan nam de dang 'brel pa bor nas ngag gi don du rtogs par byed pa de dag gi ltar na yang de ni rnam par rtog pa tsam yin no //
analyzed: gang dag so sor snang ba'i don rnams la phyi'i don gzhan nam de dang 'brel pa bor nas ngag gi don du rtogs par byed pa de dag gi ltar na yang de ni rnam par rtog pa tsam yin no //
translated: Even for those who realize the meaning of speech in terms of external objects or something related to them, apart from the individually appearing objects, it is still mere conceptualization.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ji ltar goms pa'i ngag dag las //
analyzed: ji ltar goms pa'i ngag dag las //
translated: From speech that is familiar

original: don la med du zin kyang skye //
analyzed: don la med du zin kyang skye //
translated: The meaning arises, even if it does not exist.

original: rang gi rkyen dang rjes 'brel bas //
analyzed: rang gi rkyen dang rjes 'brel bas //
translated: Related to its own conditions,

original: rnam pa du ma so sor rtogs //
analyzed: rnam pa du ma so sor rtogs //
translated: It is individually cognized in many aspects.

original: don du goms pa'i bag chags la ltos pa'i ngag las don byed pa ltar rtogs pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: don du goms pa'i bag chags la ltos pa'i ngag las don byed pa ltar rtogs pa 'byung ste /
translated: In fact, the understanding of the meaning of a word arises in dependence on the habitual tendencies of practice, just as the performance of an action.

original: rtag pa la sogs pa'i brjod pa dang / de dang khyad par med pa dag bzhin phyi rol gyi don med kyang rang gi rkyen dang rjes su 'brel pas rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs pa skyed par byed do //
analyzed: rtag pa la sogs pa'i brjod pa dang / de dang khyad par med pa dag bzhin phyi rol gyi don med kyang rang gi rkyen dang rjes su 'brel pas rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs pa skyed par byed do //
translated: Even though external objects do not exist, various conceptual thoughts are produced because of the connection with their own conditions, just as the words “permanent” and so on and those that are not different from them.

original: 'di ltar rtsed 'jo'i snyan dngags thos pa las chags pa can rnams las 'dod chags dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa skye la /
analyzed: 'di ltar rtsed 'jo'i snyan dngags thos pa las chags pa can rnams las 'dod chags dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa skye la /
translated: Thus, from hearing poetry that is composed for amusement, a consciousness that is in accordance with desire arises in those who are desirous.

original: chags pa dang bral ba rnams la ni yang dag pa'i shugs dang rjes su mthun pa yin no //🔽de yang ngag gi don gzhan las //
analyzed: chags pa dang bral ba rnams la ni yang dag pa'i shugs dang rjes su mthun pa yin no // de yang ngag gi don gzhan las //
translated: But in those who are free from desire, it is in accordance with the power of reality.🔽The meaning of a word is understood

original: rnam par bcad pa'i don du 'dod //
analyzed: rnam par bcad pa'i don du 'dod //
translated: through the exclusion of other meanings.

original: 'brel par shes pa'i ngag @77b gi don //
analyzed: 'brel par shes pa'i ngag @77b gi don //
translated: The meaning of a word that is understood through connection

original: 'di yang rjes dpag las gzhan min //
analyzed: 'di yang rjes dpag las gzhan min //
translated: is also nothing other than inference.

original: so sor snang ba yang rdzas bzhin ngag gzhan las tha dad cing 'brel pa shes pa las yin pas rjes su dpag pa las gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: so sor snang ba yang rdzas bzhin ngag gzhan las tha dad cing 'brel pa shes pa las yin pas rjes su dpag pa las gzhan ma yin no //
translated: The cognition of the individual appearances is also, like the substance, different from the other words and is known through the relation. Therefore, it is not different from inference.🔽The cognition of the various concepts

original: gang zhig ngag las skyes pa yi //🔽rnam rtog sna tshogs shes pa ni //
analyzed: gang zhig ngag las skyes pa yi // rnam rtog sna tshogs shes pa ni //
translated: that arise from the words

original: de yang rang rig yin pas na ;
analyzed: de yang rang rig yin pas na ;
translated: is also self-awareness,

original: / mngon sum nyid las gzhan ma yin //
analyzed: / mngon sum nyid las gzhan ma yin //
translated: so it is not different from perception.

original: rtog pa ni rang rig yin pa'i phyir na mngon sum nyid yin pas de las gzhan du dbye bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: rtog pa ni rang rig yin pa'i phyir na mngon sum nyid yin pas de las gzhan du dbye bar mi bya'o //
translated: Since the concept is self-awareness, it is perception. Therefore, it should not be distinguished from perception.🔽If it is reasonable to express the meaning by excluding other things in the case of words that have a basis, how is it in the case of arbitrary words?

original: gal te re zhig rgyu mtshan can gyi sgra rnams la lta don gang dag bsal ba'i sgo nas don mngon par brjod pa rigs grangs na 'dod rgyal ba rnams la ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: gal te re zhig rgyu mtshan can gyi sgra rnams la lta don gang dag bsal ba'i sgo nas don mngon par brjod pa rigs grangs na 'dod rgyal ba rnams la ji ltar zhe na /
translated: In the case of arbitrary words,

original: 'dod rgyal ba la don dbye bas //
analyzed: 'dod rgyal ba la don dbye bas //
translated: the meaning is distinguished by the general term.

original: 'dod rgyal ba la shing tog da di th'a la sogs pa'i sgra spyi brjod pa yin zhing spyi de'i dbye bas rjod par byed do //
analyzed: 'dod rgyal ba la shing tog da di th'a la sogs pa'i sgra spyi brjod pa yin zhing spyi de'i dbye bas rjod par byed do //
translated: In the case of arbitrary words, the general term such as fruit or dadhitha expresses the meaning by excluding other things.

original: gal te rigs dang mthun pa'i 'dus pa sgra dag la bye brag ci yod ce na /
analyzed: gal te rigs dang mthun pa'i 'dus pa sgra dag la bye brag ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the difference between the word-group that is in conformity with the type and the word-group that is not in conformity with the type?

original: cung zad kyang med do //
analyzed: cung zad kyang med do //
translated: There is no difference at all.

original: rigs kyi sgra yang grags pa'i dbang gis ;
analyzed: rigs kyi sgra yang grags pa'i dbang gis ;
translated: The word-group that is in conformity with the type is also used according to the force of convention.

original: kha cig tu yan lag so so la 'dogs par 'dod de /
analyzed: kha cig tu yan lag so so la 'dogs par 'dod de /
translated: Some people want to apply it to each part,

original: dper na grong gi phag pa bza' bya ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na grong gi phag pa bza' bya ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: as in the expression, “The village pig is not fit to eat.”

original: la lar dngos su rjod par byed de dper na /
analyzed: la lar dngos su rjod par byed de dper na /
translated: Some people use it directly, as in the expression,

original: grangs dang mtshan nyid dang ni dbyibs //
analyzed: grangs dang mtshan nyid dang ni dbyibs //
translated: “Number, definition, and shape🔽are applied without reference to anything else.🔽The word is also used for a collection, as in the expression,

original: ltos pa med par rab tu 'jug / chu la sogs pa'i thigs pa dang // 'dus pa la yang rjod par byed //
analyzed: ltos pa med par rab tu 'jug / chu la sogs pa'i thigs pa dang // 'dus pa la yang rjod par byed //
translated: ‘drops of water, etc.’

original: la lar yan lag 'ba' zhig la 'jug pa ma yin te /🔽dper na / dbyibs dang kha dog cha shas kyis //
analyzed: la lar yan lag 'ba' zhig la 'jug pa ma yin te / dper na / dbyibs dang kha dog cha shas kyis //
translated: Some people do not use it only for the parts,🔽as in the expression,🔽“The word is applied by distinguishing

original: khyad par byas nas 'jug pa yin //🔽sgra yis de yi cha shas la //
analyzed: khyad par byas nas 'jug pa yin // sgra yis de yi cha shas la //
translated: shape, color, and parts.🔽The word is not perceived

original: rab tu 'jug pa dmigs ma yin //
analyzed: rab tu 'jug pa dmigs ma yin //
translated: to apply to its parts.”

original: dbyibs kyi khyad par la 'khor lo dang / zlum po dang ; ring po dang / gru bzhi pa zhes bya ba lta bu yan lag tsam gyis brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dbyibs kyi khyad par la 'khor lo dang / zlum po dang ; ring po dang / gru bzhi pa zhes bya ba lta bu yan lag tsam gyis brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the particular shape is expressed by the mere parts, such as wheel, round, long, and square.

original: de bzhin du khu tshur dang / mdud pa dang / phreng ba dang / rna rgyan la sogs pa rnams la yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du khu tshur dang / mdud pa dang / phreng ba dang / rna rgyan la sogs pa rnams la yang ngo //
translated: It is the same for fist, knot, garland, earring, etc.

original: kha dog gi khyad par la khra bo dang / khre rtse la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: kha dog gi khyad par la khra bo dang / khre rtse la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: The particular color is variegated, striped, etc.

original: yan lag can gyi khyad par la brgya dang / stong bre dang khal dang / zla ba dang / lo dang / srang zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu yan lag rnams la 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yan lag can gyi khyad par la brgya dang / stong bre dang khal dang / zla ba dang / lo dang / srang zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu yan lag rnams la 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: The particular whole is not applied to the parts, such as hundred, thousand, bushel, load, month, year, ounce, etc.

original: 'dus pa'i sgra yang kha cig so so ba la rdzogs par 'jug ste /
analyzed: 'dus pa'i sgra yang kha cig so so ba la rdzogs par 'jug ste /
translated: Some say that the word “collection” is applied to the individual parts,

original: dper na grong 'ongs zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na grong 'ongs zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: as in “the village has come.”

original: kha cig ni brtags nas te /
analyzed: kha cig ni brtags nas te /
translated: Some say that it is applied after examination,

original: dper @78a * //
analyzed: dper @78a * //
translated: as in

original: na lus kyi las kyis bdag gi las chad par byed pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: na lus kyi las kyis bdag gi las chad par byed pa lta bu'o //
translated: “the body is cut by the action of the self.”

original: kha cig ni 'jug par mi byed de /
analyzed: kha cig ni 'jug par mi byed de /
translated: Some words do not enter into a relation.

original: dper na chu zhes bya ba dang / nags zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na chu zhes bya ba dang / nags zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the words water and forest.

original: gal te 'di ltar 'brel pas ma byas pa sgra'i don ston par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar 'brel pas ma byas pa sgra'i don ston par byed pa ste /
translated: If the meaning of a word is indicated by a relation,

original: dper na shing tog pa na sa'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o//
analyzed: dper na shing tog pa na sa'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o//
translated: for example, the word tree-creeper,

original: de la ji ltar rjes su dpag par bya zhe na /
analyzed: de la ji ltar rjes su dpag par bya zhe na /
translated: how is it to be inferred?

original: der shing tog pa na sa'i sgra'i don gyis rtogs pa bskyed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: der shing tog pa na sa'i sgra'i don gyis rtogs pa bskyed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The meaning of the word tree-creeper does not generate understanding.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rtogs pa'i don ni bstan phyir ro //🔽'di zhes pa'i sgra dang lag pa'i brda'am /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i don ni bstan phyir ro // 'di zhes pa'i sgra dang lag pa'i brda'am /
translated: Because the meaning of the word is indicated.

original: grags pa rnying pa dang 'brel pas rab tu rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: grags pa rnying pa dang 'brel pas rab tu rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: The meaning of the word tree-creeper is understood by the word this in relation to a gesture of the hand or an old tradition.

original: shing tog pa na sa'i sgra don rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: shing tog pa na sa'i sgra don rtogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The meaning of the word tree-creeper is not understood.

original: 'di ltar brda gsal bar byed pa'i 'brel pa bstan pa'i don der brda'i don dang 'di zhes pa'i sgra gzhi mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar brda gsal bar byed pa'i 'brel pa bstan pa'i don der brda'i don dang 'di zhes pa'i sgra gzhi mthun pa yin no //
translated: In this way, the meaning of the word this and the meaning of the word tree-creeper are the same in the indication of the relation that clarifies the convention.

original: gnyis ka brjod par bya ba yin no zhes byas nas de'i don du brda'i don byas pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyis ka brjod par bya ba yin no zhes byas nas de'i don du brda'i don byas pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that the meaning of the word is taken to be the object of the word, because the word is not used to refer to the object.

original: shing tog pa na sa'i sgra de nyid dang 'brel pa ltar sgra'i gzhal bar bya bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: shing tog pa na sa'i sgra de nyid dang 'brel pa ltar sgra'i gzhal bar bya bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The word is used to refer to the tree, and the word is related to the tree, and the tree is the object of the word.

original: 'brel pa ma yin brtag pa'i phyir //🔽'brel pa ni shing tog pa na sa'i don dang sgra dag tshad ma gzhan gyis dmigs nas 'di 'di'i yin no zhes shing tog pa na sa dang 'brel par rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: 'brel pa ma yin brtag pa'i phyir // 'brel pa ni shing tog pa na sa'i don dang sgra dag tshad ma gzhan gyis dmigs nas 'di 'di'i yin no zhes shing tog pa na sa dang 'brel par rtogs pa yin la /
translated: The word is not related to the object.🔽The word is related to the tree, and the word is related to the object, and the word is related to the tree and the object.

original: gzhal bar bya ba dang 'brel pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhal bar bya ba dang 'brel pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa yin no //
translated: The word is related to the object, and the word is related to the tree, and the tree is related to the object.

original: de'i phyir sgra las byung ba'i tshad ma gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra las byung ba'i tshad ma gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, inference is not a different means of knowledge from verbal testimony.

original: ci ste nye bar gzhal ba la sogs pa lhag ma rnams ji ltar gzhan ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste nye bar gzhal ba la sogs pa lhag ma rnams ji ltar gzhan ma yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked how the remaining means of knowledge such as perception are not different,

original: phyogs 'dis lhag ma rnams la'ang brjod //
analyzed: phyogs 'dis lhag ma rnams la'ang brjod //
translated: this method should be applied to the remaining ones as well.

original: re zhig nye bar gzhal ba ni ba lang dang ba men la sogs pa de dang 'dra bar rtogs par bya ba'i don du der gzhan las thos pa dang / rtogs pa dag gis sgra'i rang gi don gnyis tshad ma gzhan gyi khongs su chud pa de dang 'dra bar rtogs pa ste de ni tshad ma gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig nye bar gzhal ba ni ba lang dang ba men la sogs pa de dang 'dra bar rtogs par bya ba'i don du der gzhan las thos pa dang / rtogs pa dag gis sgra'i rang gi don gnyis tshad ma gzhan gyi khongs su chud pa de dang 'dra bar rtogs pa ste de ni tshad ma gzhan ma yin no //
translated: The object that is being evaluated is understood as similar to a cow or a gayal, and so on, in order to understand the object that is being evaluated. The two objects of the word that are heard from another and understood are included in the category of other valid knowledge. Understanding them as similar is not another valid knowledge.

original: de bzhin du snyam du sems pa yang de dang 'dra bar 'jal bar byed pa yin pas tshad ma gzhan ma yin par khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du snyam du sems pa yang de dang 'dra bar 'jal bar byed pa yin pas tshad ma gzhan ma yin par khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: Similarly, the thought that thinks “it is like that” is also an evaluation that is similar to that, and it should be understood that it is not another valid knowledge.

original: rjes su dpag pa'i rnam par rtog pa las phyi rol du gyur pa yin pa'i gsal bar bya ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i rnam par rtog pa las phyi rol du gyur pa yin pa'i gsal bar bya ba nyid yin no //
translated: It is something that is made clear because it is external to the conception of inference.

original: tshad ma kun las btus pa las gzhan sel ba brtag pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o /
analyzed: tshad ma kun las btus pa las gzhan sel ba brtag pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o /
translated: This is the fifth chapter, called the Critique of Exclusion, from the Compendium of Valid Knowledge.

original: // / tshad ma ni gnyis su gnas na ci ste tshad ma brjod par @78b bya ba la ci'i don du de ltar snang ba ma tshang ba la sogs pa rnams kyang rjod par byed ce na /
analyzed: // / tshad ma ni gnyis su gnas na ci ste tshad ma brjod par @78b bya ba la ci'i don du de ltar snang ba ma tshang ba la sogs pa rnams kyang rjod par byed ce na /
translated: If there are only two types of valid cognition, why, instead of stating valid cognition, do you state the purpose of the treatise, the lack of completeness, and so on?

original: tshad snang brjod par 'dod rnams la //
analyzed: tshad snang brjod par 'dod rnams la //
translated: Those who wish to state valid cognition

original: rig pa'i cha shas smra po bzhin //
analyzed: rig pa'i cha shas smra po bzhin //
translated: are like those who speak of a part of knowledge.

original: phyogs drug mtshungs pa ma yin zhes //
analyzed: phyogs drug mtshungs pa ma yin zhes //
translated: In order to show that the six alternatives are not the same,

original: bstan phyir ma tshang la sogs brjod //
analyzed: bstan phyir ma tshang la sogs brjod //
translated: the lack of completeness and so on are stated.

original: kha cig ngag tsam la mkhas par 'dzin pa ni yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: kha cig ngag tsam la mkhas par 'dzin pa ni yod pa nyid de /
translated: Some hold that mere words are knowledge.

original: ji skad du phyogs grub pa'i sgrub byed yin bzhin du yang grub pa ltar snang bar 'dod ces brjod pa de dag gi sgrub byed ma yin pa gzhan nyid do zhes phyogs grub pa dgag pa'i phyir ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa grub pa'i skyon brjod do
analyzed: ji skad du phyogs grub pa'i sgrub byed yin bzhin du yang grub pa ltar snang bar 'dod ces brjod pa de dag gi sgrub byed ma yin pa gzhan nyid do zhes phyogs grub pa dgag pa'i phyir ma tshang ba nyid la sogs pa grub pa'i skyon brjod do
translated: Just as one may say that a proof is established even though it is not, in order to refute the establishment of a position, one states the faults of the proof, such as incompleteness.🔽In order to clearly demonstrate that,

original: // de nyid rab tu bstan phyir dang // de ltar snang ba brjod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: // de nyid rab tu bstan phyir dang // de ltar snang ba brjod pa'i phyir //
translated: and in order to state what appears to be the case,

original: lan 'di brjod par rigs pa yin //
analyzed: lan 'di brjod par rigs pa yin //
translated: It is proper to give this answer.

original: ltag spyod la ni rjes mthun lan //
analyzed: ltag spyod la ni rjes mthun lan //
translated: The answer to the reductio is consistent with the original argument.

original: gang gi phyir 'dis phyogs snga ma grub po zhes brjod pa 'di la lan du tshang ba la sogs pa brjod par rigs so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dis phyogs snga ma grub po zhes brjod pa 'di la lan du tshang ba la sogs pa brjod par rigs so //
