translated: Because of this, it is proper to give the answer to the opponent’s argument that “this proves the thesis of the other party” by saying that it is not incomplete, etc.

original: ma tshang ba la sogs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir yang brjod par rigs so //
analyzed: ma tshang ba la sogs pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir yang brjod par rigs so //
translated: And it is proper to give the answer to the charge that it is incomplete, etc., by saying that it is consistent with the original argument.

original: ltag spyod rnams la ni skyon lan du'o //
analyzed: ltag spyod rnams la ni skyon lan du'o //
translated: The answer to the reductio is consistent with the original argument.

original: 'dis phyogs snga ma dag sgrub byed ma yin pa nyid du shes par mi nus so //🔽de la / phrad dang ma phrad dag dang dus //
analyzed: 'dis phyogs snga ma dag sgrub byed ma yin pa nyid du shes par mi nus so // de la / phrad dang ma phrad dag dang dus //
translated: It is not possible to understand that the original argument is not a proof of the thesis.🔽In this regard, it is said:🔽The reason is not asserted

original: gsum la rtags su brjod 'dod min //
analyzed: gsum la rtags su brjod 'dod min //
translated: With regard to contact or noncontact with the three times.

original: phrad dang ma phrad rtags brjod des //
analyzed: phrad dang ma phrad rtags brjod des //
translated: The reason is stated as contact or noncontact,

original: ma tshang gtan tshigs rjes mthun yin //
analyzed: ma tshang gtan tshigs rjes mthun yin //
translated: But the incomplete reason is consistent with the original argument.

original: dper na rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir sgra mi rtag go zhes gtan tshigs kyi dpe brjod pa las gal te gtan tshigs 'di bsgrub bya dang phrad nas sgrub par byed na ni bsgrub bya dang khyad par med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dper na rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir sgra mi rtag go zhes gtan tshigs kyi dpe brjod pa las gal te gtan tshigs 'di bsgrub bya dang phrad nas sgrub par byed na ni bsgrub bya dang khyad par med par 'gyur te /
translated: For example, when the example of a logical reason is stated, “Sound is impermanent because it is produced,” if this logical reason proves sound by contacting the object of affirmation, then it would be no different from the object of affirmation.

original: rlung gi chu rgya mtsho dang phrad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rlung gi chu rgya mtsho dang phrad pa bzhin no //
translated: It would be like the wind contacting the ocean.

original: ma grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ma grub pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not unestablished.

original: grub pa dang phrad na ni bsgrub bya grub zin nas 'di gang gi gtan tshigs yin /
analyzed: grub pa dang phrad na ni bsgrub bya grub zin nas 'di gang gi gtan tshigs yin /
translated: If it proves by contacting what is established, then the object of affirmation is already established, so what is this a logical reason for?

original: ci ste ma phrad na ni ma phrad pas gtan tshigs ma yin pa rnams dang khyad par med pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes de ltar phrad pa dang ma phrad par mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: ci ste ma phrad na ni ma phrad pas gtan tshigs ma yin pa rnams dang khyad par med pa'i phyir sgrub par byed pa ma yin no zhes de ltar phrad pa dang ma phrad par mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: But if it does not contact it, then because it does not contact it, it is no different from nonlogical reasons, so it does not prove. Thus it is the same whether or not it contacts the object of affirmation.

original: dus gsum la yang mi 'dod par brjod de /
analyzed: dus gsum la yang mi 'dod par brjod de /
translated: It is said that it is not asserted in any of the three temporal periods.

original: gal te gtan tshigs bsgrub bya las sngar sgrub par byed na ni bsgrub bya'am grub na 'di gang gi gtan tshigs yin /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs bsgrub bya las sngar sgrub par byed na ni bsgrub bya'am grub na 'di gang gi gtan tshigs yin /
translated: If the logical reason proves the object of affirmation prior to it, then if the object of affirmation is established, what is this a logical reason for?

original: ci ste phyi nas bsgrubs na ni ma grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma yin no //
analyzed: ci ste phyi nas bsgrubs na ni ma grub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma yin no //
translated: If it is established later, then it is not a reason, because it is not established.

original: de ste cig car ba gtan tshigs yin ni /
analyzed: de ste cig car ba gtan tshigs yin ni /
translated: If it is a reason that is simultaneous,

original: gtan tshigs bzhin du yod pa de sgrub mi dgos te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs bzhin du yod pa de sgrub mi dgos te /
translated: then, like the reason, it does not need to be established.

original: glang gi rva g-yas g-yon bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: glang gi rva g-yas g-yon bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the right and left horns of an ox.

original: de ltar @79a * //
analyzed: de ltar @79a * //
translated: In this way,

original: gtan tshigs ma yin pa mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ma yin pa mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: the reason is similar to what is not a reason.

original: de dag ni ma tshang ba'i gtan tshigs nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni ma tshang ba'i gtan tshigs nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
translated: These are similar to a reason that is incomplete.

original: gang gi phyir zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: rigs pa dang mi ldan pa'i dpe brjod kyi gtan tshigs thams cad bsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs pa dang mi ldan pa'i dpe brjod kyi gtan tshigs thams cad bsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all reasons that are stated with an unfitting example are refuted.

original: gang zhig 'dir ma phrad pa tsam chos mthun pas gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid mtshungs par 'gyur ba ga la rigs /
analyzed: gang zhig 'dir ma phrad pa tsam chos mthun pas gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid mtshungs par 'gyur ba ga la rigs /
translated: How could it be fitting to state a reason that has a similarity of non-contact here?

original: rigs su zin gyis kyang gtan tshigs ma yin pas 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: rigs su zin gyis kyang gtan tshigs ma yin pas 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Even if it were fitting, it would not be a reason.

original: de bzhin du sngar rtags kyis sgrub par byed na tha snyad tsam ma dmigs pa'i phyir sgrub byed ma yin no zhes pa la yang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngar rtags kyis sgrub par byed na tha snyad tsam ma dmigs pa'i phyir sgrub byed ma yin no zhes pa la yang ngo //
translated: Likewise, if one previously establishes by a reason, then it is not a proof because of the non-apprehension of mere convention.

original: rang la gnod pa'i nyes par 'gyur ba ni 'dir dgag pa la'ang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang la gnod pa'i nyes par 'gyur ba ni 'dir dgag pa la'ang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The fault of self-refutation is incurred here because the refutation is the same as the proof.

original: de ltar na re zhig dang blo'i gtan tshigs dag la bsgrub par bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gsum ma tshang ba ltar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig dang blo'i gtan tshigs dag la bsgrub par bya ba'i gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gsum ma tshang ba ltar snang ba yin no //
translated: Thus, in the case of the reason of the intellect, the three characteristics of the reason of the probandum are incomplete.

original: don rtogs ma grub ltar snang yin //
analyzed: don rtogs ma grub ltar snang yin //
translated: When the object is the reason, it is not established for one’s own position.

original: gang gi tshe don gtan tshigs yin pa de'i tshe ni tshig las yin pa ma bkag pa'i phyir de don la ma grub ltar snang ba nyid de /
analyzed: gang gi tshe don gtan tshigs yin pa de'i tshe ni tshig las yin pa ma bkag pa'i phyir de don la ma grub ltar snang ba nyid de /
translated: When the object is the reason, then, since the word is not refuted, it is not established for the object.

original: chos thams cad kyi gtan tshigs rigs pa ma yin pas bsal ba'i phyir snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi gtan tshigs rigs pa ma yin pas bsal ba'i phyir snga ma bzhin no //
translated: Since the reason of all dharmas is not a principle, it is refuted, as before.

original: gtan tshigs gnyis ka'i ltar na yang don bsgrub par bya ba la de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir de dag ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs gnyis ka'i ltar na yang don bsgrub par bya ba la de dag rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ma yin pa'i phyir de dag ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: According to both of these reasons, the two are not the entity of cause and effect, so they are not reasonable.

original: rigs su chud mod kyang sel bar byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis sun 'byin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs su chud mod kyang sel bar byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis sun 'byin du 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if they were reasonable, they would be refuted by the nature of exclusion.

original: rtag brjod mi rtag pa rjes 'gro //
analyzed: rtag brjod mi rtag pa rjes 'gro //
translated: The permanent is stated, the impermanent is followed.

original: de dag mi rtag par nus min //
analyzed: de dag mi rtag par nus min //
translated: They are not able to make that impermanent.

original: phyogs kyi skyon dang rjes mthun 'gro //
analyzed: phyogs kyi skyon dang rjes mthun 'gro //
translated: They are in accord with the fault of the position.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag ces bya ba la de'i rtag pa'i rtag pa dang sbyor bar 'gyur te ;
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag ces bya ba la de'i rtag pa'i rtag pa dang sbyor bar 'gyur te ;
translated: For example, in saying that sound is impermanent, the permanence of that is connected to permanence.

original: chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gang 'thob pa mi 'dor ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi rang bzhin gang 'thob pa mi 'dor ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of phenomena is that what is obtained is not abandoned.

original: de lta bas na rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lta bu ste /🔽de dag nyid ni brtags pa dang mtshungs pa'i ltag gcod yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na rtag pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lta bu ste / de dag nyid ni brtags pa dang mtshungs pa'i ltag gcod yin no //
translated: Therefore, it would become permanent.🔽Those are the same as the reductio ad absurdum.

original: 'di ni dam bca' ba'i skyon skyon ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dam bca' ba'i skyon skyon ltar snang ba'o //
translated: This is the fault of the thesis, which is a mere appearance of a fault.

original: mi rtag pa nyid gtan nas zhen pa'i phyir de la mi rtag pa las gzhan yang rtag pa'i 'jug pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid gtan nas zhen pa'i phyir de la mi rtag pa las gzhan yang rtag pa'i 'jug pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because of the complete adherence to impermanence, there is no other occurrence of permanence in it.

original: dngos po de nyid ma byung ba las byung bar gyur pa ni mi rtag pa'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos po de nyid ma byung ba las byung bar gyur pa ni mi rtag pa'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: That very thing, having arisen from what did not exist before, is called impermanent.

original: gnas skabs de yang mi rtag pa nyid do zhes dngos po'i rkyen gyis brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gnas skabs de yang mi rtag pa nyid do zhes dngos po'i rkyen gyis brjod par bya ste /
translated: That state is also impermanent, it should be expressed by the condition of the thing,

original: 'bras bu nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no //🔽sngar brjod gtan @79b tshigs med pa yis //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa bzhin no // sngar brjod gtan @79b tshigs med pa yis //
translated: like “the effect itself” and so on.🔽The probandum would be pointless,

original: bsgrub bya med par thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgrub bya med par thal bar 'gyur //
translated: because of the absence of the reason previously stated.

original: yang brjod pa mtshungs /
analyzed: yang brjod pa mtshungs /
translated: The response is the same.

original: dper na sngar bzhin byas pa la gal te gtan tshigs 'di las mi rtag pa yin na sngar brjod pa de dag med de /
analyzed: dper na sngar bzhin byas pa la gal te gtan tshigs 'di las mi rtag pa yin na sngar brjod pa de dag med de /
translated: For example, if it is done as before, if it is impermanent from this reason, those previously stated do not exist,

original: gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir mi rtag par bsgrub mi nus so zhes bya ba ni ma brjod pa mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs med pa'i phyir mi rtag par bsgrub mi nus so zhes bya ba ni ma brjod pa mtshungs pa'o //
translated: because there is no reason, it is not possible to prove impermanence. This is the same as not stating.

original: 'di la yang /
analyzed: 'di la yang /
translated: Here also,

original: sgro btags nas /
analyzed: sgro btags nas /
translated: having superimposed,

original: smra po'i ngag gis sgrub par byed //
analyzed: smra po'i ngag gis sgrub par byed //
translated: The speaker establishes it by his words.

original: ma grub ltar snang /
analyzed: ma grub ltar snang /
translated: The apparent nonestablishment

original: don la ni sngar smra ba po rang la rjes su dpag par bya ba'i nges pa skyes pa bzhin gzhan la nges pa bskyed par 'dod pas /
analyzed: don la ni sngar smra ba po rang la rjes su dpag par bya ba'i nges pa skyes pa bzhin gzhan la nges pa bskyed par 'dod pas /
translated: In reality, the speaker, just as he himself has generated certainty with regard to the probandum, wishes to generate certainty in others.

original: don de gzhan la brjod pa de med pa la ma grub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don de gzhan la brjod pa de med pa la ma grub pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, when he states that probandum to others, it is not the case that it is not established.

original: gzhan la ni smra ba po'i tshig gis don sgrub pa la smra ba las sngar sgro btags nas /
analyzed: gzhan la ni smra ba po'i tshig gis don sgrub pa la smra ba las sngar sgro btags nas /
translated: The opponent argues that the speaker establishes the probandum by his words, but that prior to the statement, the probandum is not established.

original: de med pa las don ma grub par rtsod pa yin no //
analyzed: de med pa las don ma grub par rtsod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, he argues that the probandum is not established.

original: des na de dag ni ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o //🔽yang na nyung ltar snang /🔽brjod pa las sngar sgrub byed na'o //
analyzed: des na de dag ni ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o // yang na nyung ltar snang / brjod pa las sngar sgrub byed na'o //
translated: Thus these are apparent nonestablishments.🔽Or, it is an apparent nonestablishment due to the lack of a basis.

original: brjod pa las sngar sgrub byed yin par lhag par sgro btags pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma tshang bar ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: brjod pa las sngar sgrub byed yin par lhag par sgro btags pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma tshang bar ltar snang ba'o //
translated: It is an apparent nonestablishment due to the lack of a basis because it is a superimposition prior to the statement.

original: grub pa'i dus na ni gtan tshigs ma brjod na gtan tshigs ma tshang bar 'gyur na 'di ni ma brjod pa las sngar sgrub par mi byed do //
analyzed: grub pa'i dus na ni gtan tshigs ma brjod na gtan tshigs ma tshang bar 'gyur na 'di ni ma brjod pa las sngar sgrub par mi byed do //
translated: But when the proof is made, if the reason is not stated, the reason is incomplete. But this is not made before the statement.

original: 'dir gtan tshigs kyi don ma lus pa med par brtsad pa'i phyir dpe brjod ma tshang ba ltar snang ba nyid du yang rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir gtan tshigs kyi don ma lus pa med par brtsad pa'i phyir dpe brjod ma tshang ba ltar snang ba nyid du yang rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, the meaning of the reason is not complete, and so the example is incomplete, as if it were not stated.

original: brjod pa las sngar rtags min phyir //
analyzed: brjod pa las sngar rtags min phyir //
translated: Because it is not a reason before the statement,

original: ma grub pa dang 'gal ba'i ngag / ma skyes pa mtshungs /
analyzed: ma grub pa dang 'gal ba'i ngag / ma skyes pa mtshungs /
translated: the non-arisen is similar to the unestablished and contradictory statements.

original: dper na sngar bzhin byas pa la gal te 'di ltar brjod pa las sngar sgra brtsal ma thag tu byung ba ma yin pas 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na sngar bzhin byas pa la gal te 'di ltar brjod pa las sngar sgra brtsal ma thag tu byung ba ma yin pas 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, as before, if it is said that sound is not produced by effort because it arises immediately after the effort to speak,

original: rtsol ba las ma byung ba'i phyir brtag pa yang yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu ni ma skyes pa mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: rtsol ba las ma byung ba'i phyir brtag pa yang yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu ni ma skyes pa mtshungs pa'o //
translated: it is not produced by effort, and so it is imagined. In this way, the non-arisen is similar to the unestablished and contradictory statements.

original: de lta na yang /
analyzed: de lta na yang /
translated: But even so,

original: rnam gnyis / gnyis su sgro btags pa las 'dod //
analyzed: rnam gnyis / gnyis su sgro btags pa las 'dod //
translated: it is twofold, asserted from superimposition of duality.

original: de la brjod pa las sngar sgrub byed du sgro btags pa las ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de la brjod pa las sngar sgrub byed du sgro btags pa las ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: In that regard, it is like the non-establishment of the probandum due to the superimposition of the proof in the statement.

original: skyes pa dag ni sgra zhig pa nyid kyis brtsal ma thag tu byung ba yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: skyes pa dag ni sgra zhig pa nyid kyis brtsal ma thag tu byung ba yin pa'i phyir sgrub par byed do //
translated: The produced are established by the sound's disintegration, because it arises immediately after effort.

original: de de'i tshe yod pa yang yin no //
analyzed: de de'i tshe yod pa yang yin no //
translated: It exists at that time.

original: rtsol ba las ma byung ba nyid ni /
analyzed: rtsol ba las ma byung ba nyid ni /
translated: The non-arising from effort

original: don gyi dbang gis mi rtag pa nyid du yang sgro 'dogs pas ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //🔽'bras bu gzhan nyid kyi cha nas /
analyzed: don gyi dbang gis mi rtag pa nyid du yang sgro 'dogs pas ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o // 'bras bu gzhan nyid kyi cha nas /
translated: is like the appearance of non-ascertainment, because impermanence is also superimposed by the power of the object.

original: bsgrub bya mi 'grub par ston pa /
analyzed: bsgrub bya mi 'grub par ston pa /
translated: Showing that the probandum is not established from the aspect of another effect

original: de ni 'bras mtshungs /
analyzed: de ni 'bras mtshungs /
translated: That is similar to the effect.

original: dper na sgra mi rtag ste /
analyzed: dper na sgra mi rtag ste /
translated: For example, sound is impermanent

original: 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin zhes @80a * //🔽bya ba la /🔽gzhan bum pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyis byas pa mi rtag pa yin na sgra 'di'i'o zhes ci ste bya zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir bum pa bzhin zhes @80a * // bya ba la / gzhan bum pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyis byas pa mi rtag pa yin na sgra 'di'i'o zhes ci ste bya zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu mtshungs pa'o //
translated: because it is an effect, like a pot.🔽What is the point of saying this is the effect of sound🔽when impermanence is made by the other, the pot's effect?

original: de lta bu /
analyzed: de lta bu /
translated: This is the similarity of the effect.

original: smra po'i 'dod pa rnam pa gsum //
analyzed: smra po'i 'dod pa rnam pa gsum //
translated: The speaker's desire is threefold.

original: gal te smra ba po'i bum pa'i 'bras bu nyid sgra la med do zhes rtsod na ni de'i tshe ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: gal te smra ba po'i bum pa'i 'bras bu nyid sgra la med do zhes rtsod na ni de'i tshe ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: If you argue that the effect of the speaker is not in the sound, then it is as if you were to argue that it is not established.

original: 'on te sgra'i 'bras bu nyid bum pa la sogs pa'i mi rtag pa la med do zhes rtsod pa'i lta na 'gal ba ltar snang ba'o //🔽de ste de nyid rtag pa la yang med do zhe na ni thun mong ma yin pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te sgra'i 'bras bu nyid bum pa la sogs pa'i mi rtag pa la med do zhes rtsod pa'i lta na 'gal ba ltar snang ba'o // de ste de nyid rtag pa la yang med do zhe na ni thun mong ma yin pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If you argue that the effect of the sound is not in the impermanent such as the pot, then it is as if you were to argue that it is contradictory.

original: ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: If you argue that it is not in the permanent, then it is as if you were to argue that it is not ascertained, because it is not common to both.

original: yang na chos mthun pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang na chos mthun pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Or, in order to show the similarity of attributes,

original: dpe'i skyon ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: dpe'i skyon ltar snang ba'o //
translated: it is as if you were to argue that the example is faulty.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: chos kyi spyi bzung nas rjes su dpog par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: chos kyi spyi bzung nas rjes su dpog par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: One infers having grasped the universal of the attribute,

original: de'i bye brag las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i bye brag las ni ma yin te /
translated: but not from its particular,

original: de'i don so sor nges pa nyid kyi rjes su dpag pa med pa thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i don so sor nges pa nyid kyi rjes su dpag pa med pa thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that there would be no inference of the particular meaning itself.🔽The example is established by the similarity of attributes🔽of the property-possessor to the property

original: nges bstan mi mthun phyogs dag las //🔽chos mthun dpe yis gzhan sgrub pa //
analyzed: nges bstan mi mthun phyogs dag las //🔽chos mthun dpe yis gzhan sgrub pa //
translated: and by the dissimilarity from what is discordant.

original: chos mthun par mtshungs /
analyzed: chos mthun par mtshungs /
translated: They are similar in being concordant qualities.

original: gzhan sgrub ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan sgrub ces bya ba ni /
translated: The statement “it proves something else” means

original: bzlog pa sgrub pa ste byed pa po'i rgyur byas nas so //
analyzed: bzlog pa sgrub pa ste byed pa po'i rgyur byas nas so //
translated: that it proves the opposite, having taken the agent as its cause.

original: dper na / sgra mi rtag ste /
analyzed: dper na / sgra mi rtag ste /
translated: For example, sound is impermanent

original: rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir chos mi mthun pa'i dpe nam mkha' bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir chos mi mthun pa'i dpe nam mkha' bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: because it is produced by effort. The concordant example is space.

original: nges par bstan pa'i nam mkha' dang yang lus can ma yin pa la sogs par chos mthun pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o zhes sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: nges par bstan pa'i nam mkha' dang yang lus can ma yin pa la sogs par chos mthun pa'i phyir mi rtag pa'o zhes sgrub pa yin no //
translated: Since space is definitely taught to be non-physical, and so on, it is similar to the subject in being impermanent.

original: de ltar na gtan tshigs 'di dag nyid du /
analyzed: de ltar na gtan tshigs 'di dag nyid du /
translated: Thus these reasons

original: bum pa chos mthun par byas pa la /
analyzed: bum pa chos mthun par byas pa la /
translated: are similar to the subject, the pot,

original: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs nam mkha' dang chos mthun par brjod pa de lta bu ni chos mthun pa mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs nam mkha' dang chos mthun par brjod pa de lta bu ni chos mthun pa mtshungs pa'o //
translated: and the concordant example is stated to be similar to space, which is the opposite of the subject.

original: gzhan dag ni /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni /
translated: Others say

original: chos mi mthun pas /
analyzed: chos mi mthun pas /
translated: that the opposite of the subject

original: nges par bstan pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag las gzhan sgrub par byed do zhes brjod pa la /
analyzed: nges par bstan pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dag las gzhan sgrub par byed do zhes brjod pa la /
translated: is proved to be something other than the opposite of the subject.

original: dpe gnyis ka yang sngar bzhin bum pa chos mi mthun pa'i dper sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: dpe gnyis ka yang sngar bzhin bum pa chos mi mthun pa'i dper sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The two examples are to be applied as before, the pot being the example of the dissimilar.

original: de lta bu dag gi / mtshungs pa nyid /
analyzed: de lta bu dag gi / mtshungs pa nyid /
translated: The similarity of these

original: gzhan la ma grub bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan la ma grub bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: is taught to be unestablished for the other.

original: thun mong ltar snang rnam pa gnyis //
analyzed: thun mong ltar snang rnam pa gnyis //
translated: The two kinds of common seeming

original: gal te 'di lus can ma yin pa la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa dang chos mi mthun pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te 'di lus can ma yin pa la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa dang chos mi mthun pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is argued that the similarity of the nonphysical and so forth is unestablished, it is not so.

original: gzhan la ma grub pa rtsod na ni ji ltar kho bo'i chos mthun pa dang / chos mi mthun pa tsam las ma grub pa bzhin du khyod kyi yang yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la ma grub pa rtsod na ni ji ltar kho bo'i chos mthun pa dang / chos mi mthun pa tsam las ma grub pa bzhin du khyod kyi yang yin no //
translated: If it is argued that the similarity is unestablished for the other, then just as the similarity and dissimilarity of the proponent are unestablished, so are they for the opponent.

original: des thun mong gi ma nges pa ltar snang pa'o //
analyzed: des thun mong gi ma nges pa ltar snang pa'o //
translated: This is the seeming uncertainty that is common.

original: @80b phyogs snga ma la lus can ma yin pa nyid brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ma nges pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: @80b phyogs snga ma la lus can ma yin pa nyid brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ma nges pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The uncertainty of the immediacy of the nonphysical is not present in the opponent.

original: de lta bu nyid dag ni grub par 'dod pa mtshungs pa'i phyir 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can bzhin /
analyzed: de lta bu nyid dag ni grub par 'dod pa mtshungs pa'i phyir 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can bzhin /
translated: Since the similarity of these is asserted to be established, it is like the nonerroneous contradiction.

original: gal te bsam pa 'di yin na ni ji ltar khyod kyi chos mthun pa tsam las grub pa de bzhin kho bo'i yang yin te /
analyzed: gal te bsam pa 'di yin na ni ji ltar khyod kyi chos mthun pa tsam las grub pa de bzhin kho bo'i yang yin te /
translated: If this is your intention, then just as your proof is similar to your property, so is mine.

original: des na 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: des na 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can ltar snang ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is like a contradictory non-mistaken appearance.

original: 'di yang rjes 'gro med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'di yang rjes 'gro med pa'i phyir //
translated: This is also like an appearance, because there is no pervasion.

original: dpe ltar snang ba'i skyon brjod yin //
analyzed: dpe ltar snang ba'i skyon brjod yin //
translated: It is a statement of the fault of an appearance of an example.

original: rnam pa gnyis ka yang ma nges pa ltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis ka yang ma nges pa ltar snang ba ste /
translated: Both aspects are like an appearance of uncertainty,

original: gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba ma bstan pa'i phyir dang / bsgrub bye med pa'i gtan tshigs med par ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang bsgrub bya'i rjes su 'gro ba ma bstan pa'i phyir dang / bsgrub bye med pa'i gtan tshigs med par ma bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the pervasion of the reason and the probandum is not shown, and because the reason without the probandum is not shown.

original: phyogs phyi ma la yang ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs snga ma la yang yin no //
analyzed: phyogs phyi ma la yang ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs snga ma la yang yin no //
translated: In the latter position, it is also like that in the former position.

original: dpe ltar snang ba'i rtsod pa la yang rjes su 'gro ba med par sbyar ro //
analyzed: dpe ltar snang ba'i rtsod pa la yang rjes su 'gro ba med par sbyar ro //
translated: In the dispute about an appearance of an example, there is also no pervasion.

original: rjes 'gro phyin ci log nyid las //
analyzed: rjes 'gro phyin ci log nyid las //
translated: From the pervasion being mistaken,

original: dpe dang bsgrub bya 'dres par 'gyur //
analyzed: dpe dang bsgrub bya 'dres par 'gyur //
translated: the example and the probandum are mixed.

original: phal cher ni rtog ge ngan pa kho na dpes nye bar 'jal bar byed de /
analyzed: phal cher ni rtog ge ngan pa kho na dpes nye bar 'jal bar byed de /
translated: For the most part, bad logicians judge by analogy,

original: sgra ni bum pa lta bu yin no //
analyzed: sgra ni bum pa lta bu yin no //
translated: Sound is like a pot,

original: sgra nam mkha' lta bu ni ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: sgra nam mkha' lta bu ni ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: but sound is not like space.

original: der de ltar 'dres pa la phyin ci log yin kyang rjes su 'gro ba srid de /
analyzed: der de ltar 'dres pa la phyin ci log yin kyang rjes su 'gro ba srid de /
translated: Even though there is a mistake in the analogy, it is possible that the conclusion is correct,🔽Whatever is impermanent is produced by effort,

original: gang mi rtag pa de rtsol ba las byung ngo zhes bya ba dang / gang rtsol ba las ma byung ba de rtag pa'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: gang mi rtag pa de rtsol ba las byung ngo zhes bya ba dang / gang rtsol ba las ma byung ba de rtag pa'o zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: and whatever is not produced by effort is permanent.🔽When it is done in this way, the conclusion is drawn in the form, It is so,

original: de lta bur byas pa la de bzhin du zhes pa dang / de bzhin du ma yin no zhes mjug bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bur byas pa la de bzhin du zhes pa dang / de bzhin du ma yin no zhes mjug bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: and It is not so.

original: phyogs phyi ma ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs snga ma yang yin pas mtshungs pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: phyogs phyi ma ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs snga ma yang yin pas mtshungs pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: Since the former position is just like the latter, the absurd consequence follows that they are the same.

original: de ltar snang ba yang 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar snang ba yang 'thad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is correct that it appears that way.

original: dper bstan pa tsam nyid la phyogs snga ma dang phyi ma gnyis ka yang rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log tu mtshungs so //
analyzed: dper bstan pa tsam nyid la phyogs snga ma dang phyi ma gnyis ka yang rjes su 'gro ba phyin ci log tu mtshungs so //
translated: In the mere example, both the prior and subsequent positions are equally erroneous.

original: de lta na ni bum pa la chos gnyis ka yang rigs pa yin la de bzhin du nam mkha' la yang ngo //
analyzed: de lta na ni bum pa la chos gnyis ka yang rigs pa yin la de bzhin du nam mkha' la yang ngo //
translated: In that case, it is reasonable for both properties to belong to the pot, and likewise for space.

original: de lta bu yang /
analyzed: de lta bu yang /
translated: That is so,

original: rtags de'i bdag nyid kyis dbye bas //
analyzed: rtags de'i bdag nyid kyis dbye bas //
translated: because the reason is divided by its own nature.

original: 'khrul pa ltar snang rnam pa gnyis //🔽gtan tshigs phyogs gcig tu nges pha //
analyzed: 'khrul pa ltar snang rnam pa gnyis // gtan tshigs phyogs gcig tu nges pha //
translated: The two kinds of fallacious seeming pervasion

original: sbyor ba snga ma la yod min //
analyzed: sbyor ba snga ma la yod min //
translated: are not in the prior formulation of the reason.

original: de ltar kho bo cag gis 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba'i rjes su zhugs nas chos mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa mtshungs par bstan pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar kho bo cag gis 'jig rten pa'i sbyor ba'i rjes su zhugs nas chos mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa mtshungs par bstan pa ste /
translated: Thus, we have engaged in worldly practice and shown the similarity of the concordant and discordant examples.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni phyogs gcig tu nges pa dngos po'i gtan tshigs su 'dod pa yin yang /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni phyogs gcig tu nges pa dngos po'i gtan tshigs su 'dod pa yin yang /
translated: Although we assert that the reason of the thing is ascertained as one-sided,

original: phyin ci log gi nges pa ltar snang bar brjod do //
analyzed: phyin ci log gi nges pa ltar snang bar brjod do //
translated: we call it a fallacious seeming ascertainment.

original: phyogs snga ma la ni kho bo cag gis sbyor ba bzhin @81a * //
analyzed: phyogs snga ma la ni kho bo cag gis sbyor ba bzhin @81a * //
translated: But we do not have a position, so we do not have any of those faults.

original: phyogs gcig tu nges par bstan pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu nges par bstan pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And we do not have any of the faults that you ascribe to the other, because we do not have a position.🔽And in the same way, because there is no connection in the case of a similar property, there is no difference.

original: de bzhin du gang gi phyir chos mthun pa mtshungs par byas pa la yang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir gzhan nyid yin no //🔽bye brag brjod pas chos mthun pa'ang //
analyzed: de bzhin du gang gi phyir chos mthun pa mtshungs par byas pa la yang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir gzhan nyid yin no // bye brag brjod pas chos mthun pa'ang //
translated: The property of being similar is

original: rnam rtog mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam rtog mtshungs pa'o //
translated: the similarity of conception.

original: dper na sngar bzhin du bum pa dang chos mthun pas mi rtag par byas pa las brjod pa /
analyzed: dper na sngar bzhin du bum pa dang chos mthun pas mi rtag par byas pa las brjod pa /
translated: For example, just as before, by the property of being similar to a pot, impermanence is expressed.

original: de la chos mthun pa yod du zin kyang bsreg par bya ba dang / mig gi gzung bya la sogs pa'i bye brag gis bum pa kho na mi rtag par 'gyur gyi sgra ni ma yin la /
analyzed: de la chos mthun pa yod du zin kyang bsreg par bya ba dang / mig gi gzung bya la sogs pa'i bye brag gis bum pa kho na mi rtag par 'gyur gyi sgra ni ma yin la /
translated: Although there is a property of being similar, only a pot is impermanent, not sound, because of the difference of being something that is burned and something that is grasped by the eye, and so on.

original: sgra kho na rtag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgra kho na rtag par 'gyur te /
translated: And only sound is permanent,

original: bsreg par bya ba ma yin pa dang / mnyan bya nyid la sogs pas so zhes so //
analyzed: bsreg par bya ba ma yin pa dang / mnyan bya nyid la sogs pas so zhes so //
translated: because of the difference of not being something that is burned and being something that is heard, and so on.

original: bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog nas rnam par rtog par byed pas na rnam par rtog pa mtshungs pa'am /🔽dper brjod pa las gzhan la yang byas pa nyid yin du zin kyang bsreg par bya ba dang bsreg par bya ba ma yin pa la sogs pa bzhin rtag pa dang mi rtag pa rnam par rtog pa brjod pas na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba las bzlog nas rnam par rtog par byed pas na rnam par rtog pa mtshungs pa'am / dper brjod pa las gzhan la yang byas pa nyid yin du zin kyang bsreg par bya ba dang bsreg par bya ba ma yin pa la sogs pa bzhin rtag pa dang mi rtag pa rnam par rtog pa brjod pas na /
translated: Because it is a conceptual thought that contradicts what is to be established, it is a similar conceptual thought.

original: rnam par rtog pa mtshungs pa'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa mtshungs pa'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Or, even though it is the same in being a product, it is a similar conceptual thought because it expresses the conceptual thought of permanence and impermanence, like what is to be burned and what is not to be burned.

original: 'di la ni /
analyzed: 'di la ni /
translated: Here, it is said:

original: 'khrul pa can gyi bye brag gis //
analyzed: 'khrul pa can gyi bye brag gis //
translated: By the distinction of error,

original: rtag par 'gyur ba de ltar snang //
analyzed: rtag par 'gyur ba de ltar snang //
translated: permanence appears in that way.

original: spyi min gyis kyang /
analyzed: spyi min gyis kyang /
translated: Even by the non-universal,

original: 'di la yang 'khrul pa can dang thun mong ma yin pa de bzhin du rtag pa'am sun 'byin par yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di la yang 'khrul pa can dang thun mong ma yin pa de bzhin du rtag pa'am sun 'byin par yang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: in this case, like the error and the non-universal, permanence or refutation would also follow.

original: rang gi phyogs la ma grub pa bzhin gzhan la ma grub pa bstan pa'i phyir sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi phyogs la ma grub pa bzhin gzhan la ma grub pa bstan pa'i phyir sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: In order to show that what is not established for oneself is not established for others, it becomes an establishment.

original: sun 'byin pa la ni thun mong ngam thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: sun 'byin pa la ni thun mong ngam thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: In refutation, it is like the apparent indecisive [reason] that is either common or uncommon.

original: bsgrub pa la ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can du rtsod pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub pa la ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can du rtsod pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: In proof, it is like the apparent dispute that has a contradictory non-mistaken [reason].

original: rnam pa gzhan yang ste ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan yang ste ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: There is another type, the apparent indecisive [reason].

original: gal te bsreg par bya ba dang bsdongs pa'i brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid brjod na ni mngon sum 'ba' zhig pa mig gi gzung bya ma yin pa nyid dang rdzas nyid la sogs pas ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te bsreg par bya ba dang bsdongs pa'i brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid brjod na ni mngon sum 'ba' zhig pa mig gi gzung bya ma yin pa nyid dang rdzas nyid la sogs pas ma nges pa yin no //
translated: If one asserts that the mere arising immediately after the effort that is conjoined with the combustible is the reason, then it is indecisive due to being the mere direct perception, not being an object of the eye, being a substance, and so on.

original: bsdongs pa'i nges par byed pa'i gtan tshigs 'di yang de bzhin du ma yin no //
analyzed: bsdongs pa'i nges par byed pa'i gtan tshigs 'di yang de bzhin du ma yin no //
translated: This reason that ascertains the conjoined is also not like that.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba 'ba' zhig pa ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba 'ba' zhig pa ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: The mere arising immediately after the effort has the characteristics of a reason,

original: de'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: therefore it is an apparent indecisive [reason].

original: gcig nyid du /
analyzed: gcig nyid du /
translated: In the case of oneness,

original: thal bar 'gyur phyir bye brag med //
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur phyir bye brag med //
translated: there is no distinction because of the consequence.

original: chos mthun pa ston pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir de dang gcig tu thal bar 'gyur bas na'o //
analyzed: chos mthun pa ston pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir de dang gcig tu thal bar 'gyur bas na'o //
translated: because it is a case of teaching a property that is common to both.

original: zla bo mnyan bya ma yin pa'i phyir med bzhin du gang du gang @81b gis na bsgrub bya'i zhes go bar bya /
analyzed: zla bo mnyan bya ma yin pa'i phyir med bzhin du gang du gang @81b gis na bsgrub bya'i zhes go bar bya /
translated: Since the counterpart is not something that is heard, how can one understand the statement “wherever and by whatever” when it does not exist?

original: bye brag med ces bya ba ni bye brag med par thal ba'o //
analyzed: bye brag med ces bya ba ni bye brag med par thal ba'o //
translated: The phrase “without distinction” means that it would follow, absurdly, that there would be no distinction.

original: gang zhig gang dang bye brag yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig gang dang bye brag yin zhe na /
translated: What is the distinction between what and what?

original: bye brag med par byas pa'i phyir thams cad dang ste /
analyzed: bye brag med par byas pa'i phyir thams cad dang ste /
translated: It is the distinction between all and all, because it is made without distinction.

original: dper na chos mthun pa'i dpe bum pa bstan pa'i phyir gzhan rnams dang yang khyad par med par byed pas bum pa la yod pa'i chos thams cad sgra la thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na chos mthun pa'i dpe bum pa bstan pa'i phyir gzhan rnams dang yang khyad par med par byed pas bum pa la yod pa'i chos thams cad sgra la thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: For example, because the example of a pot is taught as a property that is common to both, it makes no distinction between other things and the pot, and so all the properties that exist in the pot are found in sound.

original: de lta bas na thams cad phan tshun chos mthun pa'i phyir gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na thams cad phan tshun chos mthun pa'i phyir gcig nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, because all things are similar in this respect, it would follow, absurdly, that they would all be one.

original: 'di la yang bye brag med par thal bar 'gyur bas na bum pa bzhin sgra'i bye brag nyid rab tu ston pa yin pa'i phyir rnam rtog mtshungs pa las khyad par chen po yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la yang bye brag med par thal bar 'gyur bas na bum pa bzhin sgra'i bye brag nyid rab tu ston pa yin pa'i phyir rnam rtog mtshungs pa las khyad par chen po yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Since it would follow, absurdly, that there would be no difference between these two, the difference between the two is not great, since the particular of sound is being taught to be like a pot.

original: de'i phyir de bzhin du ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de bzhin du ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is like the inconclusive.

original: phyogs snga ma la ni chos mthun pa tsam las mi rtag par brjod pa dang / gang bye brag med pa tsam las mi rtag par brjod pa med de /
analyzed: phyogs snga ma la ni chos mthun pa tsam las mi rtag par brjod pa dang / gang bye brag med pa tsam las mi rtag par brjod pa med de /
translated: In the former position, impermanence is not stated on the basis of mere similarity, nor is impermanence stated on the basis of mere nondifference.

original: gang bye brag med par ma mthong ba tsam las ldog par byed do //
analyzed: gang bye brag med par ma mthong ba tsam las ldog par byed do //
translated: Rather, one negates on the basis of mere nonapprehension of difference.

original: de'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //🔽bsgrub bya rtogs khyad med phyir yang //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o // bsgrub bya rtogs khyad med phyir yang //
translated: Therefore, it is like the inconclusive.🔽It is also like the unestablished reason

original: ma grub pa ltar snang bar 'dod //
analyzed: ma grub pa ltar snang bar 'dod //
translated: because there is no difference in the ascertainment of the probandum.

original: bye brag med par mtshungs pa snga ma las tha dad du bya ba'i don du yang gi sgra smos so //
analyzed: bye brag med par mtshungs pa snga ma las tha dad du bya ba'i don du yang gi sgra smos so //
translated: The word also is used to indicate that it is like the former in being the same without difference.

original: de la rnam par rtog pa mtshungs pa dang bye brag med pa las bye brag med par mtshungs pa ni gzhan du brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de la rnam par rtog pa mtshungs pa dang bye brag med pa las bye brag med par mtshungs pa ni gzhan du brjod par bya ste /
translated: The similarity of conception and the similarity of non-distinction should be stated as different,

original: bsgrub bya dang gtan tshigs kyi don dag la bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang gtan tshigs kyi don dag la bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no distinction between the meaning of the probandum and the meaning of the logical reason.

original: dper na sngar bzhin byas pa la gtan nas byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang gtan tshigs kyi don dag la bye brag yod pa ma yin no zhes so //
analyzed: dper na sngar bzhin byas pa la gtan nas byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang gtan tshigs kyi don dag la bye brag yod pa ma yin no zhes so //
translated: For example, it is like the previous one, because there is no distinction between the meaning of the probandum and the meaning of the logical reason, since it is not produced at all.

original: de la brjod pa /
analyzed: de la brjod pa /
translated: To that, we reply:

original: de lta bu yang ma grub pa ltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: de lta bu yang ma grub pa ltar snang ba ste /
translated: That is also an unestablished seeming similarity,

original: snga na med pa skyes pa la bsgrub par bya ba nyid du sgro btags nas bsgrub par bya ba dang gtan tshigs su bye brag med par mgo bsgre ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga na med pa skyes pa la bsgrub par bya ba nyid du sgro btags nas bsgrub par bya ba dang gtan tshigs su bye brag med par mgo bsgre ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because, having imputed the non-existence prior to production as the probandum, the probandum and the logical reason are stated as being without distinction.

original: grub na ni sngar nas yod pa zhig na med pa bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: grub na ni sngar nas yod pa zhig na med pa bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: If it were established, then the non-existence of what previously existed would be the probandum.

original: gzhan yang bye brag med par mtshungs pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang bye brag med par mtshungs pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Moreover, the similarity of non-distinction should be stated.

original: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni mi rtag pa bsgrub pa bzhin chos gzhan yang sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba ni bye brag med pa'o //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid ni mi rtag pa bsgrub pa bzhin chos gzhan yang sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba ni bye brag med pa'o //
translated: The argument that “just as impermanence is established by the mere occurrence of effort, so too are other properties” is indiscriminate.

original: de lta bu yang bsgrub par bya ba la gnod pa sgrub par byed pa nyid kyis ni 'gal ba ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bu yang bsgrub par bya ba la gnod pa sgrub par byed pa nyid kyis ni 'gal ba ltar snang ba'o //
translated: The argument that “just as the property to be established is established by the mere occurrence of effort, so too is the contradictory property” is a pseudo-contradictory argument.

original: bsreg par bya ba la sogs pa ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu nges pa nyid 'gal bar rtsod par gal te mthong na gnod par byed pa ma yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bsreg par bya ba la sogs pa ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu nges pa nyid 'gal bar rtsod par gal te mthong na gnod par byed pa ma yin no zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Since the property to be established is not ascertained as one-sided, if one argues that it is contradictory, one should say that it is not contradictory.

original: @82a * // yang brjod pa /
analyzed: @82a * // yang brjod pa /
translated: Moreover, it is said:

original: bsgrub bya ba ni gnod chos kyang //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ba ni gnod chos kyang //
translated: The property to be established is not contradictory

original: mtshungs pa nyid kyi bye brag med //
analyzed: mtshungs pa nyid kyi bye brag med //
translated: because there is no distinction in sameness.

original: gtan tshigs skyon la 'gal ltar snang //
analyzed: gtan tshigs skyon la 'gal ltar snang //
translated: The reason is a pseudo-contradictory argument

original: skyon yod min te phyogs phyi ma //
analyzed: skyon yod min te phyogs phyi ma //
translated: because there is no fault, but it is the latter position.

original: de dag ni chos nyid chos mthun pa mtshungs pa la sogs pa phyogs phyi ma'o //
analyzed: de dag ni chos nyid chos mthun pa mtshungs pa la sogs pa phyogs phyi ma'o //
translated: These are the latter positions of the same properties, such as sameness.

original: gal te phyogs phyi ma las phyogs gcig tu nges par chos mthun pa la sogs pas phyogs gcig tu nges pas 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te phyogs phyi ma las phyogs gcig tu nges par chos mthun pa la sogs pas phyogs gcig tu nges pas 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the latter, then it is contradictory to say that it is ascertained as one part by the reason of being similar to that which is ascertained as one part.

original: phyogs snga ma la ni ji skad du brjod pa'i ma nges pa dang ldan pas de sun bton pa dang / sgrub pa'i sgo nas 'gal ba dang ma nges pa bsgrub par bya ba la gnod par brtsad pa'i phyir de dag ni sun 'byin gzhan nyid yin no //
analyzed: phyogs snga ma la ni ji skad du brjod pa'i ma nges pa dang ldan pas de sun bton pa dang / sgrub pa'i sgo nas 'gal ba dang ma nges pa bsgrub par bya ba la gnod par brtsad pa'i phyir de dag ni sun 'byin gzhan nyid yin no //
translated: In the former case, the fault of being inconclusive is as stated. And since the contradiction and inconclusiveness are established by the method of proof, they are different from the refutation.

original: gal te gnod par mi byed par mthong ste /
analyzed: gal te gnod par mi byed par mthong ste /
translated: If it is seen that the reason does not contradict the predicate,

original: dper na 'gal ba kha cig ni brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid las mi 'khrul ba de bzhin mnyan bya ma yin pa yang ngo //
analyzed: dper na 'gal ba kha cig ni brtsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid mi rtag pa nyid las mi 'khrul ba de bzhin mnyan bya ma yin pa yang ngo //
translated: then, for example, some contradictions are not mistaken with regard to impermanence, which occurs immediately after the effort. In the same way, it is not to be heard.

original: de bzhin du sgra mnyan bya ma yin no zhes de yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sgra mnyan bya ma yin no zhes de yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, sound is not to be heard. That also should be stated.

original: de ltar 'dir mnyan bya nyid la gnod pa ni mthong gi / sgra rtag pa nyid ni ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: de ltar 'dir mnyan bya nyid la gnod pa ni mthong gi / sgra rtag pa nyid ni ma mthong ngo //
translated: Thus, here the contradiction of being to be heard is seen, but the permanence of sound is not seen.

original: gang las mi rtag pa nyid 'thob pa'i rjes su dpag par 'jug par byed /
analyzed: gang las mi rtag pa nyid 'thob pa'i rjes su dpag par 'jug par byed /
translated: How can you infer the impermanence of something from something else?

original: dam bca' ba'i skyon nyid kyis snga ma la mnyan bya ma yin pa nyid mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i skyon nyid kyis snga ma la mnyan bya ma yin pa nyid mi 'grub bo //
translated: The fault in your thesis itself does not establish that the former is not to be heard.

original: gang la phyogs gcig tu nges pa mthong na ni gnod pa med de /
analyzed: gang la phyogs gcig tu nges pa mthong na ni gnod pa med de /
translated: When one sees that something is ascertained in one part, it is not contradicted.

original: ji ltar rdul gnyis pa ni rdul gcig sngon du song ba yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar rdul gnyis pa ni rdul gcig sngon du song ba yin te /
translated: Just as a second atom precedes a single atom,

original: rags pa yin pa'i phyir bum pa la sogs pa bzhin zhes byas nas rdul phra rab rnams kyis rags pa nyid kyang bsgrub pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rags pa yin pa'i phyir bum pa la sogs pa bzhin zhes byas nas rdul phra rab rnams kyis rags pa nyid kyang bsgrub pa bzhin no //
translated: because it is gross, like a pot, etc., and the grossness of the atoms is also established.

original: bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sngon du rdul rags pa song ba yin pa'i phyir de la lan gang zhig yod //🔽bsgrub bya la gnod bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyi sngon du rdul rags pa song ba yin pa'i phyir de la lan gang zhig yod // bsgrub bya la gnod bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: What is the answer to this? Because the gross atoms precede the pots, etc.

original: gnod pa byed pa 'gal nyid min //
analyzed: gnod pa byed pa 'gal nyid min //
translated: The contradiction is not the contradiction of the established with the probandum.🔽The contradiction is not the contradiction of the established with the probandum.

original: bsgrub bya la ni 'dir chos sam chos can yang rung ste /
analyzed: bsgrub bya la ni 'dir chos sam chos can yang rung ste /
translated: Here, the probandum is either the property or the subject.

original: de la gnod pa grub na de 'gal ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: de la gnod pa grub na de 'gal ba nyid yin no //
translated: If the establishment of the contradiction of that is established, then it is a contradiction.

original: bsgrub bya las gzhan gtan tshigs kyis //
analyzed: bsgrub bya las gzhan gtan tshigs kyis //
translated: If the reason is stated as other than the probandum,

original: bstan na dmigs pa mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: bstan na dmigs pa mtshungs pa'o //
translated: there is the same reference.

original: gang bsgrub par bya ba las gzhan yang gtan tshigs kyis nye bar bstan pa de ni dmigs pa mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: gang bsgrub par bya ba las gzhan yang gtan tshigs kyis nye bar bstan pa de ni dmigs pa mtshungs pa'o //
translated: If the reason is stated as other than the probandum, there is the same reference.

original: dper na snga ma bzhin du mi rtag par bsgrub pa la gtan tshigs 'di glog la sogs pa la yod pa ma yin zhing 'di las mngon sum la sogs pas mi rtag pa grub po //
analyzed: dper na snga ma bzhin du mi rtag par bsgrub pa la gtan tshigs 'di glog la sogs pa la yod pa ma yin zhing 'di las mngon sum la sogs pas mi rtag pa grub po //
translated: For example, in the proof of impermanence as before, this reason does not exist in lightning, etc. and impermanence is established by direct perception, etc. with regard to that.

original: gal te de med kyang de'i rgyur 'gyur ba ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te de med kyang de'i rgyur 'gyur ba ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if it does not exist, it is not a cause of that.

original: gzhan de las gzhan du sbyor bar @82b byed do //
analyzed: gzhan de las gzhan du sbyor bar @82b byed do //
translated: It is applied to something else other than that.

original: 'di mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di mi rtag pa'i gtan tshigs ma yin te /
translated: This is not a reason for impermanence.

original: khyab pa med pa'i phyir nags kyi shing nub mo nyal ba las sems pa dang ldan pa bzhin no zhes so //
analyzed: khyab pa med pa'i phyir nags kyi shing nub mo nyal ba las sems pa dang ldan pa bzhin no zhes so //
translated: Because there is no pervasion, like the thought of a person who sleeps in a forest at night.

original: 'di la yang /🔽bsgrub bya du ma bkod pa las //
analyzed: 'di la yang / bsgrub bya du ma bkod pa las //
translated: And in this case,🔽if many probandums are stated,

original: gtan tshigs de dang rjes mthun nyid //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de dang rjes mthun nyid //
translated: the reason is not in conformity with that.

original: gal te gtan tshigs gzhan gyis rtag par grub de lta na ni mi rtag pa'i 'khrul pa yin pas gtan tshigs gzhan gyis sgrub po //
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs gzhan gyis rtag par grub de lta na ni mi rtag pa'i 'khrul pa yin pas gtan tshigs gzhan gyis sgrub po //
translated: If it is established as permanent by another reason, then it is an error of impermanence, so it is established by another reason.

original: gtan tshigs ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not a reason.

original: de ni mi rtag pa med par mthong bar med do //
analyzed: de ni mi rtag pa med par mthong bar med do //
translated: It is not seen without impermanence.

original: byed pa po'i rgyu las gzhan gyi 'bras bu sgrub po //
analyzed: byed pa po'i rgyu las gzhan gyi 'bras bu sgrub po //
translated: It establishes the effect of another cause of the agent.

original: de'i gtan tshigs nyid dum gyur pa'i phyir shes par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i gtan tshigs nyid dum gyur pa'i phyir shes par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it does not become the very reason for that, it is not a reason.

original: de'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: Therefore, it is like an uncertain appearance.

original: gtan tshigs kyis ni ma khyab kyang //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyis ni ma khyab kyang //
translated: Even though it is not pervaded by the reason,

original: bsgrub bya'i dngos po rtogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i dngos po rtogs pa'i phyir //
translated: because the thing to be established is understood,

original: ma grub ltar snang sgrar gnas kyis //
analyzed: ma grub ltar snang sgrar gnas kyis //
translated: it is like an unestablished appearance, but

original: thams cad rab tu sgrub pa yin //
analyzed: thams cad rab tu sgrub pa yin //
translated: it is the establishment of everything.

original: gang ma khyab pa'i sgrub byed ma yin no zhes brjod pa la /
analyzed: gang ma khyab pa'i sgrub byed ma yin no zhes brjod pa la /
translated: Regarding what is said, That which is not pervaded is not a reason,🔽that impermanence is not possible for anything other than impermanence,

original: de mi rtag pa las gzhan la gtan tshigs mi srid cing /
analyzed: de mi rtag pa las gzhan la gtan tshigs mi srid cing /
translated: and

original: sgra la med pa yang ma yin pa la med par btags pa'i phyir ma grub pa ltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: sgra la med pa yang ma yin pa la med par btags pa'i phyir ma grub pa ltar snang ba ste /
translated: It is not the case that the reason is nonexistent in the property of the thesis, because it is designated as nonexistent in what is nonexistent.

original: bsgrub bya kho na la med pa yin pa'i phyir sun 'byin pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya kho na la med pa yin pa'i phyir sun 'byin pa yin no //
translated: The reason is not nonexistent in the property of the thesis, because it is nonexistent only in the thesis.

original: gtan tshigs de sgra la med pa yang ma yin la sgra la yod pas thams cad kyis bsgrub bya sgrub pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gtan tshigs de sgra la med pa yang ma yin la sgra la yod pas thams cad kyis bsgrub bya sgrub pa yang ma yin te /
translated: The reason is not nonexistent in sound, because it exists in sound. It is not the case that it proves everything,

original: ji ltar sbrul la sogs pa la yod pa'i mtshan mo nyal bas na nags na gnas pa sems pa dang bcas par bsgrub pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar sbrul la sogs pa la yod pa'i mtshan mo nyal bas na nags na gnas pa sems pa dang bcas par bsgrub pa bzhin no //
translated: just as the sign of sleeping at night proves that a person in the forest has a mind, even though it exists in a snake and so on.

original: the tshom brjod 'dod tha dad las //🔽gtan tshigs the tshom rtsod par byed //
analyzed: the tshom brjod 'dod tha dad las // gtan tshigs the tshom rtsod par byed //
translated: Doubt is stated from the desire to speak of difference.

original: gang du dam bcas pa'i don btags pas gtan tshigs 'khrul pa'i phyir the tshom du brjod do //
analyzed: gang du dam bcas pa'i don btags pas gtan tshigs 'khrul pa'i phyir the tshom du brjod do //
translated: Doubt is stated when the meaning of the thesis is designated as the reason, because the reason is mistaken.

original: gtan tshigs kyi don rtag pa las kyang the tshom mtshungs pa'i ltag spyod yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don rtag pa las kyang the tshom mtshungs pa'i ltag spyod yin no //
translated: The meaning of the reason is the same as doubt, because it is a consequence.

original: dper na sngar bzhin byas pa la brtsal ma thag tu byung ba bsal ba dang / skyes pa mthong ba las the tshom du 'gyur te /
analyzed: dper na sngar bzhin byas pa la brtsal ma thag tu byung ba bsal ba dang / skyes pa mthong ba las the tshom du 'gyur te /
translated: For example, as before, when one sees that something arises immediately after effort, one doubts whether it is produced or manifested.

original: ci 'di gsal bar bya ba yin nam /
analyzed: ci 'di gsal bar bya ba yin nam /
translated: Is it manifested?

original: bskyed par bya ba yin zhes so //
analyzed: bskyed par bya ba yin zhes so //
translated: Or is it produced?

original: 'di rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not a correct example.

original: gang gtan tshigs de dag las mi rtag pa'o zhes pa de'i lta na /
analyzed: gang gtan tshigs de dag las mi rtag pa'o zhes pa de'i lta na /
translated: If one says that impermanence is the reason in the proof of that,

original: bsgrub bya sgro btags ma nges pa //
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgro btags ma nges pa //
translated: then the probandum is uncertain due to overextension.

original: ltar snang / 'di brtsal ma thag tu byung ba dmigs nas 'jig pa nyid du sgrub pa la gang zhig de ltar sgro 'dogs na mi rtag pa bskyed par bya ste /
analyzed: ltar snang / 'di brtsal ma thag tu byung ba dmigs nas 'jig pa nyid du sgrub pa la gang zhig de ltar sgro 'dogs na mi rtag pa bskyed par bya ste /
translated: When one observes that something arises immediately after effort, if one infers that it is destroyed, then impermanence is produced by that.

original: de la yang ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir the tshom yin no //🔽'di ltar brtsal ma thag @83a * //
analyzed: de la yang ma nges pa yin pa'i phyir the tshom yin no // 'di ltar brtsal ma thag @83a * //
translated: But since that is also uncertain, it is doubt.

original: tu byung ba dmigs pa bsal ba ni rtsva dang chu la sogs pa la yod pas de ma nges pa la snang ba ste /
analyzed: tu byung ba dmigs pa bsal ba ni rtsva dang chu la sogs pa la yod pas de ma nges pa la snang ba ste /
translated: In this way, the observation of something that arises immediately after effort is overextended, since it exists for grass, water, and so on.

original: 'jig pa bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig pa bsgrub bya yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not ascertained, since destruction is the probandum.

original: gsal ba rnams la yang 'jig pa nyid yod pa ste /🔽de'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
analyzed: gsal ba rnams la yang 'jig pa nyid yod pa ste / de'i phyir ma nges pa ltar snang ba'o //
translated: And that which is manifest is also subject to destruction.

original: rtags ma grub ltar snang /
analyzed: rtags ma grub ltar snang /
translated: Therefore, it is a fallacious reason in the sense of being indefinite.🔽The reason is not established.

original: sgro btags nas shes par bya'o ;🔽/ gal te gtan tshigs su sgro btags par bya ba'i brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i phyir skyes pa sun bton na ni de las ma grub pa ltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: sgro btags nas shes par bya'o ; / gal te gtan tshigs su sgro btags par bya ba'i brtsal ma thag tu byung ba'i phyir skyes pa sun bton na ni de las ma grub pa ltar snang ba ste /
translated: It is to be understood by implication.

original: gtan tshigs su brjod pa'i brtsal ma thag tu byung bar dmigs pa de brtsal ma thag tu skyes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs su brjod pa'i brtsal ma thag tu byung bar dmigs pa de brtsal ma thag tu skyes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If one refutes the arising of that which is produced immediately after the effort that is the reason, then it is a fallacious reason in the sense of the reason not being established, because that which is observed immediately after the effort that is stated as the reason is not produced immediately after the effort.

original: don gyis 'dod min mi mthun phyogs //
analyzed: don gyis 'dod min mi mthun phyogs //
translated: It is not intended, but it is the counter pervasion.

original: bsgrub brjod don go mtshungs /🔽dper na gal te rtsol ba las byung ba mi rtag pa yin na /
analyzed: bsgrub brjod don go mtshungs / dper na gal te rtsol ba las byung ba mi rtag pa yin na /
translated: It is similar to the meaning of the thesis statement.🔽For example, if that which is produced by effort is impermanent, then by the force of the meaning, that which is not produced by effort, such as lightning, would be permanent.

original: don gyi shugs kyi rtsol ba las ma byung ba'i glog la sogs pa rnams rtag pa'o zhes 'gyur bas de lta bu ni don gyis go bar mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: don gyi shugs kyi rtsol ba las ma byung ba'i glog la sogs pa rnams rtag pa'o zhes 'gyur bas de lta bu ni don gyis go bar mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is similar to being understood by implication.

original: 'di ni / 'khrul pa gzhan gyi bsgrub bya la //
analyzed: 'di ni / 'khrul pa gzhan gyi bsgrub bya la //
translated: uncertain reason.

original: de yis sgrub pa de ltar snang //
analyzed: de yis sgrub pa de ltar snang //
translated: The reason is uncertain because it is not established in the example.

original: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid las mi rtag pa nyid sgrub pa la rtsol ba las ma byung ba nyid las rtag pa'i don du sgro 'dogs par byed pa de la ni ma nges pa sngar sgro 'dogs par byed do //
analyzed: rtsol ba las byung ba nyid las mi rtag pa nyid sgrub pa la rtsol ba las ma byung ba nyid las rtag pa'i don du sgro 'dogs par byed pa de la ni ma nges pa sngar sgro 'dogs par byed do //
translated: In the proof of impermanence from the fact of being produced, the opponent attributes permanence to the object of the thesis on the ground that it is not produced from effort.

original: des na ma nges pa ltar snang ba ste rtag pa la yang gtan tshigs zhugs pa ni ma yin pas na gang las bsgrub bar bya ba las ma nges par 'gyur /
analyzed: des na ma nges pa ltar snang ba ste rtag pa la yang gtan tshigs zhugs pa ni ma yin pas na gang las bsgrub bar bya ba las ma nges par 'gyur /
translated: In that case, the reason is uncertain, because it is uncertain whether the reason is present in the similar instance or not.

original: yang na rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid do zhes sgrub pa la rtsol ba las byung ba nyid la sogs pa de dag med kyang glog la sogs pa ni mi rtag pa grub pas so zhes rtsod par byed do //
analyzed: yang na rtsol ba las byung ba'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid do zhes sgrub pa la rtsol ba las byung ba nyid la sogs pa de dag med kyang glog la sogs pa ni mi rtag pa grub pas so zhes rtsod par byed do //
translated: Or else, the opponent argues that the reason is uncertain because the reason is not established. He says that the reason is uncertain because the reason is not established in the example.

original: de yang ma nges pa ltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: de yang ma nges pa ltar snang ba ste /
translated: This is also the fallacy of uncertain reason.

original: de rtag pa yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: de rtag pa yang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: The reason is uncertain because it is not established in the example.

original: / thal 'gyur mtshungs par 'dod pa yang //
analyzed: / thal 'gyur mtshungs par 'dod pa yang //
translated: The assertion of a similar reductio is

original: gang yang gnyis ka gtan tshigs lam //
analyzed: gang yang gnyis ka gtan tshigs lam //
translated: also a path of reasoning for both.

original: dper na sngar bzhin sgrub pa la re zhig 'dir bum pa kho na mi rtag pa'o zhes pa'i gtan tshigs gang yin zhes so //
analyzed: dper na sngar bzhin sgrub pa la re zhig 'dir bum pa kho na mi rtag pa'o zhes pa'i gtan tshigs gang yin zhes so //
translated: For example, in the proof that sound is impermanent, someone says, “What is the reason for the statement ‘Sound is impermanent’?🔽”

original: de ni dpe ltar snang ba bzhin //
analyzed: de ni dpe ltar snang ba bzhin //
translated: That is like a seemingly similar example.

original: de bum pa mi rtag pa grub pa mthong ba bzhin du yang rtsod pa ni bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro med pa'i dpe ltar snang bar rigs pa'i phyir de lta bu de ltar snang ba ste /
analyzed: de bum pa mi rtag pa grub pa mthong ba bzhin du yang rtsod pa ni bsgrub bya'i rjes 'gro med pa'i dpe ltar snang bar rigs pa'i phyir de lta bu de ltar snang ba ste /
translated: Just as the example of sound being impermanent is seen to be established, so too is the example of the opponent’s position being contradictory.

original: gong du 'bras bu mtshungs par gtan tshigs kyi rjes 'gro brjod zin to //
analyzed: gong du 'bras bu mtshungs par gtan tshigs kyi rjes 'gro brjod zin to //
translated: The similarity of the consequence has already been stated above.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: These are

original: ltag gcod kun la phyogs tsam mo //
analyzed: ltag gcod kun la phyogs tsam mo //
translated: just a few of the many reductio arguments.

original: ji ltar ltag gcod de dag rnams la ma tshang ba la sogs pa ltar snang ba nyid @83b kyis mi rigs par lan brjod pa de bzhin du lhag pa mtshungs pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams la yang ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar ltag gcod de dag rnams la ma tshang ba la sogs pa ltar snang ba nyid @83b kyis mi rigs par lan brjod pa de bzhin du lhag pa mtshungs pa la sogs pa gzhan rnams la yang ngo //
translated: Just as those reductio arguments are responses that are illogical because they seem to be incomplete, so too are the other similar arguments such as the excess.

original: de dag nyid la sbyor ba'i bye brag cung zad tsam gyis dbye bas mtha' yas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag nyid la sbyor ba'i bye brag cung zad tsam gyis dbye bas mtha' yas par 'gyur ro //
translated: and these are infinite in number, since they are divided into the various types of application.

original: de la kho bo cag gis ma tshang ba ltar snang ba dang / ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa de dag brjod pa de ni rjod par byed pa la brjod par bya ba brtags nas yin te /
analyzed: de la kho bo cag gis ma tshang ba ltar snang ba dang / ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa de dag brjod pa de ni rjod par byed pa la brjod par bya ba brtags nas yin te /
translated: In this regard, we have mentioned the “apparent non-establishment” and the “apparent non-establishment of the reason,” etc., and this is said with reference to the speaker,

original: de ltar ma yin na ma tshang ba nyid du rtsod pa ltar snang ba dang ma grub pa nyid du rtsod pa ltar snang ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa nyid brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na ma tshang ba nyid du rtsod pa ltar snang ba dang ma grub pa nyid du rtsod pa ltar snang ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa nyid brjod par bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: otherwise, it would be necessary to say “the apparent non-establishment of the reason,” etc.

original: de lta na yang gzhung mngas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na yang gzhung mngas par 'gyur te /
translated: But even so, the text would be too prolix.🔽For example, if the opponent does not understand the reductio, the reply would be connected with that.

original: 'di ltar gang kha cig tu ltag gcod de ma rtogs kyis bstan nas de de dang 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / gang ma ning gi rtags kyis bstan nas lan yang de dang mngon par 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar gang kha cig tu ltag gcod de ma rtogs kyis bstan nas de de dang 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / gang ma ning gi rtags kyis bstan nas lan yang de dang mngon par 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And if the opponent does not understand the sign, the reply would be connected with that.

original: mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni thams cad kyi mjug bsdu bar ltag gcod rnams la thal bar 'gyur bar mtshungs par rig par bya'o//
analyzed: mtshungs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni thams cad kyi mjug bsdu bar ltag gcod rnams la thal bar 'gyur bar mtshungs par rig par bya'o//
translated: The word “similar” should be applied to all of these, so that they are similar in being consequences.

original: de ltar re zhig kho bo cag gis ltag gcod rnams la ma tshang ba ltar snang ba dang / ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa de dag brjod do //
analyzed: de ltar re zhig kho bo cag gis ltag gcod rnams la ma tshang ba ltar snang ba dang / ma grub pa ltar snang ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa de dag brjod do //
translated: Thus, we have stated that the consequences are similar in appearing to be incomplete and unestablished.

original: ltag gcod rnams la rtsod sgrub tu //
analyzed: ltag gcod rnams la rtsod sgrub tu //
translated: In the debate on consequences,🔽there are three faults:

original: phyin ci log dang brdzun nyid dang // 'gal ba nyid de skyon gsum ste //
analyzed: phyin ci log dang brdzun nyid dang // 'gal ba nyid de skyon gsum ste //
translated: reversal, falsity, and contradiction.
